Text:
Kita juga digalakkan membaca Surah Al-Kahfi. Ia juga cerita tentang hari Akhirat.

Kenapa kena ingatkan tentang Kiamat dan Hari Akhirat pada hari Jumaat?

Sebab kiamat itu akan berlaku pada hari Jumaat. Orang beriman akan lebih bersedia bila dengar peringatan tersebut.
Translated Text:
We are also encouraged to read Surah Al-Kahfi. It is also a story about the Hereafter.

Why do you have to remind about the Resurrection and the Last Day on Friday?

Because the apocalypse will happen on Friday. Believers will be more prepared when they hear the warning.

Text:
Ia juga jadi satu motivasi terbesar kita semua kena belajar dan faham Bahasa Arab.

Bukanlah sampai kita sampai boleh berborak dengan pak arab. Cukup sekadar kita faham Al-Quran bila baca dan dengar.

Ia sumber agama kita. Belajarlah bahasa lain, tapi jangan tinggalkan arabic.
Translated Text:
It is also one of the biggest motivations for all of us to learn and understand Arabic.

Not until we can chat with the Arabs. It is enough that we understand the Al-Quran when we read and listen.

It is the source of our religion. Learn another language, but don't leave Arabic.

Text:
Untuk kiraan zakat ASB/ASBF bagi tahun-tahun yang lepas di Selangor masih menggunakan kiraan % seperti ini.

Fatwa Selangor mengambil kira Shariah-compliant dari Securities Commission Malaysia (SC).

PNB mengambil 5 tahun untuk pastikan pelaburan mereka patuh Syariah sepenuhnya. https://t.co/qkQPak8O01
Translated Text:
For the calculation of ASB/ASBF zakat for the past years in Selangor still using this % calculation.

The Selangor fatwa takes into account Shariah-compliant from the Securities Commission Malaysia (SC).

PNB took 5 years to ensure their investments were fully Shariah compliant. https://t.co/qkQPak8O01

Text:
@acaiijawe Alhamdulillah, tahniah kepada PNB.

Bukan mudah tu nak capai 100% patuh syariah.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Alhamdulillah, congratulations to PNB.

It is not easy to achieve 100% Sharia compliance.

Translated Text: @haikalhisham_ That's right sir. With a very large investment size, it is actually something difficult. Moreover, I want to keep the profit.

Text:
@aydarazali Kalau kira ASB cash, ia dikira pada akhir tempoh haul kita.

Contoh, kalau haul kita pada bulan Disember, maka total pelaburan ASB pada tempoh tersebut akan dikira dalam pengiraan zakat.
Translated Text:
@aydarazali If you calculate ASB cash, it is calculated at the end of our haul period.

For example, if our haul is in December, then the total ASB investment during that period will be counted in the zakat calculation.

Text:
@acaiijawe Modal 100k
Dividen 2k
Total 102k

Zakat 2.5% dari 102k = RM 2550

102k - 2550 = RM 99450

Means pelaburan dia rugi ke sebab zakat dia melebihi dividen. 

Atau kalau dividen kurang dari 2.5% tak perlu zakat? https://t.co/SGVSoSTes0
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Capital 100k
Dividend 2k
Total 102k

Zakat 2.5% of 102k = RM 2550

102k - 2550 = RM 99450

Means his investment is a loss because his zakat exceeds the dividend.

Or if the dividend is less than 2.5% there is no need for zakat? https://t.co/SGVSoSTes0

Text:
@hanahimey Syarat zakat kena lebih Nisab.

Nisab = 85 gram emas = RM20k.

Kalau dia bisnes/melabur dan rugi RM50,000 sekalipun mmg kena zakat. Sebab RM50k>RM20k.

Zakat dikira atas kekayaan semasa pada akhir haul. Harta beliau dah wajib keluar zakat.
Translated Text:
@hanahimey The condition of zakat has to be more Nisab.

Nisab = 85 grams of gold = RM20k.

If he is in business/invests and loses RM50,000, even if he has to pay zakat. Because RM50k >RM20k.

Zakat is calculated on the current wealth at the end of the haul. His property is required to pay zakat.

Text:
@HnfR19 Kelebihan ProMotion iPhone ni dia takde sepanjang masa 120hz. Jadi battery tak impak teruk sangat. Bergantung kita buat apa.

Kekadang ia turun sampai 30hz, 60hz, 120hz in between.
Translated Text:
@HnfR19 The advantage of this ProMotion iPhone is that it doesn't have 120hz all the time. So the battery is not affected very badly. Depends on what we do.

Sometimes it drops to 30hz, 60hz, 120hz in between.

Text: @acaiijawe Terasa beza dak antara 60Hz vs 120Hz? Sebab optimization iOS tu sendiri dah bagi rasa smooth dah UI/UX dia walaupun skrin selama ni 60Hz saja.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Do you feel the difference between 60Hz vs 120Hz? Because the iOS optimization itself has made the UI/UX feel smooth even though the screen is only 60Hz.

Text:
@pitjat Memang terasa beza 120hz. Dia satu benda yang kalau tak guna memang takkan terasa.

Tapi kalau dah guna 2-3 bulan, confirm dah taknak guna 60hz lagi. Ini kata kawan2 yang dah pakai 120hz lama di Android.
Translated Text:
@pitjat It feels like a 120hz difference. He is one thing that if you don't use it, you won't feel it.

But if you've been using it for 2-3 months, confirm that you don't want to use 60hz anymore. This is what friends who have been using 120hz for a long time on Android say.

Text:
'Research' orang awam vs expert.

Anda mungkin seorang senior engineer, IT expert, faqih dlm bidang agama.

Tapi anda tetap level 'orang awam' dalam bidang lain (eg medical).

Siapa yang faham disiplin ilmu akan sedar tahap ilmu mereka.

'Reseach' kita cuma level marhain. https://t.co/gi0L1JPVvu
Translated Text:
Public vs expert 'research'.

You may be a senior engineer, IT expert, jurist in the field of religion.

But you are still a 'layman' level in other fields (eg medical).

Those who understand the discipline will be aware of their level of knowledge.

Our 'reseach' is only level marhain. https://t.co/gi0L1JPVvu

Text:
Betul. Sangat bagus selalu berkongsi ilmu, berdebat dan ambil manfaat dari sosial media.

Namun, sayang kalau ia tidak diterjemahkan dalam ibadah seharian kita.

Kata-kata dan tulisan sahaja belum cukup.

Solat awal waktu. Berjemaah. Di masjid. Itu keutamaan muslim yang soleh.
Translated Text:
That's right. It is always good to share knowledge, debate and take advantage of social media.

However, it is a pity if it is not translated into our daily worship.

Words and writing alone are not enough.

Early prayer time. Congregate. In the mosque. That is the priority of a pious Muslim.

Text: @acaiijawe Betul. Bila baca komen-komen di media sosial nak pertikaikan SOP dengan ajukan soalan "masjid bila nak buka?", jadi hairan. Kebanyakan masjid memang dah buka, cuma penuh atau tak sahaja. Khususnya solat fardhu berjemaah.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Right. When I read the comments on social media to dispute the SOP by asking the question "when do you want to open the mosque?", I was puzzled. Most mosques are indeed open, just full or not only. In particular, congregational obligatory prayers.

Text: @acaiijawe Saya tak faham masjid kat IIUM Kuantan tu. Khatib dengan imam banyak kali suruh imarahkan masjid. Tapi pintu pagar masjid tu bukak waktu siang je. Hujung minggu langsung tak bukak. Bukannya semua orang tahu nak masuk masjid boleh ikut pintu hospital UIA
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I don't understand the mosque at IIUM Kuantan. The khatib and the imam many times told to imarah the mosque. But the gate of the mosque is only open during the day. It doesn't open on weekends. It's not that everyone knows that if they want to enter the mosque, they can follow the UIA hospital door

Text:
Lenkali kalau ada kereta laju semacam cucuk rapat masa korang nak bayar tol (TnG, Smart Tag, RFID), itu satu tanda mereka nak elak tol.

Cuba korang keluar perlahan-lahan sampai gate tu tertutup semula. Mesti diaorang marah gila.

Ada yang berjaya buat begitu kat KESAS.
Translated Text:
Lenkali, if there are fast cars like that when you want to pay the toll (TnG, Smart Tag, RFID), that's a sign that they want to avoid the toll.

Try to get out slowly until the gate closes again. He must be mad mad.

Some have succeeded in doing that at KESAS.

Text:
Bagi yang tak pernah tahu bagaimana cara mereka lalu tol free, ini salah satu contoh mereka tailgating (Honda jugak).

Biasanya target driver perempuan, sebab biasanya mereka takkan perasan.

Kalau biar palang tu turun, mereka takkan boleh lepas. Cubalah perhati sesekali. https://t.co/WDBXkw4wmm
Translated Text:
For those who never know how they pass the free toll, this is one example of them tailgating (Honda too).

Usually female drivers are targeted, because usually they won't notice.

If they let the bar go down, they won't be able to get off. Try to pay attention once in a while. https://t.co/WDBXkw4wmm

Text:
“Sayang, awak dah beli ke yang saya suruh tadi?”

Terpinga-pinga perempuan tu ditanya lelaki yang tidak dikenali.

“Abang, saya kat sini.” Jerit isteri abang tu dr jauh.

Nak pengsan aku gelak dengar dialog tu tadi 🤣. Tapi kena tahan ketawa sampai jauh dari diaorang dulu.
Translated Text:
"Honey, have you bought the one I told you to?"

In a daze, the woman was asked by an unknown man.

"Brother, I'm here." The brother's wife screamed from afar.

I almost fainted laughing listening to that dialogue 🤣. But I had to hold back laughing until I was far away from him.

Text:
@acaiijawe Unpopular personal opinion.

1. Beli guna FP bukan sebab malas, tapi sebab kekangan/komitmen lain.

2. Memang lebih jimat, tapi kena pilih antara duit, atau tenaga.

+Duit -tenaga
-Duit +tenaga

3. Kalau takda yang guna, habis mata pencarian rider yang semakin berlambak sekarang.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Unpopular personal opinion.

1. Buy using FP not because of laziness, but because of other constraints/commitments.

2. It is more economical, but you have to choose between money or energy.

+ Money - energy
-Money + energy

3. If there is no one to use, the rider's means of livelihood will run out.

Text: @acaiijawe Saya akan tanya mak sy direct. Mak nak masak or nak beli. And kalau mak jawab beli, akan tanya detail nak beli apa~ beli yg mak suka je. * skrg byk kerja drive long distance / or lama depan screen. I kdg2 pay for the tenaga and time. Selalunya berbaloi. Kdg2 je ralat kalau x sdp~
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I will ask my mother directly. I want to cook or buy. And if you answer to buy, I will ask you the details of what you want to buy~ just buy what you like. * now a lot of work to drive long distance / or for a long time in front of the screen. I will pay for the energy and time. Often worth it. It's an error if it doesn't work~

Text: @acaiijawe Masak tanpa minyak or mengoreng sgt cepat, ikan gaul garam kunyit letak dlm kuali ajaib. 8-10min dah siap. Makan dgn nasik putih dan sambal belacan botol. Perghh
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Cook without oil or fry very quickly, fish mixed with salt and turmeric put in a magic pan. It's ready in 8-10 minutes. Eat with white nasik and bottled sambal belacan. Gosh

Text: @acaiijawe ada lagi satu sbb kenapa kadang-kadang kena order grabfood sbb takda siapa tolong jaga anak. Nak masak tak sempat, anak asyik merengek 24/7. Kerja pun banyak lagi tk siap. Nak keluar, kena bawa anak. Nak siapkan anak dah satu hal. So better bayar lebih untuk jimat tenaga dan masa
Translated Text: @acaiijawe there is one more thing, why do you sometimes have to order grabfood because there is no one to look after the child. I don't have time to cook, the kids are busy whining 24/7. There is still a lot of work to be done. If you want to go out, you have to bring your child. It's one thing to prepare a child. So better pay more to save energy and time

Text:
@acaiijawe Kalau pre covid, saya setuju. 

Tapi dengan masa sekarang, keluar rumah lebih renyah. Kalau keluar, kena sanitize itu ini, bila balik kena mandi, rendam dan basuh baju. Ended up rugi tenaga dan masa. Jadi order delivery lebih convenient
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe If pre covid, I agree.

But with the present time, leaving the house is more crunchy. If you go out, you have to sanitize, when you come back you have to shower, soak and wash your clothes. Ended up waste of energy and time. So ordering delivery is more convenient

Text: @acaiijawe Tpi sekarang delivery fees agak x berbaloi, vendor 3km,tpi delivery rm6.. Mkin lama mkin naik.. 😂 Kita yg rider ni pun perasaan harga mkin naik, tpi gaji kitorg camtu jugak, tktau la bahagian marketing buat apa.. Tpi srs klau rajin and nk jimat pergi la kedai walkin
Translated Text: @acaiijawe But now the delivery fees are not worth it, the vendor is 3km, but the delivery is rm6.. It's getting higher and higher.. 😂 We riders also feel that the price is going up, but our salary is the same, I don't know what the marketing department is doing.. But srs, if you are diligent and want to save money, go to the walkin store

Text: @acaiijawe 3. masak sendiri 🙃

Translated Text: @acaiijawe @twt_syxhh More time worthy. If you feel that time is more valuable, just deliver. When it's time to prepare assignments, I feel like I'm wasting time going out to buy food so it's just delivery. If not hrrmm.. Just eat biscuits

Text:
Teringat sorang Prof (local IPT) antivax kat kariah sini.

Beliau secara agresif kongsi data-data antivax di group berbulan-bulan lamanya. Anti KKM & mufti.

2 bulan lepas, anaknya positif Covid dan jangkiti beliau. Sebulan lebih 'melawan'. Minggu lepas, beliau meninggal dunia.
Translated Text:
I remember a Prof (local IPT) antivax in the parish here.

He aggressively shared antivax data in the group for months. Anti Ministry of Health & mufti

2 months ago, his son tested positive for Covid and infected him. A month more 'fight'. Last week, he died.

Text:
Kadangkala data dan statistik paling penting dan simple seperti RISIKO KEMATIAN yang tidak vaksin lebih tinggi bila mereka positif Covid, langsung tidak dihiraukan.

Tapi fokus dan ambil data yang terpencil.

Family beliau yang lain juga ada beberapa orang di ICU sekarang.
Translated Text:
Sometimes the most important and simple data and statistics such as the RISK OF DEATH who are not vaccinated are higher if they are positive for Covid, they are immediately ignored.

But focus and retrieve remote data.

His other family also has several people in the ICU now.

Text:
Bila baca mesej-mesej arwah lepas, lebih kurang sama nada dan hujah dengan antivax yang korang jumpa sana sini.

Semoga diampuni semua dosa-dosa arwah. Semoga diberi kesembuhan juga kepada semua ahli keluarga beliau yang lain.

Aku cuma orang awam. Ikut mufti dan 'ahlinya'.
Translated Text:
When you read the messages of the deceased, it is more or less the same tone and argument as the antivax that you find here and there.

May all the sins of the deceased be forgiven. May healing be given to all other members of his family.

I'm just a civilian. Follow the mufti and his 'members'.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe I want to discuss with them, it only hurts my heart... I just explained the importance of vaccines. Don't worry, I'll just ignore it....... My heart doesn't hurt so much, I don't even want to swear.

Text:
Semua Jabatan Agama Islam Negeri ada peruntukan dalam Enakmen untuk denda dan penjara bagi sesiapa yang memungut derma kecuali dengan kebenaran daripada Majlis Agama.

Semua derma akan diserahkan kepada Baitulmal.

Banyak kes kena tangkap sebelum ni. Dpt RM300 sehari tu biasa.
Translated Text:
All State Islamic Religious Departments have provisions in the Enactment for fines and imprisonment for anyone who collects donations except with permission from the Religious Council.

All donations will be handed over to Baitulmal.

Many cases have to be arrested before this. Getting RM300 a day is normal.

Text:
Cara terbaik nak bantu mereka dengan JANGAN BERI SEDEKAH.

Mereka ada bos. Bila dapat duit banyak, bos mereka yang kaya raya.

Industri ni berkembang sebab ia menguntungkan. Mungkin juga terlibat pemerdagangan manusia.

Tapi mereka ini akan terus dipergunakan dan tertindas.
Translated Text:
The best way to help them is to NOT GIVE CHARITY.

They have a boss. When they get a lot of money, their boss is rich.

This industry is growing because it is profitable. Human trafficking may also be involved.

But these people will continue to be used and oppressed.

Text:
Ketika ramai bincang perkahwinan bawah umur, sbnrnya ada ramai remaja usia bawah 18 tahun yang dah ada 1-2 orang anak tinggal dengan pasangan mereka (lari dari rumah).

Kahwin tak register.
Anak takde kad pengenalan.
Miskin.

Sukar nak bantu keluarga begini secara sistematik.
Translated Text:
When many people talk about underage marriage, there are many teenagers under the age of 18 who already have 1-2 children living with their partner (run away from home).

Unregistered marriage.
The child does not have an identification card.
Poor.

It is difficult to systematically help families like this.

Text:
Hidup ni bukan nak seronok bercinta sehidup semati dengan kekasih hati.

Lepas penat bercinta, baru nampak realiti kehidupan sebenar. Sedar langit tinggi ke rendah.

Ia perlukan kerja, duit dan tanggungjawab. Masa ini baru nak kembali kepada keluarga yang dibuang dulu.
Translated Text:
This life is not about enjoying love for the rest of your life with your sweetheart.

After being tired of love, you will see the reality of real life. Realize the sky is high to low.

It requires work, money and responsibility. This is the time to return to the family that was thrown away.

Translated Text:

There are also other professional groups such as doctors, engineers, teachers etc.

Text:
Bagi kita memang nampak lawak tapi bukan sedikit yang percaya dan anggap ia serius.

Sayang sebab mereka ni buat begitu kononnya nak dekat dengan agama, rupanya sesat.

Semoga dengan taubat Pn Masitah tu berpuluh group FB dan Telegram mereka bubar dan insaf.
Translated Text:
To us it looks like a joke but not a few believe it and consider it serious.

It's a pity because they do that so they say they want to be close to religion, apparently they are misguided.

Hopefully with Ms. Masitah's repentance, dozens of FB and Telegram groups will disband and repent.

Text:
"Kita nak cari pekerjaan, kita akan usaha cari majikan terbaik.

Pekerjaan tu tak datang bergolek kepada kita.

Tapi.

Kenapa bila melibatkan jodoh kita nak tunggu dan tidak berusaha yang sama?"

Ustaz jawab pertanyaan sorang pemuda yang sedang mencari jodoh.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
"We want to find a job, we will try to find the best employer.

The job does not come rolling to us.

But.

Why do we want to wait and not make the same effort when it comes to our partner?"

Ustaz answered the question of a young man who was looking for a mate.

That's it.

Text:
Sebab dalam Islam ni, kalaulah anda berzina, minum arak, lakukan homoseksual dsb tapi buat secara SEMBUNYI, bila-bila masa nak bertaubat, Allah boleh terima taubatnya.

Ia dikira dosa individu.

Dia memang berdosa tapi itu kelemahannya sebagai manusia.
Translated Text:
Because in this Islam, if you commit adultery, drink alcohol, commit homosexuality, etc. but do it SECRETLY, whenever you want to repent, God can accept your repentance.

It is considered an individual sin.

He is a sinner but that is his weakness as a human being.

Text:
Tapi bila melibatkan maslahat awam seperti rasuah, pecah amanah, zalim kepada orang lain, itu memang kena dedahkan.

Sebab mudharatnya yg lebih besar.

Lagipun.

Kita semua pendosa. Cuma Allah masih tutup aib kita.

Kalaulah terbuka, mungkin kita lagi teruk dan orang hina kita.
Translated Text:
But when it involves public interest such as corruption, breach of trust, being cruel to others, that must be disclosed.

Because of the greater harm.

After all.

We are all sinners. Only God still covers our shame.

If we are open, maybe we are worse and our people are despicable.

Because there are other hidden characters that only their life partners know. That is their true 'self'.

Text:
Cubalah semua benda.

• Berlari
• Hiking
• Skipping
• Main Basikal
• Akuarium
• Drone racing
• Memancing
• Street photography
• Berkhemah dsb

Cari lingkungan kawan-kawan baru yang sama minat. Jumpa, kenal, berinteraksi dan buat bersama-sama.

Rasakan perbezaannya.
Translated Text:
Try everything.

• Running
• Hiking
• Skipping
• Play Bikes
• Aquarium
• Drone racing
• Fishing
• Street photography
• Camping etc

Find a circle of new friends with the same interests. Meet, get to know, interact and create together.

Feel the difference.

Text:
Kalau boleh cari aktiviti dan hobi yang dapat keluarkan peluh. Bukan hobi yang buat kita makin stress.

Sebab benda tu bantu keluarkan hormon endorphins. Ia dapat jadi ‘happiness booster’ yang bantu overall mood kita jadi lebih baik.

Kita yang kawal kehidupan kita.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
If possible, find activities and hobbies that can make you sweat. It's not a hobby that makes us more stressed.

Because that thing helps release endorphins. It can be a 'happiness booster' that helps our overall mood to be better.

We are in control of our lives.

That's it.

Text:
Semua tu mungkin boleh diperbaiki jika korang kurangkan tengok smartphone.

Muslim yg baik bangun awal untuk tahajjud. Mereka solat berjemaah di masjid.

Hidupnya teratur. Kerjanya tip top. Rajin membaca buku. Selalu bersenam. Fizikalnya fit dan sihat. Selalu ada family time dsb.
Translated Text:
All of that can probably be improved if you look less at your smartphone.

A good Muslim wakes up early for tahajjud. They pray in congregation in the mosque.

His life is organized. The work is tip top. Read books diligently. Always exercise. Physically fit and healthy. There is always family time etc.

Text:
Benda ni sukar nak ubah tanpa ada kemahuan yang kuat.

Bila tahu badan mulai tak fit, usaha jaga makan dan bersenam. Bila tahu selalu bangun lewat, usaha tidur awal dsb.

Bila hidup teratur dan ada disiplin, masa kita takkan terbazir sia-sia setiap hari. Semuanya bermanfaat.
Translated Text:
These things are difficult to change without a strong will.

When you know your body is not fit, try to eat and exercise. When you know you always wake up late, try to sleep early etc.

When life is organized and there is discipline, our time will not be wasted every day. Everything is useful.

Text: @acaiijawe Terasa ke lubuk hati. Terima kasih atas nasihat tuan. Betul, saya mengaku. Disiplin saya ssngat lemah. Hari ni usaha utk solat, esok nya tinggal lagi. Pastu cuba lagi, pastu tinggal lagi... Saya sampai buntu sekarang..

Text:
J&T ni memang laju growth.

Average hari-hari biasa kat satu Hub Selangor South ni, mereka uruskan 80k parcels/day. Kalau waktu SALES macam 9.9 Shopee+Lazada, parcel cecah 250-300k sehari.

Total pekerja sama 100+. Itu baru 1 hub. Kat area sini je ada 4 Hub. Belum negeri lain.
Translated Text:
J&T is indeed a growth rate.

On an average day at this Selangor South Hub, they handle 80k parcels/day. During SALES, it's like 9.9 Shopee + Lazada, small parcels of 250-300k a day.

Total workers equal 100+. That's just 1 hub. There are 4 hubs in this area. Not yet another country.

Text:
Bayangkan >250,000 parcel sehari nak uruskan.

Tinggi parcel sampai ke syiling. Memang takde siapa yang baca nota-nota seperti:

"Abang J&T, tolong jangan campak dll"

Supervisor local. Pekerja hampir semua foreigner (India, Pakistan, Bangla, Myanmar dll). Mereka rajin.

Itulah.
Translated Text:
Imagine >250,000 parcels a day to manage.

The height of the parcel is up to a coin. Indeed, no one reads notes like:

"Brother J&T, please don't get measles etc"

Local supervisor. The workers are almost all foreigners (Indian, Pakistani, Bangla, Myanmar etc.). They are diligent.

That's it.

Text:
Sebab guna manpower yang ramai, pengurusan J&T masih banyak kena diperbaiki untuk bersaing peringkat global.

Kalau boleh dibuat perbandingan syarikat courier J&T vs DHL.

DHL tu macam flagship iPhone/Samsung. J&T tu macam smartphone Android mid-range lower tier camtu.
Translated Text:
Because of the large number of manpower, J&T's management still needs a lot of improvement to compete globally.

If possible, compare the courier company J&T vs DHL.

DHL is like the iPhone/Samsung flagship. The J&T is like a mid-range lower tier Android smartphone.

Text:
Siapa monitor harga ayam, sebenarnya dah naik lebih RM2 dalam tempoh 2 bulan.

Peniaga pun tak boleh buat apa sebab katanya pemborong jual mahal.

Pemborong dapat dari penternak mahal. Kata penternak, harga dedak naik 🤷🏽‍♂️.

Satu-satunya cara turunkan harga, kurangkan makan ayam. https://t.co/fHHEA0XOlI
Translated Text:
Who monitors the price of chicken, it has actually gone up by more than RM2 within 2 months.

Dealers can't do anything because they say wholesalers are expensive.

Wholesalers can get it from expensive breeders. Farmers say, the price of bran is going up 🤷🏽‍♂️.

The only way to lower the price, eat less chicken. https://t.co/fHHEA0XOlI

Text: @acaiijawe Pegi pasar tani ahad lepas dia jual seekor RM23/RM25. So sekilo RM10 tue memang realiti
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Went to the farmer's market last Sunday and sold one for RM23/RM25. So RM10 per kilo is a reality

Text:
@FirdausArRazi Betul tu. Sebenarnya memang masuk berita malam tadi. Katanya ada yang jual sampai RM10.50/kg kat Terengganu.

Risau harga kedai naik. Bila dah naik memang susah nak turun walau harga ayam turun semula.
Translated Text:
@FirdausArRazi That's right. It was actually in the news last night. He said some people sell up to RM10.50/kg in Terengganu.

Worried about the price of the store going up. Once it goes up, it's hard to go down even if the price of chicken goes down again.

Text: @amirez Betul. Memang mahal sangat tu kalau seekor dah cecah RM30.

Text:
@acaiijawe Ye betul, kenaikan harga ayam mentah dan telur tak dapat dielakkan sebab harga dedak naik baru2 ni. 

Most penternak terpaksa naikkan harga. Kerajaan perlu juga memantau harga dedak krn kenaikannya akan memberi impak kepada rantai makanan yg lain.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Yes, it's true, the increase in the price of raw chicken and eggs is inevitable because the price of bran has just gone up.

Most breeders have to raise prices. The government also needs to monitor the price of bran because the increase will have an impact on other food chains.

Text: @teenteahah Setuju. Sebab ia dah jadi macam lauk asasi kita, rasanya memang kerajaan kena buat sesuatu tentang harga dedak yang naik mendadak baru2 ni. Lebih 30% tak silap.
Translated Text: @teenteahah Agreed. Because it has become our staple dish, it seems that the government should do something about the sudden rise in the price of bran. More than 30% is not wrong.

Text:
@acaiijawe Betol tuan. Kami peniaga ayam frozen halal ni pun risau je kene naikkan harga walaupun harga kami fix. Dari dedak sampailah ke jual ayam ni, lokal semua boleh buat. 

Tp dengarnya, tokey2 besar terpaksa cover rugi waktu pandemik ni. Tu yg duk asyik naik je tu 😓
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Correct sir. We as halal frozen chicken traders are worried about raising the price even though our price is fixed. From bran to selling chicken, everything can be done locally.

But listen, the big tokeys have to cover losses during this pandemic. That's what you enjoy riding 😓

Text: @aishzq Allahuakbar. Semoga dipermudahkan urusan perniagaannya tuan 💪.
Translated Text: @aishzq Allahu akbar. May his business affairs be made easier sir 💪.

Text: @acaiijawe @FadzilahMamat Harga ayam naik ni rasa mcm org tengah yg control harga,kerajaan patut boleh panggil semua pihak terlibat berapakah sebenarnya harga ladang sebelum transport ke penjual2/pasar2.Dari situ dah tahu dah harga ni sapa yg control
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @FadzilahMamat The price of chicken is going up, it feels like the middle man who controls the price, the government should be able to call all the parties involved what is the real price of the farm before transporting it to the sellers/markets. From there I know who controls the price

Text:
@suhaimi_amy7 @FadzilahMamat Tapi kali ni katanya disebabkan harga makanan ayam yg memang diimport dari luar. Negara kita tak mampu hasilkan jagung dan bahan makanan untuk buat dedak dlm skala besar macam USA/Eropah.

Kenaikan dikatakan sampai 30% disebabkan pelbagai faktor. Jadi kos tersebut pass kpd kita.
Translated Text:
@suhaimi_amy7 @FadzilahMamat But this time he said it was due to the price of chicken food which was actually imported from outside. Our country is not able to produce corn and food to make bran on a large scale like the USA/Europe.

The increase is said to be up to 30% due to various factors. So the cost passes to us.

Translated Text: @feistysherr Bought it at the wholesale market yesterday for RM9.90/kg 😭. In the middle of the commotion of farmers who raise prices.

Text:
Tolakan Asas (Had Kifayah) dalam jadual tu ambil kira:

• Tolakan untuk diri sendiri.
• Isteri
• KWSP 11%

Untuk full jadual potongan gaji (sehingga gaji RM15k) boleh rujuk sini :

https://t.co/WdiixFFqBv

Kaedah Tanpa Tolakan (gaji kasar x 2.5%) sesuai untuk ORANG KAYA.
Translated Text:
The Basic Allowance (Had Kifayah) in the table takes into account:

• Push for yourself.
• Wife
• EPF 11%

For the full schedule of salary deductions (up to a salary of RM15k) you can refer here:

https://t.co/WdiixFFqBv

The No Deduction Method (gross salary x 2.5%) is suitable for RICH PEOPLE.

Text:
Sebab?

Kadar zakat mereka 2.5% tu jauh lebih rendah dari income tax mereka 15-30%. Jadi ramai tak perlu nak buat tolakan lain.

Untuk kiraan lebih tepat, digalakkan untuk guna Kalkulator Zakat Pendapatan ini:

https://t.co/JWgzq8HWfX
Translated Text:
Why?

Their zakat rate of 2.5% is much lower than their income tax of 15-30%. So many do not need to make another push.

For a more accurate calculation, it is recommended to use this Income Zakat Calculator:

https://t.co/JWgzq8HWfX

Text:
Bagi nak buat BAYARAN ZAKAT boleh bayar ONLINE kat sini : 

https://t.co/dCh3gP5d9S

Asas : Kalau anda dah dikenakan tax, sebenarnya anda dah WAJIB bayar zakat.

Sama macam tax, jawapan “Saya Tidak Tahu” tidak melepaskan kewajipan anda untuk mengeluarkannya.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
If you want to make ZAKAT PAYMENT, you can pay ONLINE here:

https://t.co/dCh3gP5d9S

Basic: If you have been taxed, you are actually OBLIGATED to pay zakat.

Just like taxes, the answer "I don't know" does not release your obligation to issue it.

That's it.

Text:
*Update.

• Jadual ini hanya sekadar panduan. Kena guna Kalkulator Zakat untuk dapatkan jumlah zakat kita yang lebih tepat.

• Warna oren tu, besar kemungkinan TIDAK dikenakan zakat jika gunakan kalkulator zakat.

• Pendapatan adalah termasuk elaun, OT, tips dsb.

*Update.

• This table is just a guide. Have to use the Zakat Calculator to get a more accurate amount of our zakat.

• The orange color, there is a high probability that you will NOT be charged zakat if you use the zakat calculator.

• Income includes allowance, OT, tips etc.

Text:
@acaiijawe 1. Katakan saya lelaki bujang, gaji RM2000 sebelum tolak kwsp, zakat perlu byr 53 @ 20?

2. Jika saya bekerja di KL tapi menetap di Selangor, zakat negeri mana yg patut saya byr? Mcm mana pula zakat harta/saham/ etc?
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe 1. Let's say I'm a single man, salary RM2000 before deducting kwsp, zakat should be byr 53 @ 20?

2. If I work in KL but live in Selangor, which state zakat should I pay? How about zakat on property/shares/etc?

Text:
@HanafiRoz 1. Gaji RM2000 belum kena zakat tuan. Gaji RM2001 baru dikenakan zakat. Jumlah yang sepatutnya RM20 sahaja.

2. Bayar ditempat kita bekerja. Dalam kes ini afdhal bayar di KL. Begitu juga harta lain yang kita ada sama ada saham, bisnes, emas dll.
Translated Text:
@HanafiRoz 1. The salary of RM2000 has not been subject to zakat sir. The new salary of RM2001 is subject to zakat. The amount should be RM20 only.

2. Pay where we work. In this case afdhal pay in KL. The same goes for other assets that we have, whether stocks, businesses, gold, etc.

Text: @acaiijawe Tuan, sekiranya saya kurang jelas akan penjelasan pembayaran zakat pendapatan ini & terus ke kaunter PPZ, adakah mereka akan membantu saya dalam hal ini? Bolehkah saya terus membuat pembayaran di kaunter? Terima kasih.

Text:
@adiburhan Boleh je tuan. Diaorang akan bantu A-Z percuma. Boleh juga buat pembayaran terus di cawangan tersebut.

Cuma disebabkan pandemik ni, memang kena book dulu untuk hadir sebab nak elak kesesakan dan ramai orang. Tapi biasanya, book harini, esok boleh datang.
Translated Text:
@adiburhan Yes, sir. He will help you A-Z for free. You can also pay directly at the branch.

It's just that due to this pandemic, you have to book in advance to attend because you want to avoid congestion and many people. But usually, book today, you can come tomorrow.

Text: @acaiijawe tuan, kalau ahli sukan yg mendapat insentif kemenangan setiap kali pertandingan bagaimana pula ? sebagai contoh, jumlah setahun insentif dalam RM30K-40K (diberi sekali/ 2 kali ketika penerimaan insentif) gaji tiada, hanya elauan RM2K sebulan. wajib bayar zakat juga ke ?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe sir, what about sportsmen who get incentives to win every competition? for example, annual amount of incentive in RM30K-40K (given once/ 2 times when receiving incentive) no salary, only allowance of RM2K per month. Is it obligatory to pay zakat too?

Text:
@Suuuuee__ Kalau begitu biasanya ia dikira sebagai pendapatan. Bila cukup 12 buan (haul), boleh total kan semua jumlah pendapatan/bonus/insentif tersebut dan buat kiraan zakat.

Total tersebut tolak keperluan asas dulu. Kalau baki lebih dari Nisab (RM19,610), maka kena keluarkan zakat 2.5%.
Translated Text:
@Suuuuee__ In that case it is usually counted as income. When 12 months (haul) are enough, you can total all the income/bonus/incentives and calculate the zakat.

The total minus the basic needs first. If the balance is more than the Nisab (RM19,610), then 2.5% zakat must be paid.

Text:
@repeace_88 Betul. Ia lebih afdhal. Tapi bayar kat mana-mana masih tetap sah. Begitu juga bayar kepada adik beradik, saudara mara atau jiran yang miskin. 

Tapi lebih baik gunakan bahagian sedekah kita jika nak tolong mereka. Cuma boleh gunakan portion zakat kita juga.
Translated Text:
@repeace_88 Right. It is more afdhal. But paying anywhere is still valid. Similarly pay to siblings, relatives or neighbors who are poor.

But it is better to use our charity if you want to help them. You can only use our zakat portion as well.

Text:
@badrulasri Mana-mana tambahan duit dan pendapatan yang menambahkan kekayaan kita pada tahun semasa, maka ia termasuk dalam kiraan zakat.

Contoh bonus, dapat takaful, harta pusaka, menang hadiah, dapat geran dsb.

Examples of bonuses, getting takaful, inheritance, winning prizes, getting grants etc.

Text: @acaiijawe Tuan, kalau isteri yang sudah terima nafkah drpd suami dan dia bekerja sendiri (penterjemah), untuk kiraan zakat peribadinya, masih perlu tolak keperluan diri yang tahunan tu juga ke?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sir, if the wife who has received alimony from her husband and she is self-employed (translator), for the calculation of her personal zakat, does she still need to deduct the annual self-requirements?

Text:
@bachabooks Untuk isteri, memang ada tolakan untuk diri sendiri juga. Tapi tidak ada tolakan untuk suami (seperti kiraan di pihak suami). Melainkan jika isteri ada ketua keluarga.

Untuk anak, jika suami telah buat tolakan asas, maka isteri tidak perlu buat tolakan 2 kali.
Translated Text:
@bachabooks For the wife, there is indeed a push for yourself as well. But there is no pushback for the husband (like counting on the husband's side). Unless the wife is the head of the family.

For children, if the husband has done the basic push, then the wife does not need to do push twice.

Text:
@chenozainordin Ia menambahkan kekayaan kita pada tahun tersebut. Jadi memang perlu dikeluarkan zakat.

Kiraanya sama iaitu darab dengan 2.5%. Ia tambahan dari zakat pendapatan yang kita telah keluarkan pada tahun semasa. Maka tidak perlu buat tolakan asas individu 2 kali.
Translated Text:
@chenozainordin It added to our wealth that year. So it is necessary to issue zakat.

It's the same, which is multiplied by 2.5%. It is in addition to the income zakat that we have paid in the current year. So there is no need to make individual basic deductions twice.

Text:
@MShafiz3571 Semua ulama' kotemporari seluruh dunia dan jawatankuasa fatwa semua negeri di Malaysia dah wajibkan zakat pendapatan atas dalil-dalil yang ada.

Kalau nak pegang sebab guna dalil tu tiada masalah, cuma bukan untuk sebarkan kepada orang awam.
Translated Text:
@MShafiz3571 All contemporary scholars around the world and fatwa committees of all states in Malaysia have made zakat income obligatory based on the evidence.

If you want to hold it because you use the argument, there is no problem, just not to spread it to the public.

Text: @acaiijawe Zakat Pendapatan vs Zakat Simpanan mana lebih berat kene buat? Ke dua dua kene buat? Maaf saya kurang phm
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Income Zakat vs Savings Zakat which is heavier? What are you doing here? Sorry I lack phm

Text:
@FireLordZuko13 Dua-dua memang wajib tuan. Ada masa kita kena Zakat Simpanan sahaja. Ada masa kena zakat pendapatan sahaja.

Ada masa kita kena bayar dua-dua jenis harta tersebut bila kedua-duanya mencapai tahap minimum syarat zakat. Sebab ia menggambarkan kekayaan kita pada tahun tersebut.
Translated Text:
@FireLordZuko13 Both are mandatory sir. There are times when we only have Zakat on Savings. There are times when you have to pay zakat only on income.

There are times when we have to pay both types of property when both reach the minimum level of zakat requirements. Because it describes our wealth that year.

Text: @acaiijawe Assalam Tuan, kawan saya dia tak bayar zakat, tapi tiap tiap bulan dia sedekah duit kat masjid niat di hati kira macam zakat, kalau buat macamni dia kira macamana yer ? Dia berniaga.

Text:
@fawwazabas Itu sebenarnya bukan zakat. Lelagi jika tiada niat zakat. Kewajipan zakat belum terlepas dan beliau masih perlu tunaikan kewajipan zakat.

Sebab zakat ni ada syarat tertentu dan diberikan kepada pihak tertentu. Duit masjid tu ada pelbagai kegunaan, bukan kepada asnaf sahaja.
Translated Text:
@fawwazabas That is not actually zakat. If there is no intention of zakat. The zakat obligation has not been missed and he still needs to fulfill the zakat obligation.

Because this zakat has certain conditions and is given to certain parties. The money of the mosque has many uses, not only for the asnaf.

Text: @acaiijawe tuan gaji kena khas  basic 2k ke atas atau campur ot bru kena zakat.. boleh beri pencerahan

Translated Text: @whoscaptain_ Salary including OT, allowances and others are also included in the pay slip. Gross salary.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau income dari business kena buat pendapatan juga atau boleh hanya zakat perniagaan? Dan kena tiap2 bulan atau boleh kumpul untuk satu tahun?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If you have income from business, do you have to make income as well or can you only give business zakat? And does it have to be every month or can it be collected for one year?

Text:
@miss_ichigo_ Bisnes sebaiknya bayar setahun selepas dapat figure setahun.

Kalau bisnes kecil-kecilan sesuai guna kiraan zakat pendapatan sahaja. Kalau bisnes yang proper ada penyata untung rugi, gunakan kiraan Zakat Perniagaan lebih tepat.
Translated Text:
@miss_ichigo_ Business should pay a year after getting a figure for a year.

If it's a small business, it's appropriate to use zakat on income only. If a proper business has a profit and loss statement, use the Business Zakat count more accurately.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau tolakan kwsp 9% boleh pakai kiraan yang sama ke?

Translated Text: @samyeji This needs to be adjusted a little, sir. But don't run away in large numbers. Only RM1-2 difference.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau saya punya pendapatan base on komisen, and tak tetap, kadang lebih 2k kadang kurang dari 1.5k . So kena ikut nilai tahunan ke mcm mana tuan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If I have income based on commission, and not fixed, sometimes more than 2k sometimes less than 1.5k. So how do you have to follow the annual value, sir?

Translated Text: @irfan_naimm If your income is not fixed, the best method is to follow your annual calculations 😊👌

Translated Text: @acaiijawe Greetings sir. Is it better to follow this schedule or use the calculator provided by the state where we want to pay zakat?

Text: @acaiijawe @DrAnwarFazal Maaf bertanya, kiranya potongan zakat pendapatan ni dibayar per month/per year ya?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @DrAnwarFazal Sorry to ask, would this income zakat deduction be paid per month/per year?

Text:
@Laaqilafadhil @DrAnwarFazal Zakat sepatutnya bayar tahunan. Tapi kalau ada income setiap bulan, kita boleh jangka pendapatan tahunan lebih awal.

Ia mengurangkan beban bayar sekaligus dan di pihak institusi zakat dapat membantu lebih ramai asnaf setiap bulan.
Translated Text:
@Laaqilafadhil @DrAnwarFazal Zakat should be paid annually. But if there is income every month, we can expect annual income earlier.

It reduces the burden of paying at once and on the part of the zakat institution can help more asnaf every month.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe Counting on average... it is better to calculate according to each kifayah limit which is more accurate, especially the part of the property that has been zakat so that there is no zakat twice on the same property...

Translated Text: @rslnbkhri Correct. It is included in our annual income because it adds to our current wealth during the year.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe Hello sir, I work in France and near here, zakat is only counted as zakat on property that exceeds the nisab, there is no zakat on monthly income, if so, where is it?

Translated Text: @acaiijawe I have no income at all and only use my savings for expenses. Do I need to pay zakat for the savings?

Translated Text: @testing123123_1 Still charged if the savings exceed the nisab (RM19,610) at the end of the haul.

Text:
@acaiijawe Salam, Tuan.

Kalau saya ambil “Tanpa Tolakan”, saya perlu bayar. 

Tapi kalau “Dengan Tolakan”, saya tak perlu bayar.

Jadi yg mana satu yg afdhal dan tepat untuk saya ambil ya?
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Greetings, Sir.

If I take "No Rejection", I have to pay.

But if "With Push", I don't have to pay.

So which one is the right one for me to take?

Text: @itsbelleunicorn Salam, yang lebih tepat adalah 'Dengan Tolakan' tersebut.
Translated Text: @itsbelleunicorn Greetings, that's more accurate 'With Push'.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau bayar lebih ada apa2 masalah ke tuan
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If you pay more, is there any problem sir

Text: @acaiijawe Mengikut pembacaan sy zakat dibayar mengikut kalender hijrah hanya 2.5% tetapi apa sy belajar zakat dikenakan 2.557% kerana pertambahan 10 hari dari kalender Masihi , adakah betul ? 😅
Translated Text: @acaiijawe According to my reading, zakat is paid according to the hijrah calendar only 2.5% but what I learned is that zakat is charged 2.557% due to an increase of 10 days from the AD calendar, is that correct? 😅

Text: @HatiDipermainkn Ini kaedah yang paling tepat. 2.57% kalau gunakan kalender masihi. Namun 2.5% tersebut juga diterima dalam perbincangan fatwa berkaitan zakat.
Translated Text: @HatiDipermainkn This is the most accurate method. 2.57% if you still use the calendar. However, the 2.5% was also accepted in the discussion of fatwas related to zakat.

Text: @acaiijawe Pampasan hibah takaful kena zakat tak tuan?

Text:
@acaiijawe Salam.

Saya dah bekerja tapi on study leave. Gaji saya masih jalan dan saya ada income lain iaitu scholarship. So saya kena kira zakat include duit scholarship sekali ke?

@acaiijawe Greetings.

I have been working but on study leave. My salary is still going and I have another income which is a scholarship. So do I have to calculate zakat including scholarship money once?

Text:
@sminigee Salam. Ya, mana-mana pendapatan yang menambahkan kekayaan semasa kita pada tahun semasa, perlu dibuat kiraan zakat.

Kena zakat ataupun tidak itu, selepas calculation tersebut dilakukan.
Translated Text:
@sminigee Hello. Yes, any income that increases our current wealth in the current year, must be counted as zakat.

Zakat or not, after the calculation is done.

Text: @acaiijawe Salam dan selamat pagi, macam mana nak kira zakat untuk yang dapat duit pencen kwsp?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Greetings and good morning, how do you calculate zakat for those who receive pension money?

Text:
@ITS_BeanAWhile Salam tuan,

Untuk yang berusia 55 tahun. Ia dah jadi Simpanan sebab KWSP tersebut boleh dikeluarkan pada bila-bila masa. Ia dah milik sempurna.

Jadi kiraan zakatnya :

Baki akhir simpanan pada hujung haul x 2.5%
Translated Text:
@ITS_BeanAWhile Hello sir,

For those who are 55 years old. It has become a savings because the EPF can be withdrawn at any time. It belongs perfectly.

So the zakat count:

Final balance of savings at the end of the haul x 2.5%

Text: @acaiijawe Nak tanya, kalau pendapatan tak tetap untuk bujang macam mana ye? Contoh : bulan Ogos dapat gaji 1.8k, bulan Sept 2.2k . Kalau macam ni dikira macam mana pulak?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I want to ask, what if the income is not fixed for singles? Example: in August you get a salary of 1.8k, in September 2.2k. If this is how it is calculated?

Text:
@kesteno_ Kalau begini boleh buat kiraan pada akhir tahun tuan.

Kalau total pendapatan selepas tolak keperluan asas pada akhir tahun melebihi Nisab (RM19610) barulah dikenakan zakat 2.5%. Kalau kurang, masih belum wajib bayar zakat.
Translated Text:
@kesteno_ If this is the case, you can make a count at the end of the year, sir.

If the total income after deducting basic needs at the end of the year exceeds the Nisab (RM19610) then 2.5% zakat is charged. If less, it is still not obligatory to pay zakat.

Text: @acaiijawe Maaf bertanya. Bukan ke dia ikut nisab tahunan, kalau tak capai 19k+ setahun tak layak bayar.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sorry to ask. It's not that he follows the annual nisab, if he doesn't reach 19k+ a year he doesn't deserve to be paid.

Text:
@hattaalias Komisyen juga termasuk tuan dalam kiraan zakat tersebut walaupun jumlahnya turun naik.

Cara lain, komisyen kira pada akhir tahun dan darab 2.5% kemudian.
Translated Text:
@hattaalias The commission is also included in the zakat count even though the amount fluctuates.

Another way, the commission is calculated at the end of the year and multiplied by 2.5% later.

@eiman23x The most accurate thing is to use a zakat calculator. Perhaps only RM300 in zakat is obligatory.

Balance can pay tax. Or want to pay more, no problem. Intend for our past zakat or other zakat (gold, savings, shares etc.).

Text:
@theashlana Salam

Untuk makan gaji, kita dah buat tolakan asas (diri, anak, kwsp, nursery dll). Jadi tak perlu tolak lagi 2x utk zakat bisnes.

Jadi untuk bisnes, cara paling mudah.

Untung bersih = Selepas tolak modal, kos-kos berkaitan bisnes, bahan mentah dll.

So for business, the easiest way.

[Net profit x 2.5%]

Net profit = After deducting capital, business related costs, raw materials etc.

Text:
@husninaafiqah Sebaiknya buat kiraan pada penghujung tahun haul (contohnya Disember). Jika kurang daripada Nisab (RM19,610) maka tidak dikenakan zakat.

Jika lebih, maka kena zakat 2.5%
Translated Text:
@husninaafiqah It's best to do the count at the end of the haul year (for example December). If it is less than Nisab (RM19,610) then no zakat is charged.

If more, then 2.5% zakat is due

Text:
Selain sebab pengaruh rakan sebaya, kelebihan folding bike lipat 3 ni adalah saiznya yang kecil selepas dilipat.

Jadi mudah nak masukkan dalam kereta, naik LRT, naik lif dan paling penting tak perlukan ruang besar untuk simpan di rumah.

Sangat sesuai kalau duduk apartment. https://t.co/0QG1KXX5aR

Apart from the influence of peers, the advantage of this 3-fold folding bike is its small size after folding.

So it's easy to put in the car, take the LRT, take the elevator and most importantly it doesn't need a large space to store at home.

Very suitable for living in an apartment. https://t.co/0QG1KXX5aR

Text:
Benda camni kadangkala ada cerita disebaliknya yang kita tak tahu.

Bila melibatkan penagih dadah ni, walaupun semua bantuan makanan, tempat tinggal, utiliti dsb zakat dah bayar 100%, mereka masih AKAN MENCURI untuk membeli dadah.

Orang tak tahu akan nampak kasihan dan kejam.
Translated Text:
Things like this sometimes have a story behind them that we don't know.

When it comes to drug addicts, even if all the food aid, housing, utilities, etc. zakat have been paid 100%, they will still STEAL to buy drugs.

People who don't know will look pitiful and cruel.

Text:
Penagih ni, dia akan curi semua benda yang boleh dijual.

Kasut, basikal, motor, tong gas dan semua benda yg ada kat depan rumah dan belakang rumah. Seminggu 3-4 rumah kecurian barang.

Hidup semua tak tenteram.

Dia bukan tentang makanan, susu anak dsb seperti yang ramai sangka.
Translated Text:
This addict, he will steal everything that can be sold.

Shoes, bicycles, motorbikes, gas canisters and everything in front of the house and behind the house. A week 3-4 house theft of goods.

Life is not peaceful.

He is not about food, baby milk etc. as many people think.

Text:
Masalah asnaf yang jadi penagih tegar ni sesuatu yang sangat sukar diurus. Lelagi bila suami isteri penagih.

Seboleh-bolehnya takkan bagi bantuan tunai. Tapi mereka akan mencuri.

Cara terbaik memang masukkan ke pusat pemulihan (yang mungkin dah 10x mereka masuk).

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
The problem of asnaf who is a hardcore addict is something that is very difficult to manage. Especially when the husband and wife are addicts.

As much as possible will not give cash assistance. But they will steal.

The best way is to enter a rehabilitation center (which they may have been in 10 times).

That's it.

Text: @acaiijawe Benar bang, benar.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe That's right, right.

Text: @acaiijawe Masuk penagih dalam penjara pun takkan clean kan diorg. Keluar cari tokan dadah yang sama balik. Macam yang kita lihat di US kegagalan war on drugs.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Even if an addict goes to jail, he won't get clean, right? Go out and find the same drug store. As we see in the US, the failure of the war on drugs.

Text: @acaiijawe Sedih bila pihak masjid dicaci maki dgn hinaan makan duit derma tabung dan simpan duit sedekah.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe It's sad when the mosque is insulted and insulted by eating fund donations and keeping alms money.

Text:
@ilmaR_naifoS Ramai tak tahu perkara sebenar. Mereka cuma nampak jumlah RM40 tu sahaja dan hukum pihak yang report.

Sapa selalu berurusan dengan penagih ni akan faham perkara yang berlaku. Mungkin itu dah kerap sangat berlaku dan tiada cara lain nak bantu.
Translated Text:
@ilmaR_naifoS Many do not know the truth. They only see the amount of RM40 and the law of the reporting party.

Who always deals with this addict will understand what is happening. Maybe that has happened very often and there is no other way to help.

Text: @acaiijawe Ramai dah yang terlepas atau tak baca berita yang awal2 dilaporkan tu. Itupun perenggan terakhir disebutkan tertuduh positif dadah.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe A lot of people missed or didn't read the news that was reported earlier. Even the last paragraph mentioned that the accused tested positive for drugs.

Text: @AtikaNour Yup. Dan terus hukum dan kutuk beramai-ramai. Ada banyak benda kena dipertimbangkan dalam kes begini.
Translated Text: @AtikaNour Yup. And continue to judge and curse en masse. There are many things to consider in this case.

Text: @acaiijawe Pengerusi masjid member kampung saya ustaz. Dia mengadu dlm grup whatsapp kami jenuh juga melayan kes mcm ni. Hehehehe. Cuma dia terkilan la jenis komen melulu. Habis pakat maki dia dan ajk masjid.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Chairman of the mosque members of my village ustaz. He complained in the whatsapp group that we are tired of dealing with cases like this. Hehehehe. It's just that he's upset about the kind of reckless comments. After swearing at him and going to the mosque.

Text:
@ciksepul Allahuakbar. Kat Selangor pun sebenarnya banyak kes camni tuan 😅.

Nak buat camne, sabar je lah. Sebab ramai yang tak tahu confirm akan salahkan kita. Benda tu kekadang pun kena jaga aib asnaf juga.
Translated Text:
@ciksepul Allahuakbar. Even in Selangor, there are actually many cases like this sir 😅.

What do you want to do, just be patient. Because many people who don't know confirm will blame us. Sometimes you have to take care of the shame of the asnaf too.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau betul OKT ialah seorang penagih bermakna laporan media itu tak tepatlah. Media sepatutnya sudah dengar bacaan fakta kes di mahkamah.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If it's true that OKT is an addict, that means the media report is incorrect. The media should have heard the reading of the facts of the case in court.

Text:
@zakwan_khidzir Ramai penagih dadah pun memang hadapi pertuduhan jenayah dan kena jalani pemulihan di pusat serenti juga.

Cuma cara media melaporkan tu memang mengundang orang kecam pihak masjid.
Translated Text:
@zakwan_khidzir Many drug addicts also face criminal charges and have to go through rehabilitation at the Serenti center as well.

It's just that the way the media reports it invites people to criticize the mosque.

Text: @acaiijawe Betul acai.. imam masjid tu kawan aku dah bgtau.. bkn soal duit tp soal utk beri pemulihan.. ramai kecam org masjid tanpa soal selidik terlebih dahulu
Translated Text: @acaiijawe It's true acai.. the imam of the mosque is a friend of mine who told me.. it's not about money but about giving rehabilitation.. many people criticize mosque people without a questionnaire first

Text: @peijan Itu yang sedihnya peijan. Memang zaman sekarang kecam dulu baru selidik betul ke tak. Klau dah salah diam dan tak perlu minta maaf.
Translated Text: @peijan That's sad peijan. It's true that in today's age, criticize first before investigating whether it's true or not. Klau was wrong to keep quiet and there is no need to apologize.

Text: @acaiijawe Tula, susah betul netizen nak tabayyun

Text:
@acaiijawe Penagih ni patot diberikan amaran pertama selepas masuk pusat pemulihan.

Kalau lepas keluar pusat pemulihan tapi masih lagi menagih dan membuat aktiviti tidak bermoral, patot tembak je sampai mati.

Penagih ni mcm lalat. Tak menganggu. Tapi merosakkan. 

Solusi dia, tembak je.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe This addict is given the first warning after entering the rehabilitation center.

If you leave the rehabilitation center but are still collecting money and doing immoral activities, just shoot them to death.

Addicts are like flies. Don't bother. But damaging.

His solution, just shoot.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe The news should also play a role, I already know that people read the headlines, they should continue to write "addicts arrested for stealing mosque funds"... but that's it, news is also business...

Text:
Kemudian Allah menyeru kpd ahli syurga:

"Itulah syurga yang telah diwariskan kepada kamu. Kerana apa yang telah kamu kerjakan (di dunia)”

Semua perkara ini disebut dalam Hadis Muslim.

Amalan soleh dan kebaikan mendekatkan kita ke syurga. Dosa mendekatkan kita ke neraka. https://t.co/FrDIQzOYKF
Translated Text:
Then God called to the people of heaven:

"That is the paradise that has been inherited to you. Because of what you have done (in the world)"

All these things are mentioned in the Muslim Hadith.

Good deeds and good deeds bring us closer to heaven. Sin brings us closer to hell. https://t.co/FrDIQzOYKF

Text: @acaiijawe Baca tweet ni buat saya risau kecut perut tiba rase takut. Bila baca 'selama lamanya'. Selalu elakkan diri dari terdetik apa berlaku selepas syurga dan neraka. Kerana setiap bermula akan berakhir. Takut sangat2 bila terfikir.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Reading this tweet made me feel sick and scared. When read 'forever'. Always avoid thinking about what happens after heaven and hell. Because every beginning will end. Very scared when I think about it.

Text: @acaiijawe Nabi Muhammad saw, bersabda...orang tua tak boleh masuk syurga.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Prophet Muhammad, peace be upon him, said...old people cannot enter heaven.

Text: @acaiijawe Ada tak buku/kitab yang boleh kita baca dan dapat feel bayangan di syurga?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Is there a book that we can read and feel the shadow in heaven?

Text: @acaiijawe Tapi manusia seringkali terlupa bahkan terus mengejar dunia yang fana ini.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe But humans often forget to even keep chasing this mortal world.

Text: @acaiijawe Masalahnya ramai yang dah 'mensyurgakan' dunia ini... semoga kita dipelihara dari terus hanyut dalam arus keasyikan duniawi.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The problem is that many people have 'paradised' this world... may we be protected from drifting in the current of worldly preoccupation.

Text: @acaiijawe @jihaaaaf Nak tanya betul ke nanti bila dekat syurga kita daj tak ingat apa apa dekat dunia, even parents pon? Ke saya salah fakta??
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @jihaaaaf I want to ask the truth, when we are near heaven, we don't remember what is near the world, even parents? Am I wrong??

Text: @acaiijawe @farisha_idris Allahu, menusuk kalbu.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @farisha_idris Allahu, pierce the heart.

Text: @acaiijawe Hm.. Terasa sabar dengan dugaan tu rasa ringan lepas baca ni. Hebat Allah menduga kita kan, sebab Syurga untuk mereka yang sabar. Allahu..😭
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Hm.. Feeling patient with that guess feels light after reading this. It's great that God has guessed us, because Heaven is for those who are patient. God..😭

Text:
Antara alasannya; terlalu sunyi, aktiviti masjid tak semeriah kat bandar, pasaraya jauh, takde kawan dsb.

Lelagi kalau tinggal berdua suami isteri je. Anak semua kerja kat bandar.

Sebenarnya mereka dah sebati dengan cara hidup kat sini. Kampung tu cuma memori masa kecil mereka.
Translated Text:
Among the reasons; too quiet, mosque activities are not as lively as in the city, supermarkets are far away, no friends etc.

As long as you live together as husband and wife. Children all work in the city.

In fact, they have become integrated with the way of life here. The village is just a memory of their childhood.

Text: @acaiijawe Betul sebab dah sebati tu payah sebenarnya. Tu kadang-kadang nak pesan dengan orang muda jangan sembang lebat lah😅.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe That's right because it's really hard to mix. Sometimes you want to message young people, don't chat too much😅.

Text: @acaiijawe masjid ar rahah nie mmg selesa, itikaf sambil tunggu anak balik sekolah 3 jam pun best
Translated Text: @acaiijawe this ar rahah mosque is really comfortable, itikaf while waiting for the children to return to school for 3 hours is the best

Text: @acaiijawe Betul .. kat kampung masa tu ramai yang kita kenal dah tak ada .. yang ada kenangan masa kecil.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe That's right .. in the village at that time many people we knew are no longer there .. those who have childhood memories.

Text: @acaiijawe Setuju... Skrg blk kg pon da x de kawan... Nk ajak ngeteh pon ssh....
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I agree... I'm not sure what to do with my friend... I want to invite you to tea....

Text: @acaiijawe Sy masa duduk cheras dulu masjid sangat aktif dgn aktiviti. Sekarang pindah duduk pedalaman rasa beza sangat. Cuma tenang dan sunyi agak mendamaikan.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sy, when I was sitting in cheras, the mosque was very active with activities. Now moving to the interior feels very different. Just calm and quiet is quite peaceful.

Text: @acaiijawe Setuju sgt ni. Ayah ibu sy pencen, last kerja Di Putrajaya. Balik duduk sebulan, last2 decide nk kembali duduk di rumah Putrajaya Sbb surau belakang rumah, meriah, jiran2 semua best. Setakat bercucuk tanam, boleh sgt je di ruangan tanah yg Ada
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Totally agree. My mother and father are pensioners, last worked in Putrajaya. Returned to sit for a month, finally decided to return to the house in Putrajaya because the surau behind the house is lively, the neighbors are all the best. As far as farming, you can do it in the available land

Text:
@acaiijawe saya masih berjiwa kampung begitu juga isteri. kampung sy tinggalan arwah toknenek jarang ada org bermalam, kecuali musim raya. 

dulu sy dan isteri sebulan sekali balik, cuti 3hari.  sy potong rumput isteri kutip hasil boleh diambil. anak² berlari atas dan turun bawah.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe I still have a village soul and so does my wife. In the village where the late Toknenek was left, there are rarely people who spend the night, except during Eid.

My wife and I used to go back once a month, 3 days off. I mow my wife's grass and collect the results, which can be taken. children run up and down.

Text: @acaiijawe iya. benar terasa itu.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe yes. really feels that.

Text: @acaiijawe Ayah lepas pencen balik kg terus buntu. Kawan xde, sedara belah ayah somhow x suka. Terus down sekejap. Tp nak keja balik xleh dah. Nasib baik sedara belah mak okey buat kawan baru leh asimilasi idup kat kg. Kesian gak
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Dad retired and went back to the dead end. Friend xde, my father is divided somhow x like. Keep going down for a while. But I want to come back. Fortunately, my mother is okay with making new friends and assimilating her life here. It's a pity

Text:
@acaiijawe Apa rasional nya pindah ke kampung lepas dah bersara?

Mak ayah boleh jadi dah dijemput ilahi, kawan2 zaman muda dulu pun berkelana 

Dia macam kena mula daripada bawah semula, pastu tinggalkan semua gaya hidup bandar

Part kemeriahan masjid tu bergantung pada tempat juga
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe What is the rationale for moving to the village after retirement?

My parents may have been invited by God, my friends from my youth also traveled

He seems to have to start from the bottom, then leave all the city lifestyle

Part of the excitement of the mosque depends on the place as well

Translated Text: @acaiijawe @410aries Some people like to sit down. Some people like to live in the city. Don't forget your origin. Mrk2 who has gone... no matter where you are👍

Text:
Nasihat aku, bab dapur ni better kita serahkan je kepada isteri. Ikut taste dan design kesukaan mereka.

Mereka yang akan berada lama di dapur. Penting untuk mereka gembira ketika memasak.

Suami ni penuhi je sebaik yang kita mampu. Invest sekali je untuk 10-20 tahun. Berbaloi.
Translated Text:
My advice, we better leave the kitchen to the wife. Follow their favorite taste and design.

Those who will be in the kitchen for a long time. It is important for them to be happy while cooking.

This husband fulfills it as best as we can. Invest once for 10-20 years. Worth it.

Text:
Kita semua tak tahu bagaimana dan bila kita akan mati. Mungkin dalam masa terdekat.

Tapi kita semua nakkan kematian yang baik.

Mudah-mudahan bila mati nanti kita sedang dalam mengingat Allah, dosa-dosa telah diampunkan dan Allah tutup semua aib kita semasa hidup, Ameen!
Translated Text:
We all do not know how and when we will die. Maybe in the near future.

But we all want a good death.

Hopefully when we die, we will be remembering Allah, our sins have been forgiven and Allah will cover all our shame during life, Ameen!

Text: @acaiijawe Betul. Sepupu isteri saya baru meninggal pagi tadi. Terjatuh dari katil. Bangun pagi2, si isteri tengok suami ada di sebelah bawah katil. Sudah pergi mengadap ilahi. Tak disangka2. Mati itu pasti. Bersediakah kita?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Right. My wife's cousin just died this morning. Fell out of bed. Waking up in the morning, the wife saw that her husband was at the bottom of the bed. Already went to face the divine. Unexpectedly. Death is certain. Are we ready?

Text:

Akan datang, bila L5 autonomy available, kereta boleh handle 100% keadaan tanpa human supervision.

Ia mungkin berlaku dalam hayat kita ni. Tesla target end 2021. https://t.co/MxUSYY92I2

From one angle it may make people lazy.

But this technology has been proven to help reduce human error.

In the future, when L5 autonomy is available, the car can handle 100% of the situation without human supervision.

Text:
Lepas kerja berat atau bersalin, mereka minum untuk tambah tenaga.

TAPI.

Bila dijual kormisal, mereka buat versi yang 'kaw'. 20-50 helai daun dalam satu bekas. Kandungan mitragynine terlalu tinggi. 

Sebab tu mabuk & ketagih.

Semua yg berlebihan pasti memudaratkan.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
After hard work or childbirth, they drink to gain energy.

BUT.

When it is sold separately, they make a 'kaw' version. 20-50 leaves in one container. The mitragynine content is too high.

That's why drunk & addicted

Everything in excess is definitely harmful.

That's it.

Text:
@acaiijawe Air rebusan daun ni boleh kurangkan sakit gout dan bacaan gula dalam darah. Petua ni dapat dari seorang pekebun di Perlis. Tiap pagi sebelum turun kebun dia minum.

Yang jadi merapu ni bila campur air ketum dengan benda2 lain.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe The decoction of these leaves can reduce gout pain and blood sugar readings. This tip is from a gardener in Perlis. Every morning before going down to the garden he drinks.

What becomes raspy is when you mix ketum water with other things.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe A policeman once told me that this village scientist is going to test the modified ketum with lizards. Catch the lizard, give the lizard a drink. If the lizard lives, pass. If the lizard dies, do something else. Power not power.

Text:
Diampunkan dosa ni sesuatu yang sangat besar. Sebab kita semua pasti melakukan dosa. Pasti!

Allah bagi jalan keluar untuk hapuskan dosa-dosa tersebut.

Caranya dengan istighfar, taubat, sabar dengan penyakit dsb.

Puasa Asyura ini juga satu cara hapuskan dosa dengan ibadah.
Translated Text:
Being forgiven is a very big thing. Because we all sin. Definitely!

God gives a way out to remove those sins.

The way is with istighfar, repentance, patience with illness etc.

This Ashura fast is also a way to remove sins with worship.

Text:
Dalam tazkirah tadi juga, kata ustaz tingkatan puasa Muharram ini:

1. Puasa Muharram seluruhnya
2. Puasa 10 hari awal Muharram
3. Puasa 9, 10 & 11 Muharram
4. Puasa 9 & 10 Muharram atau 10 & 11 Muharram
5. Puasa 10 Muharram sahaja
Translated Text:
In the tazkirah earlier, the teacher of this Muharram fasting level said:

1. The entire Muharram fast
2. Fasting for the first 10 days of Muharram
3. Fasting 9, 10 & 11 Muharram
4. Fasting 9 & 10 Muharram or 10 & 11 Muharram
5. Fasting on 10 Muharram only

Text:
Apa dia ingat kitorang takde berhubung dan bekerjasama sesama pusat zakat ke nak tipu camtu?

Merayu-rayu buat ayat sedih dan buat cerita palsu (anak sakit, suami mati). Padahal anak dan suami elok je sihat.

Nak dengar luahan mereka boleh, tapi nak percaya tu selepas ada bukti.
Translated Text:
Does he remember that we don't communicate and work together with other zakat centers to cheat like that?

Pleading to make sad sentences and make up false stories (child sick, husband dead). Although the children and husband are healthy.

You can listen to what they say, but you want to believe it after there is evidence.

Text:
Ada sesetengah pegawai zakat yang dah berhadapan dengan asnaf 15-20 tahun.

Mereka dah develop skill nak tahu orang tu betul-betul susah ataupun menipu.

Dengar cerita 15 minit, pastu tanya key soalan penting, ceritanya dah berbeza dan berubah-ubah. Coraknya sama je.
Translated Text:
There are some zakat officials who have been dealing with asnaf for 15-20 years.

They have developed the skill to know if the person is really difficult or cheating.

Listen to the 15-minute story, then ask key important questions, the story is different and changing. The pattern is the same.

Aku bersyukur alhamdulillah LZS beri bantuan sewa rumah...
"nikmat apa lagi yang kau dustakan"
Terima kasih pembayar2 zakat dan juga @zakatselangor
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe When the heart is never grateful...then that's what happens..
I am grateful to God that LZS gave me help with renting a house...
"what other pleasures are you denying"
Thank you zakat payers and also @zakatselangor

Text: @acaiijawe Kufur nikmat ni
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Kufr this blessing

Text: @acaiijawe Thanks kepada Pusat Zakat yang bersungguh2 mmbntu asnaf yg memerlukan. I was once penerima zakat. Now my turn utk jd pembayar zakat. 💪 Moga terus tabah iA..
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Thanks to the Zakat Center for helping those in need. I was once a recipient of zakat. Now it's my turn to be a zakat payer. 💪 May you continue to persevere iA..

Text:
@acaiijawe bagi saya , patutnya zakat tolong 6 bulan pertama sahaja . pada masa yang sama , carikan kerja untuk dia untuk sara hidup keluarga . benda last yang boleh tolong after 6 months , bantuan makanan atau sewa rumah sahaja . 
banyak yang naik lemak jadi malas nak kerja.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe for me, zakat should help for the first 6 months only. at the same time, find a job for him to support the family. the last thing that can help after 6 months, help with food or house rent only.
a lot of people get fat so they are lazy to work.

Text: @acaiijawe Apa punya perangai tak bersyukur🤦‍♀️
Translated Text: @acaiijawe What kind of ungrateful attitude do you have?

Text: @acaiijawe Mentaliti mereka masih ditahap (ala..hai..) bukan semua, tapi kebanyakannya
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Their mentality is still leveled (ala..hi..) not all, but most

Text: @acaiijawe Mmg ada yg begini,realiti kehidupan.ada asnaf mengambil kesempatan,menipu & mgambil bahagian org lain.Pndekatan yg sy lakukan,bgtau mereka direct,maaf puan,jika sy bagi kepada puan,sy akan ambil bahagian org lain yg memerlukan.Kita sama2 nk kehidupan yg dberkati Allah,kan puan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe There is something like this, the reality of life. There are people who take advantage, cheat & take the part of other people. The approach I take is to tell them directly, sorry ma'am, if I give it to you, I will take the part of other people in need. We both want a life blessed by God, right ma'am?

Text: @acaiijawe Manusia kan. Nk bohong pn bodo, dia bt mcm ko tu duduk dlm gua with no internet connection.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Human right. If you lie, it's stupid, it's like he's sitting in a cave with no internet connection.

Text: @acaiijawe Betul utz dkt kampung saya ada yg dapT bantuan zakat tapi masih lagi meminta bantuan dr penghulu/ketua kampung...hmm
Translated Text: @acaiijawe It's true that in my village there are people who have received zakat aid but are still asking for help from the village chief/head... hmm

Text: @acaiijawe Golongan yang nak terus hidup dengan duit bantuan tanpa usaha nak keluar dari golongan asnaf memang macam nie tak bersyukur
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Those who want to continue living with aid money without trying to get out of the asnaf group are really ungrateful

Text: @acaiijawe Manusia pelik dimana2 shj
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Strange people everywhere

Text: @acaiijawe kalau dia dpt bantuan dia kasi org separuh tu takpe ke?tak mcm slh guna eh. bantuan atas nama dia 😅
Translated Text: @acaiijawe if he gets help, he gives half of it to people. help in his name 😅

Text: @acaiijawe Lagi sedih Ada yg X layak dpt bantuan tp sanggup tipu smata2 nk dptkn bantuan...hantar anak2 tinggal kat Asrama baitul asnaf...padahal parents  berkemampuan ..Ada kereta ,motor n rumah sendiri.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe It's sad that there are those who don't deserve help but are willing to lie just to get help...send their children to live at Asrama Baitul Asnaf...even though the parents are capable..They have their own car, motorbike and house.

Text:

Text: @acaiijawe Penerima bantuan mmg x boleh nak terima program bantuan zakat sbb Pusat Zakat biasanya nak bentuk penerima bantuan ni jadi manusia yg berusaha. Istilah bagi pancing instead of ikan semata. Tapi penerima zakat ni nak ikan selama-lamanya jadi x perlu nak berusaha.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Aid recipients can't accept the zakat assistance program because the Zakat Center usually wants to make these aid recipients into people who work hard. The term for fishing instead of just fish. But the recipient of zakat wants to fish forever, so there is no need to make an effort.

Text:
@acaiijawe Tak aneh bila kita tahu mereka jenis si pemalas dan mengharap segala tok nenek bantuan yang ada. Acting terpaling 'miskin'.

Kadang yang katanya 'miskin' tu punyai kereta baru berbanding yang benar² miskin yang lebih memerlukan bantuan.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe It's not strange when we know they are the type of lazy people and hope for all the help available. Acting turned out to be 'poor'.

Sometimes the so-called 'poor' has a new car compared to the really poor who need more help.

Text: @acaiijawe Ini benar, semasa di Syria sebelum zaman perang para pakar dan tulang belakang disana ramai yang bertaraf cendiakawan semua mahir agama , keseimbangan tercapai dan inilah rahsia Andulasia menjadi tamadun dunia.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe This is true, when in Syria before the war, the experts and the backbone there were many who were of scholar status, all skilled in religion, balance was achieved and this is the secret of Andalusia becoming a world civilization.

Text:
Siapa dah guna Apps Iman kat iPhone, kena guna versi Pro (RM16.90) untuk Apple Watch.

Tapi.

Hari Jumaat ni ada sorang hamba Allah nak sponsor Iman Apps Pro 😊🤲.

5 ORANG PERTAMA yang DM aku email mereka layak dapat apps ni FREE. Siapa cepat.

*Apps ni available kat iOS je. https://t.co/gAQymxnFPx
Translated Text:
Who has used Faith Apps on iPhone, you have to use the Pro version (RM16.90) for Apple Watch.

But.

This Friday there is a servant of Allah who wants to sponsor Faith Apps Pro 😊🤲.

The FIRST 5 PEOPLE who DM me their email deserve this FREE app. Who's fast.

*Apps are only available on iOS. https://t.co/gAQymxnFPx

Text:
Ya Allah tak sampai 5 minit dah penuh slot😭😭. Dah lebih 20 orang DM.

Insyaallah hamba Allah tu akan send CODE kepada yg bertuah. Doakan kebaikan untuk beliau.

Bagi yang tak dapat minta maaf.

Berbaloi untuk beli full version one time apps tersebut. Lelagi yg guna AW.

Jzkk.
Translated Text:
Oh God, the slots are full in less than 5 minutes😭😭. More than 20 people DM.

God willing, that servant of God will send a CODE to the lucky ones. Pray for the best for him.

For those who cannot apologize.

It is worthwhile to buy the full version one time apps. Always use AW.

Mr.

Text:
Kemudian dia memilih Muharam sebagai bulan pertama dalam kalender Islam kerana waktu itu para jemaah haji sudah berangkat pulang ke tanah air masing-masing.

Tahun pertama pula ditetapkan pada tahun hijrah untuk memisahkan antara hak dan yang batil.
Translated Text:
Then he chose Muharram as the first month in the Islamic calendar because at that time the pilgrims had already left for their respective homelands.

The first year is set in the year of migration to separate the right from the wrong.

Text:
Bagi yang masih tak tahu, Rasulullah tidak berhijarah pada bulan Muharram seperti yang ramai sangka dan lagu nasyid tu. 

Baginda berhijrah pada bulan Safar dan sampai ke Madinah pada awal bulan Rabiulawal.

Nama-nama bulan dah ada. Cuma takde kiraan tahun waktu itu.

Begitulah. https://t.co/uSYNqkzGQK
Translated Text:
For those who still don't know, the Prophet did not migrate in the month of Muharram as many people thought and that nasyid song.

He migrated in the month of Safar and reached Madinah at the beginning of the month of Rabiulawal.

The names of the months are already there. Just didn't count the year at that time.

That's it. https://t.co/uSYNqkzGQK

Text:
Tak dinafikan, mirrorrless ni mmg future dalam photography.

Tapi tahun 2021 ni, lag-free electronic viewfinder hanya boleh dapat kat DSLR je (sebab guna cermin).

EVF kat high-end mirrorlesspun masih lagged. Ia fizik. Bagi sukan yang speed laju, beza milisecond beri kesan besar.
Translated Text:
Undeniably, mirrorless is the future in photography.

But in 2021, lag-free electronic viewfinders can only be found in DSLRs (because they use mirrors).

Even the high-end mirrorless EVF is still lagging. It's physics. For fast-paced sports, the difference in milliseconds has a big impact.

Text:
Abu Zar melaporkan, saya bertanya kepada Rasulullah.

"Wahai Rasulullah, tidakkah tuan mahu melantik saya jadi pemimpin?"

Nabi menepuk bahu saya lalu menjawab,

"Wahai Abu Zar, saudara tidak mampu jadi pemimpin.

Percayalah, jawatan pemimpin adalah satu amanah..
Translated Text:
Abu Zar reported, I asked the Messenger of Allah.

"O Messenger of Allah, don't you want to appoint me as a leader?"

The Prophet patted my shoulder and answered,

"O Abu Zar, you are not capable of being a leader.

Believe me, the position of leader is a trust..

Text:
..Pada Hari Kiamat nanti, jawatan seperti itu adalah rendah dan ia membawa kepada kekesalan.

Melainkan bagi orang yang menerima amanah itu dengan cara yang benar dan mereka menunaikan amanah itu". 

(HR Muslim).
Translated Text:
..On the Day of Resurrection, such a position is low and it leads to regret.

Except for those who accept the trust in the right way and they fulfill the trust".

(HR Muslim).

Text:
Kalau video cantik dan audio kelaut, biasanya orang malas nak dengar.

Tapi orang boleh terima lagi kalau suara jelas walaupun kualiti video average.

Jadi sebelum invest beli kamera mahal, better spend duit untuk dapatkan audio/mic lebih berkualiti san cahaya yang mencukupi.
Translated Text:
If the video is beautiful and the audio is bad, usually people are lazy to listen.

But people can still accept it if the voice is clear even if the video quality is average.

So before investing in an expensive camera, better spend money to get better quality audio/mic with enough light.

Text:
Aku baru beli Boya PM500 ni untuk meeting online.

Murah dan kualiti suara jauh lebih baik dari mic kat headphone dan earphone sblm ni.

Kelebihan mic ni dia guna USB-C to USB(A/C). Bukan guna audio jack.

Plug & Play je dan boleh pilih sources mic ni masa online.

Begitulah. https://t.co/ULUiR5PHrj
Translated Text:
I just bought this Boya PM500 for an online meeting.

It's cheap and the sound quality is much better than the mic in headphones and earphones before.

The advantage of this mic is that it uses USB-C to USB (A/C). Do not use the audio jack.

Plug & Just play and you can select the mic sources when online.

That's it. https://t.co/ULUiR5PHrj
