Text:
Sangat sedih kalau kita mati tapi dilaknat orang sebab kejahatan tangan, mulut & tulisan kita semasa hidup.

Tiada yang mahu mendoakan kita.

Ramai lega dan gembira dengan berita kematian kita. Sebab kita selalu buat zalim kepada orang lain.

Malah yang tak kenal pun benci kita.
Translated Text:
It is very sad if we die but are cursed by people because of evil hands, mouth & our writing during life.

No one wants to pray for us.

Many are relieved and happy with the news of our death. Because we always do injustice to others.

Even those who don't know us hate us.

Text:
Tapi paling kasihan kalau sebelum mati, orang dah tertunggu-tunggu berita kematian kita.

Kita hidup pun dibenci orang. Tiada kebaikan untuk orang lain.

Dunia dinikmati ada batasnya. Kita nakkan kematian yang husnul khatimah.

Jadilah orang soleh dan orang yang bermanfaat.
Translated Text:
But the most unfortunate thing is that before we die, people are waiting for the news of our death.

We live to be hated by people. No good for others.

The world of enjoyment has limits. We want a death that is husnul khatimah.

Be a righteous person and a useful person.

Text:
Jujurnya ada masjid dan surau yang struggle nak bayar bil bila duit sedekah berkurangan lebih 90%.

Apatah lagi nak bayar asatizah ni buat kuliah online.

Lagipun ramai expect kuliah online tu percuma sebab buat di rumah je. Ustaz mengajar pun tidak dibayar macam kuliah biasa.
Translated Text:
To be honest, there are mosques and suraus that struggle to pay their bills when the alms money is reduced by more than 90%.

Not to mention paying for this asatizah for online lectures.

After all, many people expect online lectures to be free because they can be done at home. Even teaching instructors are not paid like regular lectures.

Text:
@acaiijawe Tak perasan juga

Lagi2 ustaz yang jenis ikhlas terima je berapa masjid bagi tak letak harga😭
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Didn't notice either

More ustaz who are sincere, just accept how many mosques you don't put a price on 😭

Text: @Afiq60173663 Betul. Sepatutnya, kena ada sedikit bayaran saguhati kepada mereka. Walaupun buat secara online. Mereka pun confirm tak minta.
Translated Text: @Afiq60173663 Right. There should be some consolation payment to them. Even if done online. They also confirmed not to ask.

Text:
Lepas tu dia terus bayarkan. Brader tu rasanya dah 40an. Tapi masih hormat kat cikgu dia.

Siapalah kita tanpa bakti mereka.

Ia juga satu pekerjaan yang walaupun dah bersara, orang masih tetap panggil cikgu dan dihormati di mata masyarakat.

Doa untuk semua guru kita.
Translated Text:
After that he continued to pay. That brother seems to be in his 40s. But still respect his teacher.

Who are we without their devotion.

It is also a job that even after retirement, people still call them teachers and are respected in the eyes of the community.

Prayers for all our teachers.

Text: @acaiijawe betul. title cikgu memang akan lekat sampai bila-bila. walaupun pencen dan tak bertugas sebagai cikgu
Translated Text: @acaiijawe is right. The teacher's title will stick forever. even though he is retired and not working as a teacher

Text: @NasrulHadzir Betul. Kat kampung tu, sampai dia usia 80 tahun dan meninggal masih lekat panggilan cikgu kat mana-mana. Dah bersara jadi cikgu dah lebih 25 tahun.
Translated Text: @NasrulHadzir Right. In that village, until he was 80 years old and died, he was still calling the teacher everywhere. Retired as a teacher for over 25 years.

Text: @acaiijawe Masih terngiang2 nasihat cikgu..tengkingan cikgu pon tringat jugk tp bila reflect balik, brsyukur dimarah guru..if not, im not who i am now..Alhamdulillah

Text: @acaiijawe Masih mencari guru F6 saya, belum ketemu lg. Semoga cikgu² semua sentiasa di dlm kelimpahan rahmatNya. Aamiin...

Text: @acaiijawe Aku lebih suka cikgu yang garang tapi baik berbanding cikgu bawang . Luaran lembut tapi dalaman toksik. Ada segelintir cikgu bawang acah2 nasihat student tapi lebih kepada kejian. Kalau ada cikgu2 baik yang baca ni. May Allah bless and protect you.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I prefer a fierce but kind teacher to a onion teacher. Soft on the outside but toxic on the inside. There are a handful of onion teachers who give advice to students but it's more of a disgrace. If there are good teachers who read this. May Allah bless and protect you.

Text: @acaiijawe Sbb tu tanggungjawab dia berat. Mudah dicerca jika silap. Sbb hormatnya masyarakat pada dia tinggi tiada batas. Besar amanah diorg galas.

Text:
@acaiijawe Betul apa yg saudara ni kata. Aku ingat semua guru2 aku. Dan aku sebagai guru, aku pula tak kisah anak murid tak ingat aku.

Aku ajar semata2 utk beri ilmu, bukan utk diingat. Dan tak perlu nak hormat sgt sampai beri keutamaan. Aku benci. Benda ni yg buat manusia angkuh
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe What you said is true. I remember all my teachers. And as a teacher, I don't care if the students don't remember me.

I teach only to give knowledge, not to remember. And you don't need to be so respectful that you give priority. I hate it. This is what makes people arrogant

Text:
@acaiijawe Murid ingat cikgu ni biasa. Cikgu ingat nama anak murid ni rare.

Satu kelas = 30 org
Satu darjah = 5 kelas
Satu darjah = 150 org
6 darjah = 900 org

Kalau cikgu dh berkhidmat 24 tahun, bermakna dia dh lalui 3600 ank murid (4x900).

Dalam 3600 nama, nama kau yg cikgu ingat😆👍🏻
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Students remember this teacher is normal. The teacher rarely remembers the student's name.

One class = 30 people
One degree = 5 classes
One degree = 150 people
6 degrees = 900 people

If the teacher has served for 24 years, that means he has taught 3600 students (4x900).

In 3600 names, it's your name that the teacher remembers😆👍🏻

Text:
@acaiijawe Cikgu tu garang ke tegas ke, murid akan ingat jasa mereka kalau menjalankan tanggungjawab dan tugas dengan betul. Tak mampu balas budi, dapat berbakti sikit2 pun jadi 😁

Tapi murid juga akan ingat mereka yang bermasalah, tak buat kerja, garang tak bertempat, selalu cari pasal..
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe The teacher is fierce and strict, students will remember their service if they carry out their responsibilities and duties correctly. Not being able to return the favor, being able to give even a little bit of service is so 😁

But students will also remember those who have problems, don't do work, fierce and out of place, always looking for things..

Text:
Bagi orang kampung dahulu, ketika rewang di majlis kahwin beginilah mereka dapat berjumpa dan eratkan ukhuwah.

Masa untuk berbaik kalau ada yang bergaduh. Peluang bertemu jodoh bagi yang bujang.

Semua cerita dalam kampung boleh tahu. Sampai wujud istilah 'makcik bawang'. https://t.co/9DlkpwuGXa
Translated Text:
For the village people in the past, when rewang at the wedding ceremony, this is how they can meet and bond together.

Time to make up if someone fights. A chance to meet a soulmate for singles.

All the stories in the village can be known. Until the term 'aunt onion' came into being. https://t.co/9DlkpwuGXa

Text:
Sayangnya tradisi ini mungkin pupus tak lama lagi.

Seiring dengan peredaran zaman, semua dah hidup sendiri-sendiri, kurang bermasyarakat & tak kenal jiran.

Semangat bantu membantu dah berkurangan. Kos rewang juga makin mahal.

Satu hari nanti ia hanya tinggal kenangan. https://t.co/zEIPbJuyie
Translated Text:
Unfortunately this tradition may die out soon.

Along with the passage of time, everyone has lived alone, less social & I don't know the neighbors.

The spirit of helping has decreased. Rewang costs are also getting more expensive.

One day it will only be a memory. https://t.co/zEIPbJuyie

Text:

Setiap tahun algorithm platform sosial media berubah.

Ia mungkin sebabkan trend baru  pengguna yang berbeza dari tahun-tahun lepas.

Maklumat ini mungkin membantu content creator dan marketing team juga akan datang.

It may cause new user trends that are different from previous years.

This information may help content creators and marketing teams in the future.

Text:
Lelagi kalau dia tengah khusyuk makan, toleh pun tidak.

Cucuk kat hidung tu satu-satunya cara gerakkan lembu besar ni. Termasuk binatang besar macam unta, kerbau dsb.

Dia macam tindik telinga tapi buat dalam hidung. Memang orang yang paling berani je mampu buat tu.

Bagitulah. https://t.co/8Azfxa1M0X
Translated Text:
As long as he is busy eating, he doesn't even look.

Poking the nose is the only way to move this big cow. Including large animals such as camels, buffaloes, etc.

It's like an ear piercing but done in the nose. Only the bravest people can do that.

That's it. https://t.co/8Azfxa1M0X

Text:
@acaiijawe Ingatan bersama:

Di antara cara dan sikap ihsan yang disunnahkan ketika melaksanakan penyembelihan haiwan adalah:

1. Tidak menajamkan pisau di hadapan haiwan yang akan disembelih.

2. Tidak menyembelih haiwan di hadapan haiwan-haiwan lain yang akan disembelih.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Shared memories:

Among the ways and respectful attitudes that are recommended when slaughtering animals are:

1. Not sharpening the knife in front of the animal to be slaughtered.

2. Not slaughtering animals in front of other animals to be slaughtered.

Text:
@anisi_g Ini betul dan sunnah jika berkemampuan.

Tapi realitinya kalau di tempat sembelihan yang terbuka (seperti di Mina) ataupun kawasan sempit dgn banyak haiwan korban, ia sukar dielakkan.

Tidaklah sampai berdosa.

Dalam hadis, paling penting tajamkan pisau dan sembelih dengan ihsan.
Translated Text:
@anisi_g This is correct and sunnah if you are able.

But the reality is that in an open slaughterhouse (like in Mina) or a narrow area with many sacrificial animals, it is difficult to avoid.

Not to the point of sin.

In the hadith, it is most important to sharpen the knife and slaughter with courtesy.

Text:
Berdoalah dalam keadaan kita yakin Allah akan mustajabkan permintaan kita.

Jangan berdoa dengan sambil lewa. Jika tidak tahu doa dlm bahasa arab, berdoa je dalam bahasa melayu.

Ajak satu keluarga sama ada mereka berpuasa ataupun tidak. Mudah-mudahan doa kita semua dimakbulkan.
Translated Text:
Pray when we are confident that God will grant our request.

Do not pray carelessly. If you don't know how to pray in Arabic, just pray in Malay.

Invite a family whether they are fasting or not. Hopefully all our prayers are answered.

Text:
Diampunkan dosa ni sesuatu yang sangat besar 😭.

Sebab kita manusia ni pasti akan melakukan dosa. Pasti!

Tapi Allah bagi jalan keluar untuk hapuskan dosa-dosa tersebut.

Bayangkan dosa 720 hari (bukan dosa besar) diampunkan dengan hanya berpuasa 1 hari sahaja.

Jom berpuasa!
Translated Text:
Being forgiven is a very big thing 😭.

Because we humans will definitely commit sins. Definitely!

But God gave a way out to remove those sins.

Imagine a sin of 720 days (not a major sin) forgiven by just fasting for 1 day.

Let's fast!

Text:
Ramai mengaku sebagai peminat kopi sebenar. Tapi hakikatnya mereka hanyalah peminat air kopi manis.

Bila minum air kopi tanpa gula hatta yang latte, katanya tak sedap.

Mereka tak dapat nikmati perbezaan flavors, aroma (flowery,smoky, herby) dan roasting  beans kopi yg berbeza.
Translated Text:
Many claim to be true coffee lovers. But the fact is they are just fans of sweet coffee water.

When drinking water without sugar, even a latte, he says it's not good.

They cannot enjoy the different flavors, aromas (flowery, smoky, herby) and different roasting coffee beans.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sweet coffee 😋

Text:
HARUS dan SAH hukumnya melaksanakan Qurban secara wakil ke luar negara.

Tetapi yang terbaik dan tiada khilaf adalah di tempat sendiri.

Bagi yang mampu boleh korban di Syiria atau Palestin RM1900 satu bahagian lembu @ seekor kambing. Mereka lebih perlukan.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
It MUST and is legal to perform Qurban on behalf of abroad.

But the best and no mistake is at home.

For those who are able to sacrifice in Syria or Palestine RM1900 a cow @ a goat. They need more.

That's it.

Text: @acaiijawe Bang, bagaimana dengan ketirisan kariah masjid dalam mengagihkan daging korban. Pernah terlihat pengagihan berlakunya sikap kronisma. Adakah benda ini sihat untuk diamalkan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Brother, what about the leakage of the mosque congregation in distributing the sacrificial meat. Ever seen the spread of cronyism. Is this thing healthy to practice?

Text: @EncikMaskRider Ini sebenarnya bergantung kepada AJK korban yang menguruskan. Tapi ia takdelah sampai haram sebab daging korban juga boleh diberi kepada orang yang bukan miskin.
Translated Text: @EncikMaskRider This actually depends on the AJK korban who manages. But it does not become haram because the sacrificial meat can also be given to people who are not poor.

Text: @MrParih Insyaallah semoga dapat pahala yang besar atas korban tersebut tuan.
Translated Text: @MrParih God willing, may you get a great reward for the sacrifice, sir.

Text: @acaiijawe Alasan mudah ia murah. Nama pun pengorbanan memerlukan korban wang dan tenaga. Dalam media sosial masing-masing bangkit isu keperluan org miskin tapi tak terjemahkan bila waktu korban ini.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Simple reason it's cheap. Even the name sacrifice requires the sacrifice of money and energy. In each social media, the issue of the needs of the poor is raised but it is not translated when this is the time of sacrifice.

Text: @acaiijawe Mana2 tempat yang tak cukup lembu cariklah jalan bantu. Family saya dah 2 tahun buat di sabah sbb kenal org yg boleh uruskan. Kerana di kariah sendiri mmg terlalu obvious berlebih2an dan kurang penduduk miskin.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Where there are not enough cows, find a way to help. My family has been in Sabah for 2 years because I know people who can manage. Because in the parish itself, it is too obvious that there are too many and less poor people.

Text: @acaiijawe Masalah time pandemik ni sop sembelihan diuruskn oleh pusat vet dan ruminan brdftr... bnyak berkait sop yg mnyukarkn sehingga pihak surau/masjid sendiri tidak terlibat utk menguruskn korban tahun ni juga menghadkan bilangan.kuota
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The problem during this pandemic is that the slaughter soup is managed by the vet center and ruminant brdftr... a lot of it is related to the soup which is difficult so that the surau/mosque itself is not involved in managing the sacrifice this year also limiting the number. quota

Text: @acaiijawe Bang.. bukan semua org mampu nak buat korban ditempat sendiri kerana harganya yg mencecah RM750 ke RM800 sebahagian. Bagi yg tidak mampu tetapi sgt teringin nk buat korban maka pilihan yg ada hanyalah korban di kemboja atau kwsn² lain yg murah yg serendah RM299 sebahagian
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Bro.. not all people can afford to make a sacrifice at home because the price reaches RM750 to RM800 for some. For those who can't afford it but really want to make a sacrifice, the only option available is a sacrifice in Cambodia or other cheap kwsn² that are as low as RM299 a part

Text:
Namun bila sunat, ramai orang ambil ringan sebab boleh ditinggalkan walaupun mereka mampu.

Hakikatnya ia sangat-sangat dituntut.

Bagi Mazhab Hanafi ia sampai tahap WAJIB. Sunat Muakkad bagi Syafie.

Ia tunjuk tahap kefahaman dan pengorbanan kita terhadap agama.
Translated Text:
But when it comes to circumcision, many people take it lightly because it can be left even if they can afford it.

The fact is that it is very demanding.

For the Hanafi School, it reaches the level of OBLIGATION. Muakkad circumcision for Syafie.

It shows our level of understanding and sacrifice towards religion.

Text:
Jika kita marah dan geram sekalipun, tulisan dan perkataan yang keluar dari kita tetap ditimbang dosa dan pahala.

Kerana akhirnya. Penghujung hidup seorang muslim ni cuma ada 2 je. Syurga atau neraka.

Ini sekadar ingatan. Terpulang nak ambil ataupun tidak.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
Even if we are angry and resentful, the writings and words that come out of us are still weighed by sins and rewards.

Because finally. There are only 2 ends of a Muslim's life. Heaven or hell.

This is just a memory. It's up to you to take it or not.

That's it.

Text:
@acaiijawe Kalau maki tidak dibenarkan agama, dalam mengubah kemungkaran yang terpampang jelas hari ini, cukupkah agama sekadar hati dan lisan (nasihat yang baik)? 

Atau agama menyeru agar rakyat menggunakan tangan (tindakan/kuasa)?
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe If cursing is not allowed in religion, in changing the evil that is clearly displayed today, is religion enough just by heart and mouth (good advice)?

Or religion calls for the people to use their hands (action/power)?

Text:
@kupikupior @seliskylit Aduhai, benda mudah begini pun susah nak faham.

Bila tidak bersetuju dengan budaya melampiaskan kemarahan dengan maki hamun dan mencarut.

Bukannya kita kena berdiam diri dengan kezaliman dan bersubahat.

Gunakan semua segala cara yang ada. Tapi ada batas dosa dan pahala.
Translated Text:
@kupikupior @seliskylit Alas, simple things like this are hard to understand.

When you don't agree with the culture, vent your anger by cursing and ranting.

It is not that we have to stay silent with cruelty and complicity.

Use all available means. But there is a limit to sin and reward.

Text:
Lagipun kalau pakai lori besar tak dapat masuk hulu kampung. Kena guna 4x4.

Statistik di Selangor.

Penerima Bantuan Kewangan Bulanan dan Makanan Bulanan : 54,376 KELUARGA.

Total Bantuan : RM196.8 JUTA!

Skala bantuan jauh lagi besar dari mana-mana bantuan individu dan NGO. https://t.co/ysyTFT9Hcv
Translated Text:
After all, if you use a big truck, you can't enter the upper part of the village. Have to use 4x4.

Statistics in Selangor.

Recipients of Monthly Financial Assistance and Monthly Food : 54,376 FAMILIES.

Total Assistance : RM196.8 MILLION!

The scale of aid is far greater than any individual and NGO aid. https://t.co/ysyTFT9Hcv

Text:
Ini sebenarnya menjawab persoalan yang diterima,

"Kenapa tak nampak lori zakat bagi bantuan macam Syed Saddiq buat?"

"Mana bantuan lori dari zakat?"

This actually answers the accepted question,

"Why don't you see a zakat truck for help like Syed Saddiq did?"

"Where is the lorry help from zakat?"

Maybe this answer helps a little.

That's it. https://t.co/HtOIsb6Sxo

Text: @acaiijawe Maaf tuan,nak Tanya kenapa premis di bawah zakat Di sekitar Selangor masih kutip Wang sewaan padahal premis tidak dibenarkan beroperasi sbb bukan essential...?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sorry sir, I want to ask why premises under zakat around Selangor are still collecting rental money even though the premises are not allowed to operate as they are not essential...?

Text:
Ini zakat beliau tahun lepas.

Entah berapa puluh ribu asnaf dapat manfaat dari zakat beliau semenjak dahulu.

Kita perlukan lebih ramai peniaga muslim yang kaya dan mengeluarkan zakat.

Semoga mereka semua terus berjaya dalam perniagaan, Ameen!
Translated Text:
This is his zakat last year.

I don't know how many tens of thousands of asnaf have benefited from his zakat since long ago.

We need more Muslim merchants who are rich and pay zakat.

May they all continue to be successful in business, Ameen!

Text:

Text:
Masa kita terlalu singkat untuk beramal dan menabur bakti.

Sedikit masa lagi akan layu kaku, lalu diganti dengan ‘tanaman’ yang baru.

Buatlah yang terbaik dalam kapasiti masing-masing untuk menjadi ‘tanah subur’ yang bermanfaat dan menyumbang kepada agama serta masyarakat.
Translated Text:
Our time is too short to do charity and sow devotion.

In a little while it will wither stiffly, then be replaced by a new 'plant'.

Do the best in each capacity to be a useful 'fertile land' and contribute to religion and society.

Text:
Sepatutnya dah takde lagi rasa nak flex kekayaan, kebahagiaan atau guna barangan berjenama untuk naikkan imej kita di mata manusia lain.

Tiada lagi pakai baju dan kasut yang menyiksa badan.

Atau habiskan duit make-up kereta/motor yang kita tak nampak masa memandu.

Itulah.
Translated Text:
We should no longer feel like flexing our wealth, happiness or using branded goods to improve our image in the eyes of other people.

No more wearing clothes and shoes that torture the body.

Or spend money on car/motor make-up that we don't see when driving.

That's it.

Text:
Siap bawa plastik besar IKEA dari rumah. Tahupun sebab ada CCTV.

Kalau mereka betul-betul perlukan memang tiada masalah. Tapi kalau sampai ambil hak orang lain itu dah zalim.

Akhirnya, memang akan ada orang yang ambil kesempatan atas kebaikan orang lain. Contoh dlm gambar ni. https://t.co/zcFwt8HLhz
Translated Text:
Ready to bring big IKEA plastic from home. I know because there is CCTV.

If they really need it, there is no problem. But if you take other people's rights, that's cruel.

Finally, there will be people who take advantage of the goodness of others. Example in this picture. https://t.co/zcFwt8HLhz

Text: @acaiijawe Tiada cara lain, perlu ada sistem rekod & dokumentasi yang ketat demi elakkan orang menyalahgunakannnya. Penggunaan ic, pengesahan alamat, dan jika perlu serta ada kemampuan pihak yg mengendalikan, lakukan ziarah di kediaman penerima.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe There is no other way, there needs to be a record system & strict documentation to prevent people from abusing it. Use of ic, address verification, and if necessary and if the operator has the ability, make a pilgrimage to the recipient's residence.

Text:
@mrfotografer_ Ini cara terbaik sebenarnya tuan.

Tapi itulah, kita nak kurangkan diaorang rasa malu nak ambil. Jadi biarkan je open camtu.

Dah letak buku untuk tulis nama. Tapi memang langsung tak tulis.

Mungkin mereka ambil kat tempat lain juga.
Translated Text:
@mrfotografer_ This is actually the best way sir.

But that's it, we want to make him less embarrassed to take it. So just leave it open like that.

I have put the book to write the name. But I didn't write it right away.

Maybe they take it elsewhere too.

Text: @acaiijawe Betul tu tuan. Ambil sampai tak ingat orang belakang. Bawak 2 kereta sapu licin semua. Nak bersangka baik pun iman belum sampai tahap tu lagi. Pihak masjid kariah saya pun dah pening. Last2 decide buat rekod pengambilan.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe That's right sir. Take it until you don't remember the person behind you. Bring 2 smooth sweeping cars. Even if you think it's good, faith has not reached that level yet. My parish mosque is also dizzy. Last2 decide to make a recruitment record.

Text:
@jir0_0_punk Itulah. Yang pelik ambil telur sampai 2-3 papan. Memang nak menjual ke apa.

Kita suka kalau food bank kosong dan ramai dapat manfaat. Tapi sayang kalau sorang dia je dapat manfaat.
Translated Text:
@jir0_0_punk That's it. The strange one takes eggs up to 2-3 boards. What do you want to sell?

We like it when the food bank is empty and many can benefit. But it's a pity if only he can benefit.

Text: @acaiijawe Dah kena kawal tu. Kena ada ajk yang jaga. Sediakan buku rekod kecil / kupon untuk setiap ahli karyah / orang yang nak ambil sumbangan. Tak perlu rekod nama. Cuma setiap kali dia nak ambil; cop logo masjid & tarikh. Kena jarakkan hari pengambilan. Mungkin 3 - 4 hari sekali.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Gotta control that. Someone has to take care of it. Prepare a small record book / coupon for each parishioner / person who wants to take a donation. No need to record name. Only every time he wants to take; mosque logo stamp & date. Have to move the pick up day. Maybe every 3-4 days.

Text: @acaiijawe Nak tak nak kena ada jaga. Ini lah dia, nak buat baik ada pula ambil kesempatan. Ada jaga pun belum tentu setel. Mula mula ayah ambil, lepas tu mak ambil, lepas tu anak pulak. Tapi ok lah better dari letak je

Text: @acaiijawe Sebaiknya, elok ketua kawasan/ketua kampung je yg buat list nama yg layak terima bantuan, kemudian mintak mereka ambik sendiri di pusat bantuan(masjid/surau/balai raya)untuk tarikh yg tertentu(seminggu sekali). Kalau buat mcm ni, mmg ada golongan yg mampu/tamak ambik kesempatan.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Ideally, it would be better for the area head/village head to make a list of names eligible to receive aid, then ask them to pick it up at the aid center (mosque/surau/balai raya) for a certain date (once a week). If you do this, there are people who are able/greedy to take advantage.

Text:
Bagi yang tak tahu market price, mungkin ramai terbeli dan tertipu. Lebih-lebih lagi bila chat, ada yang ajak deal payment di luar platform Shopee.

Lepas scam dan kantoi kena report, diaorang create user baru.

Better beli di website terus atau dealer official kat situ.

Itulah.
Translated Text:
For those who do not know the market price, many may be bought and deceived. Moreover, when chatting, there are people who invite deal payment outside the Shopee platform.

After the scam and Kantoi got reported, he created a new user.

Better to buy directly from the website or the official dealer there.

That's it.

Text: @acaiijawe Mungkin nanti kalau jumpa lagi scammer macamni, kongsi je kat twitter ni, ramai yang rajin report 👍
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Maybe later if you find another scammer like this, just share it on twitter, many people are diligent to report it 👍

Text:
@Afiq60173663 Itulah. Kalau kita tengah cari satu-satu barang tu, mungkin tahulah scam ke tak. Sebab kita tahu harga pasaran sebab dah survey.

Tapi kalau tak cari barang tu memang tak rajin nak masuk saja-saja dalam Shopee tu.
Translated Text:
@Afiq60173663 That's it. If we are looking for that one item, we might know if it is a scam or not. Because we know the market price because we have done a survey.

But if you are not looking for that item, you are not diligent enough to enter Shopee.

Text: @acaiijawe Takut nak beli gadget sebab ada certain courier tampered parcel orang. 😣 Lagi-lagi sekarang Shopee dah tak allow customer pilih courier.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau barang electronic mahal ni mungkin boleh cari kedai shopee mall. Kalau shopee preffered/preffered+ pun boleh tapi make sure betul betul faham dan tengok review dekat bawah.

Text: @acaiijawe Susu baby pon dorang scam. Dorang target orang yg tak tahu pasal shope, atau orang yg tak tahu sgt pasal on9 shoping. Yg scamer tu org kapir, tak kesah halal haram. Memang tak larat nak report.. Kena berhati2 je la. Jgn bayar melalui platform luar shope.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Baby milk is a scam. You target people who don't know about shope, or people who don't know much about on9 shopping. The scammer is a heathen, it doesn't matter if it's halal or haram. It's really not a good idea to report.. You have to be careful. Don't pay through platforms outside shope.

Text:
Sebagai orang beriman, kita hanya mampu mengucapkan,

"Segala puji bagi Allah di atas setiap perkara”.

Berdoalah dengan doa ini. Kerana baginda saw bersabda:

“Sesiapa yang mengucapkan doa ini ketika ditimpa musibah, pasti Allah akan menggantikan dengan sesuatu yang lebih baik”. https://t.co/Dff1Z86OHJ
Translated Text:
As believers, we can only say,

"All praise be to God above all things".

Pray this prayer. Because His Majesty said:

"Anyone who says this prayer when a calamity strikes, surely Allah will replace it with something better". https://t.co/Dff1Z86OHJ

Text:
Lebih menakutkan, jumlah bantuan ini bertambah setiap tahun dengan kadar yang membimbangkan.

KKM jangka setahun 7,000 pesakit baru dialisis di Malaysia.

Maksudnya semakin ramai asnaf dan golongan B20+M40 menjalani rawatan dialisis 3 kali seminggu seumur hidupnya.
Translated Text:
More frightening, the amount of this aid increases every year at an alarming rate.

The Ministry of Health expects 7,000 new dialysis patients in Malaysia per year.

This means that more and more asnaf and the B20+M40 group undergo dialysis treatment 3 times a week throughout their lives.

Text:
Kos untuk SEORANG pesakit dialisis yang jalani 165 rawatan (3 kali seminggu, 12 bulan) + ubat berkaitan adalah RM40,000!

Sampai satu tahap, mungkin institusi zakat tak mampu lagi tanggung sepenuhnya kos-kos yg tinggi ini.

Jagalah kesihatan kita semua. Amalkan cara hidup sihat.
Translated Text:
The cost for ONE dialysis patient who undergoes 165 treatments (3 times a week, 12 months) + related medicine is RM40,000!

To a certain extent, perhaps the zakat institution can no longer fully bear these high costs.

Take care of our health. Practice a healthy lifestyle.

Text:
Apa beza bantuan zakat Dialisis Asnaf Fakir Miskin vs Asnaf Gharimin (berhutang)?

Untuk asnaf fakir miskin, institusi zakat tanggung 100%.

Untuk Gharimin, zakat hanya tanggung sebahagian kos rawatan. Mungkin 6/12, 8/12 sebulan dsb (depends kepada income).

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
What is the difference between zakat assistance Dialysis Asnaf Fakir Kiskin vs Asnaf Gharimin (in debt)?

For the poor asnaf, the zakat institution is responsible for 100%.

For Gharimin, zakat only covers part of the cost of treatment. Maybe 6/12, 8/12 a month etc. (depends on income).

That's it.

Text:
Bayangkan berapa banyak manfaat kepada asnaf lain dengan duit zakat dialisis RM70 JUTA tersebut setiap tahun.

RM40,000 untuk SEORANG pesakit dialisis mungkin boleh membantu beratus-ratus orang asnaf lain yg memerlukan.

Semoga kita juga dijauhkan dari penyakit kronik ini, Amen! https://t.co/a8c6pEl13D
Translated Text:
Imagine how many benefits to other asnaf with the RM70 MILLION dialysis zakat money every year.

RM40,000 for ONE dialysis patient may help hundreds of other people in need.

May we also be kept away from this chronic disease, Amen! https://t.co/a8c6pEl13D

Text: @acaiijawe Tuan, maybe its the right time pusat zakat to venture into this industri (build&operate pusat dialisis) so in the mean time boleh provide kerja sekali. Picisan idea 😅.

Text:
@FarizaMustapha Eh memang dah lama institusi zakat ada Pusat Dialisis sendiri😊. Gambar yang saya kongsi ni memang Zakat punya.

Cuma itulah, jumlah pesakit terlalu ramai tak mampu tampung. Lagipun kos operasi terlalu tinggi (gaji doktor/nurse/ubat). Jadi majoriti buat kat swasta je.
Translated Text:
@FarizaMustapha Well, it's been a long time since the zakat institution had its own dialysis center. The picture I am sharing is from Zakat.

It's just that, the number of patients is too many to accommodate. After all, the operating costs are too high (doctor/nurse/medicine salaries). So the majority is for the private sector.

Text: @acaiijawe Terima kasih untuk info tuan. Cadangan saya, sediakan takaful perubatan. Ini salah 1 option yang baik. Ianya akan support kos ini. Justeru, semoga bajet zakat boleh lebih disalurkan kepada bantuan yang lain.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Thank you for the info sir. My suggestion, prepare medical takaful. This is one good option. It will support this cost. Therefore, hopefully the zakat budget can be channeled to other aid.

Text:
@faddroslan Cadangan yang baik tuan. Cuma, biasanya mereka yang mohon bantuan sebegini memang yang dah sakit kronik. Memang pihak takaful tak terima bila dah jatuh sakit.

Kalau untuk yang belum sakit terlalu ramai pulak asnaf (>350k orang). Mereka pula keluar masuk asnaf.
Translated Text:
@faddroslan Good suggestion sir. Only, usually those who ask for this kind of help are already chronically ill. Indeed, the takaful party does not accept when you fall ill.

If for those who are not sick, there are too many asnaf (> 350k people). They go in and out asnaf.

Text:
4. Cabarannya. Ada bantuan yang fix. Contoh lebih 40,000 keluarga bergantung bantuan sewa rumah, dialisis, makanan bulanan dll setiap bulan.

5. Tapi. Duit kutipan zakat, turun naik jumlahnya. Majoriti hanya bayar zakat bulan Ramadan & Disember. Income payer pula turun naik.
Translated Text:
4. The challenge. There is a fix help. For example, more than 40,000 families depend on help with house rent, dialysis, monthly food, etc. every month.

5. But. Zakat collection money, the amount fluctuates. The majority only pay zakat in the month of Ramadan & December. Income payer also fluctuates.

Text:
6. Jadi, bila kutip RM10 juta vs keperluan asnaf RM25 juta. Pasti akan ada yang tidak dapat bantuan zakat walaupun mereka LAYAK. Basic maths.

7. Dengan RM10 juta pula, kena utamakan basic necessity dulu (rumah, makan, perubatan). Bila ada lebihan barulah boleh bagi bantuan lain.
Translated Text:
6. So, if you collect RM10 million vs asnaf needs RM25 million. There will definitely be some who do not get zakat help even though they are DESERVED. Basic maths.

7. With RM10 million, you have to prioritize basic necessity first (house, food, medicine). Only when there is a surplus can other aid be given.

Text:
8. Bila orang tanya, kenapa takde bantuan pendidikan tahun ini? Kenapa bantuan modal perniagaan dan bina rumah dihentikan?

Ada 2 jawapan je.

- Kutipan zakat SEMASA tak mencukupi.
- Jumlah Asnaf fakir miskin meningkat. Basic necessity mereka lebih utama (pool duit terhad).
Translated Text:
8. When people ask, why is there no education aid this year? Why is business and house building capital aid stopped?

There are only 2 answers.

- CURRENT zakat collection is insufficient.
- The number of poor Asnaf increased. Their basic necessity is more important (limited money pool).

Text:
Sebab tu promosi/dakwah tentang bayar zakat juga perlu. Supaya dana zakat setiap bulan mencukupi.

Potongan gaji bulanan untuk zakat sebenarnya sangat membantu asnaf. Mereka inilah yang pastikan setiap bulan dana zakat mencukupi untuk diagihkan kepada asnaf.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
That's why promotion/preaching about paying zakat is also necessary. So that the monthly zakat fund is sufficient.

Monthly salary deduction for zakat is actually very helpful for asnaf. They are the ones who make sure every month that the zakat fund is sufficient to be distributed to the asnaf.

That's it.

Text:
Bila tahu basic ni.

• Korang akan faham duit zakat tu bukannya unlimited.
• Kena kutip dulu. Baru boleh agih.
• Ia sangat bergantung kepada keadaan ekonomi semasa.
• Ekonomi teruk - orang makin susah - orang bayar zakat sikit - pool duit zakat berkurang - asnaf terkesan.
Translated Text:
When you know this basic.

• You will understand that zakat money is not unlimited.
• Must collect first. Can only be distributed.
• It depends a lot on the current economic situation.
• The economy is bad - people are struggling - people pay less zakat - the pool of zakat money is reduced - asnaf are affected.

Text: @acaiijawe Point nombor 2 tu secara teknikalnya betul, cuma kurang tepat. Ada majlis agama (yang mana institusi zakat berada dibawahnya) yang terima geran daripada kerajaan, walaupun bukan dalam jumlah sebanyak 100 juta. Tapi, juta jugak laa..
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Point number 2 is technically correct, just not accurate. There are religious councils (which the zakat institution is under) that receive grants from the government, although not in the amount of 100 million. But, it's a million..

Text:
@Eroll_Zach Sejak ditubuhkan tahun 90an dulu semua badan yang terlibat dengan kewangan ni mmg wajib audit.

Zakat wajib diaudit setiap tahun. Dari Audit Negara dan swasta. Laporan juga selalu publish kepada umum.
Translated Text:
@Eroll_Zach Since it was established in the 90s, all bodies involved in finance are required to be audited.

Zakat must be audited every year. From the National and private Audit. Reports are also always published to the public.

Text: @acaiijawe Ust saya nak tanya. Penerima tetap zakat macam bayar sewa rumah ni, selamanya ke mereka akan dapat?  Atau zakat akan datang buat review semula atau renewal permohonan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Ust I want to ask. Permanent recipients of zakat are like paying rent for this house, will they get it forever? Or will zakat come to review or renew the application?

Text:
@NZarinaZ Untuk bantuan berkala (rumah sewa, makanan bulanan, bantuan duit bulanan) memang akan renew 6 bulan sekali. Setiap 6 bulan kena review sama ada mereka masih layak terima ataupun tidak.

Jika ada aduan, ataupun pegawai nak siasat, pada bila-bila masa boleh dilakukan.
Translated Text:
@NZarinaZ For periodic assistance (rental house, monthly food, monthly financial assistance) it will be renewed every 6 months. Every 6 months they have to review whether they are still eligible or not.

If there is a complaint, or an officer wants to investigate, it can be done at any time.

Text:
Tak faham betul megapixel race ni.

Megapixel camera tinggi bukan bermakna kualiti gambar lebih baik.

DSLR tahun 2004 dulu cuma 6 megapixel je. Tapi kitorang boleh print saiz billboard besar tepi highway Plus.

Billboard iklan #shootoniPhone kat highway tu semua cuma 12MP je.
Translated Text:
I don't really understand this megapixel race.

High megapixel camera does not mean better picture quality.

DSLRs in 2004 were only 6 megapixels. But we can print the size of a large billboard on the side of Highway Plus.

Billboards advertising #shootoniPhone on the highway are all only 12MP.

Text:
Megapixel besar ni diperlukan bila korang nak crop imej selepas shoot tanpa jejaskan kualiti.

Contoh, shoot full badan. Tapi cuma nak guna muka je.

Megapixel besar sebabkan saiz fail besar dan penuhkan storage phone.

Besarkan lagi saiz sensor. Kualiti gambar akan better.
Translated Text:
This large megapixel is needed when you want to crop the image after shooting without affecting the quality.

For example, full body shoot. But I just want to use my face.

Large megapixels cause large file sizes and fill up the phone's storage.

Increase the size of the sensor. The picture quality will be better.

Text:
Ini contoh gambar shoot tahun 2008 dulu guna camera 12 megapixel.

Cukup lighting, kualitinya boleh kalahkan banyak camera smartphone 108 megapixel tahun 2021 sekarang.

Kat billboard daripada jauh pun nampak sharp je.

Itulah. https://t.co/2NVwV0uPSY
Translated Text:
This is an example of a photo shoot in 2008 using a 12 megapixel camera.

Enough lighting, the quality can beat many 108 megapixel smartphone cameras in 2021 now.

The billboard looks sharp even from a distance.

That's it. https://t.co/2NVwV0uPSY

Text:
Lebih-lebih lagi bila tiada pilihan lain dalam konteks semasa.

Mufti bila keluarkan fatwa terhadap perkara yg tidak jelas, semua ada asas dan tujuannya. Dharurah juga diambil kira dalam dhawabit fatwa dalam isu semasa.

Keputusan pemerintah akan mengangkat khilaf (percanggahan).
Translated Text:
Especially when there is no other option in the current context.

When the mufti issues a fatwa on something that is not clear, everything has a basis and a purpose. Dharurah is also taken into account in the dhawabit fatwa in the current issue.

Government decisions will raise khilaf (contradictions).

Text:
Kerana fatwa tu dapat jadikan sesuatu hukum lebih kuat & kukuh tanpa 'mengikat'.

Maksudnya, kalau siapa yang berkemampuan berijtihad, buat kajian dsb, boleh je berbeza dengan fatwa. Nak amalkan berbeza, silakan.

Sebab bila dipersoalkan kelak masing2 ada jawapan dihadapan Allah.
Translated Text:
Because the fatwa can make a law stronger & strong without 'binding'.

Meaning, if someone is capable of ijtihad, do research, etc., it is possible to differ from the fatwa. Want to practice differently, please.

Because when asked later, everyone has an answer before God.

Text:
Perbankkan Islam ni tidak sempurna dan ia sentiasa ditambah baik.

Namun, pilihan bagi yang tak setuju dengan fatwa, sepatutnya tinggalkan kedua-duanya. Bukannya ambil konvensional yang terang riba.

Lain sangat hukumnya ambil riba dengan sedar vs mengikut fatwa.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
Islamic banking is not perfect and it is always being improved.

However, the choice for those who do not agree with the fatwa, should be to leave both. Instead of taking the obvious conventional.

Very different is the law of knowingly taking usury vs following the fatwa.

That's it.

Text: @acaiijawe sum up @rafiqpatriot
Translated Text: @acaiijawe sum up @rafiqpatriot

Text: @acaiijawe @mohdkautharr Kesalahan fatal perbankan islam ialah - Bergerak parallel dengan conventional banking termasuk dengan kadar untung boleh ubah (variable), untung memihak ke bank, rugi kembali ke pelanggan. End result dia kekalkan kebergantungan (berhutang) agar kekal untung.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @mohdkautharr The fatal mistake of Islamic banking is - Moving in parallel with conventional banking including variable profit rates, profits favoring the bank, losses going back to the customer. The end result is that he maintains dependence (in debt) in order to remain profitable.

Text:

Itulah. https://t.co/hZP7DdS0SY

That's it. https://t.co/hZP7DdS0SY

Text:
Bila solat kat rumah, kadangkala solat lambat. Dah jarang solat sunat rawatib (qabliah dan ba'diah).

Jarang nak duduk berlama-lama zikir selepas solat fardhu.

Jarang dah dengar pengajian/tazkirah 2-3 kali seminggu.

Hati makin lama makin keras. Asyik nak berbalah je kerjanya.
Translated Text:
When praying at home, sometimes the prayer is late. Rawatib circumcision prayers (qabliah and ba'diah) are rare.

It is rare to sit for long periods of dhikr after obligatory prayers.

Rarely have I heard the study/tazkirah 2-3 times a week.

The heart is getting harder and harder. It's fun to argue about work.

Text:
Bila dah tahu, barulah kembali berpijak di dunia nyata 😅. 

Itu info daripada McDonald's Malaysia ketika itu. Mungkin berbeza sekarang.

Kalau korang ada modal dan berminat buka McD boleh email diaorang:

franchising@my.mcd.com

Aku ada juga survey beberapa franchise lain juga.
Translated Text:
When you know, then you can get back on your feet in the real world 😅.

That was the info from McDonald's Malaysia at that time. Maybe different now.

If you have capital and are interested in opening McD, you can email him:

franchising@my.mcd.com

I also have a survey of several other franchises as well.

Text:
Antara franchise yang pernah aku survey untuk initial capital dulu.

Boost : RM350k
Secret Recipe : RM650k
7 Eleven : RM250k
Subway : RM1 juta
Tutti Frutti : RM150k
Daily Fresh : RM100k
Marrybrown : RM500k
Manhattan Fish Market : RM2 juta
Burger Abang Burn : RM85k
Translated Text:
Among the franchises that I have surveyed for initial capital first.

Boost : RM350k
Secret Recipe : RM650k
7 Eleven : RM250k
Subway : RM1 million
Tutti Frutti : RM150k
Daily Fresh : RM100k
Marry Brown : RM500k
Manhattan Fish Market: RM2 million
Abang Burn Burger: RM85k

Text:
Tapi buka franchise ni bukanlah semudah yang disangka. Kalau ada duit belum tentu diterima.

Kena ada funding ability, wajib hadir orientation program, kena buat market study & bentangkan.

Kena lulus evaluation + interview baru diterima. Setiap company berbeza-beza.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
But opening a franchise is not as easy as it seems. If there is money, it is not necessarily accepted.

Must have funding ability, must attend program orientation, must do market study & unfold.

Have to pass the evaluation + interview to be accepted. Every company is different.

That's it.

Text:
Namun perkara dosa, jangan diulang-ulang kerana akan menjadi tabiat buruk kepada kita.

Kerana bila dosa-dosa itu dah jadi tabiat, pasti sangat sukar untuk kita tinggalkan.

Ulanglah perkara yang baik-baik walaupun sedikit. Jangan sesekali mengulang dosa dan keburukan.
Translated Text:
But sin, do not repeat it because it will become a bad habit for us.

Because when those sins become a habit, it must be very difficult for us to leave them.

Repeat the good things even a little. Never repeat sins and vices.

Text:
Harap konsep ni bertambah popular di negara kita kelak.

Supaya lebih banyak rumah mampu milik dibina untuk generasi hadapan.

Cuma masalah harga rumah di Malaysia ni, sebenarnya margin untung developer terlalu tinggi 😎.

Construction cost +- 50% je dari harga rumah.

Itulah.
Translated Text:
Hope this concept becomes more popular in our country later.

So that more affordable houses are built for future generations.

The only problem with house prices in Malaysia is that the developer's profit margin is too high 😎.

Construction cost +- 50% of the price of the house.

That's it.

Text:
Kalau ada >100 ekor lembu, kena urus pengangkutan lebih awal. Sewa lori, upah pekerja dll.

Ini bukan macam beli barang kat Shopee.

Pengembala lembu kecil-kecilan ni, kadangkala 80% income tahunan datang dari jualan Raya Korban.

Kalau tiada, memang hilang sumber income utama.
Translated Text:
If there are > 100 cows, transport must be arranged in advance. Truck rental, employee wages etc.

This is not like buying things at Shopee.

These small cattle herders, sometimes 80% of their annual income comes from the sale of Raya Korban.

If not, the main source of income is lost.

Text:
Penduduk Makkah sendiri tidak berani nak jamin, sama ada mereka dapat tasrih (kuota/permit) haji.

Bila dapat tasrih baru boleh masuk kawasan ‘Masya'ir’ (Arafah, Muzdalifah, Mina) untuk buat haji.

Berani betul kutip duit orang beribu-ribu RM.

Hati-hati scam Upah Badal Haji ni. https://t.co/tvnP3tM7sE
Translated Text:
The people of Makkah themselves do not dare to guarantee whether they will get tasrih (quota/permit) for Hajj.

When you get the tasrih, you can enter the 'Masya'ir' area (Arafah, Muzdalifah, Mina) to perform Hajj.

Dare to collect people's money thousands of RM.

Beware of this Badal Hajj Wages scam. https://t.co/tvnP3tM7sE

Text:
Badal Haji = Buat haji bagi pihak orang lain.

Biasanya untuk muslim yang terhalang sebab penyakit, usia tua dan kematian (waris beri upah laksanakan haji bagi pihak simati).

Contoh. Sihat tapi jalani dialisis. Memang sampai bila-bila tak boleh tunaikan haji. Kena buat badal.
Translated Text:
Badal Hajj = Perform Hajj on behalf of others.

Usually for Muslims who are prevented due to illness, old age and death (heirs give wages to perform Hajj on behalf of Simati).

Example. Healthy but undergoing dialysis. It is true that you cannot perform Hajj at any time. Have to make badal.

Text:

"4 ciri yang jika ada pada seseorang, maka jadilah dia seorang munafik sejati.

"Sesungguhnya orang yang paling dibenci oleh Allah ialah orang yang melampau dalam berbalah."

(HR Bukhari)

"Indeed, the person most hated by Allah is the person who is extreme in arguing."

Text:

Orang yg punya iman pasti bahagia.

People who have faith must be happy.
 Say the sentence

Text:
Dari satu sudut, ia tunjukkan attention span remaja ni (termasuk kita semua) dah makin singkat.

Mereka sukar fokus benda yang slow & lambat. Termasuk membaca, tgk TV dsb.

Mungkin cikgu mengajar di kelas 30 minit macam satu penyiksaan.

Sebab dah biasa dengan 'kelajuan' Tiktok.
Translated Text:
From one angle, it shows that the attention span of these teenagers (including all of us) is getting shorter.

They have difficulty focusing on things that are slow & slow Including reading, watching TV etc.

Maybe the teacher teaches in class for 30 minutes like a torture.

Because I'm used to the 'speed' of Tiktok.

Text:
Untuk info, ia sesuatu yang positif. Boleh belajar banyak benda dalam masa singkat.

Tapi untuk ilmu yang perlukan fokus mendalam, perbahasan detail seperti bidang agama, bidang kritikal (perubatan alike),

Ia perlukan kefahaman untuk master bidang tersebut. Ia perlu kesabaran.
Translated Text:
For info, it's something positive. Can learn many things in a short time.

But for knowledge that requires deep focus, detailed debates such as religious fields, critical fields (medicine alike),

It requires understanding to master the field. It takes patience.

Text:
Trend ini mungkin merubah gaya hidup manusia akan datang, cara mendidik anak, pendidikan dsb.

Manarik untuk lihat bangsa manusia adaptasi dengan trend ini. Kita setuju ataupun tidak, ia tetap berlaku.

Aku pun tonton Youtube ceramah agama >30 minit guna 1.5x speed.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
This trend may change people's lifestyle in the future, how to educate children, education etc.

Interesting to see the human race adapt to this trend. Whether we agree or not, it still happens.

I also watched YouTube religious lectures > 30 minutes using 1.5x speed.

That's it.

Text:
Sejak ada Project Treble, Google dah pisahkan core Android OS dengan skin OEM (Samsung, Oppo, One Plus dll).

Maksudnya update Android sekarang dah 3-4 ganda lagi laju dan mudah untuk OEM berbanding dulu.

Jadi, lebih banyak phone akan dapat update Android lebih lama (3-4 tahun). https://t.co/whw5BrEOwv
Translated Text:
Since there was Project Treble, Google has separated the Android OS core from OEM skins (Samsung, Oppo, One Plus, etc.).

This means that Android updates are now 3-4 times faster and easier for OEMs than before.

So, more phones will be able to update Android for longer (3-4 years). https://t.co/whw5BrEOwv

Text:
Setakat harini, Arab Saudi masih belum keluarkan kebenaran menunaikan haji tahun ini.

Tapi mungkin hanya individu yang telah lengkap 2 dos vaksin Covid-19 sahaja dibenarkan tunai haji.

Semoga kita semua dapat tunaikan haji dalam keadaan muda, sihat dan sebelum kita mati kelak.
Translated Text:
As of today, Saudi Arabia has not yet issued permission to perform Hajj this year.

But maybe only individuals who have completed 2 doses of the Covid-19 vaccine are allowed to perform Hajj.

3. Tukar battery.

Percikan api akan kembali kuat selepas tukar battery.

Bagi yang tahu, nampak macam remeh. Tapi ramai yg tak tahu.

Begitulah. https://t.co/phzq8EA7Cd

Actually, you only need to change the battery under the stove.

1. Find the location of the battery.
2. Buy a new battery. Usually size D.
3. Change the battery.

The spark will return strongly after changing the battery.

That's it. https://t.co/phzq8EA7Cd

Text:
Bila baca ni, aku rasa.

Perempuan pun sebenarnya memang suka pasangan hidup(lelaki) yang lebih pandai dari mereka.

Ada ke yang suka sebaliknya?

Selain nak perbaiki genetik fizikal, ia juga nak pastikan kepandaian dan kecerdasan IQ itu diwarisi kepada zuriat mereka kelak.
Translated Text:
When I read this, I feel

Even women actually like life partners (men) who are smarter than them.

Anyone else like it?

In addition to improving physical genetics, they also want to ensure that intelligence and IQ are passed on to their offspring in the future.

Text:
Jadi bila jumpa 'husband material' yang fizikal menepati citarasa, bijak, baik akhlak, bagus agamanya,

Strategi terbaik: tunjukkan semua kepandaian kita ataupun kena 'bertenang'?

Atas kertas dan kemahuan kita mungkin berbeza dengan realiti sebenar manusia umumnya.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
So when you find a 'material husband' who physically suits your taste, is intelligent, has good morals, is good in religion,

The best strategy: show all our skills or have to 'keep calm'?

On paper and our will may be different from the actual reality of people in general.

That's it.

Text:
2. Kalau korang tengok Pengiraan Had Kifayah ini. Langsung tiada tulis Astro, saiz TV, besar peti ais, pakai kereta apa dan sebagainya.

3. Namun. Selain kiraan ini, Pegawai Zakat juga ada pertimbangan lain. Kat peringkat ini yang biasanya penilaian faktor lain dilakukan. https://t.co/hCSnp0Y9wD
Translated Text:
2. If you look at this Kifayah Limit Calculation. No writing on Astro, size of TV, size of fridge, what kind of car you use and so on.

3. However. In addition to this count, the Zakat Officer also has other considerations. It is at this stage that the assessment of other factors is usually done. https://t.co/hCSnp0Y9wD

Text:
Apa pertimbangan tu?

Institusi Zakat follow rules ni.

1. Daruriyat (Basic necessities) : Makan, minum, tempat tinggal. e.g Makan 2x sehari.

2. Hajiyat (Good to have) : e.g Makan tu lauk sedap. KFC, Udang, Ketam.

3. Tahsiniyat (Nice to have) : e.g Deserts, kek, aiskrim dll.
Translated Text:
What's that consideration?

Zakat institutions follow these rules.

1. Daruriyat (Basic necessities): Eat, drink, place to live. e.g Eat 2x a day.

2. Hajiyat (Good to have): e.g Eat delicious side dishes. KFC, Shrimp, Crab.

3. Tahsiniyat (Nice to have) : e.g Deserts, cakes, ice cream etc.

Text:
Maksudnya Keperluan Asas wajib DIUTAMAKAN terlebih dahulu sebelum keperluan lain.

Makanan, tempat tinggal, pendidikan (jika ada anak sekolah), perubatan (jika sakit) dsb.

Sebab keutamaan ini selalunya gagal difahami. Tak mampu, tapi berbelanja lebih kemampuan benda yg trivial.
Translated Text:
This means that Basic Needs must be PRIORITIZED first before other needs.

Food, shelter, education (if there are school children), medicine (if sick) etc.

The reason for this preference is often misunderstood. Can't afford it, but spend more than you can afford on trivial things.

Text:
Contoh sebenar?

• Ada yang bayar Astro RM150 sebulan, tapi minta bantuan makanan bulanan.

• Ada yang pakai superbike (RM1k sebulan) tapi minta bantuan sewa rumah.

• Permohonan meragukan. Contoh, gaji declare RM1.2k. Tapi pakai Honda City, iPhone 12, Macbook bayar bulan2.
Translated Text:
A real example?

• Some pay Astro RM150 a month, but ask for monthly food assistance.

• Some use superbikes (RM1k per month) but ask for help renting a house.

• Doubtful application. For example, declare a salary of RM1.2k. But use Honda City, iPhone 12, Macbook pay monthly.

Text:
• Ada yang keperluan asas dia motorsikal. Dia boleh beli EX5. Tapi beli Ysuku harga RM12,000. Lepas tu minta bantuan makanan untuk family dan bayar hutang.

Atas sebab itu pengiraan Had Kifayah, tidak jadi satu-satunya cara nak buat siasatan.

Pertimbangan seperti ini perlu.
Translated Text:
• There are those whose basic needs are motorcycles. He can buy EX5. But buy Ysuku for RM12,000. Then ask for help with food for the family and pay the debt.

For that reason, the calculation of Had Kifayah is not the only way to investigate.

This kind of consideration is necessary.

Text:
Kesimpulannya.

Bukannya Astro yang jadi ukuran. Sebab ramai je yang pakai Astro merupakan asnaf fakir miskin.

Cuma pelik, bila bayar Astro RM150 setiap bulan mampu, bayar iPhone RM400 24 bulan mampu, bayar motor RM400 3 tahun mampu.

Tapi anak isteri sendiri tak cukup makan.
Translated Text:
The conclusion.

Astro is not the measure. Because many people who use Astro are poor people.

It's just strange, if you pay Astro RM150 every month, you can afford it, you can afford to pay iPhone RM400 for 24 months, you can afford to pay RM400 for a motorbike for 3 years.

But the wife and children themselves do not have enough to eat.

Text:
Kenapa mereka boleh bayar ansur begitu?

Yaa. Sebab mereka YAKIN, DUIT ZAKAT boleh bayarkan sewa rumah dia, bagi mereka makanan bulanan, support anak2 dia sekolah 100%.

Asas tak lepas, tapi hidup agak ‘mewah’.

Penilaian menyeluruh dapat kenalpasti pemohon tidak layak ini.
Translated Text:
Why can they pay so much?

Yes. Because they are CONVINCED, ZAKAT MONEY can pay their house rent, give them monthly food, support their children in school 100%.

The basics don't go away, but life is a bit 'luxurious'.

A comprehensive assessment can identify these ineligible applicants.

Text:
Kerana duit zakat ni sebenarnya nak cukupkan keperluan asas sahaja.

Bukannya nak bagi 'kemewahan'.

Setiap tahun beribu-ribu keluarga baru jadi asnaf. 65,000 keluarga bakal bertambah kepada 70,000 keluarga dlm masa singkat sahaja di Selangor.

Duit zakat terhad.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
Because this zakat money is actually to meet basic needs only.

Not to give 'luxury'.

Every year thousands of new families become asnaf. 65,000 families will increase to 70,000 families in a short time in Selangor.

Zakat money is limited.

That's it.

Text:
Bab dosa dan maksiat ini, jalan terbaik adalah kita berusaha menjauhinya.

Namun jika tergelincir juga, janganlah cerita kepada orang lain. Paling penting jangan bangga dengan dosa tersebut.

Sentiasa bertaubat. Cuba tinggalkan dan hidup dengan lebih baik.

Jauhi kemurkaan Allah.
Translated Text:
Regarding this sin and vice, the best way is for us to try to stay away from it.

But if it slips, don't tell others. The most important thing is not to be proud of the sin.

Always repent. Try to leave and live better.

Avoid the wrath of God.

Developer berhempas pulas kerja siang malam buat software sampai 3-12 bulan. Hasil idea mereka memudahkan kerja kita.

Piracy = Mencuri. Ia haram.

Developers work day and night to create software for up to 3-12 months. The results of their ideas make our work easier.

Piracy = Stealing. It is illegal.

TETAPI kewajipan bayar Zakat Fitrah masih tetap perlu dilaksanakan SEGERA jika teringat.

Bagaimana caranya?

Bayar secara online. Sebab semua Amil di kariah dan masjid tu dah TIADA KEBENARAN untuk kutip zakat fitrah lagi.

https://t.co/dCh3gP5d9S

Pilih QADA ZAKAT.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
BUT the obligation to pay Zakat Fitrah still needs to be implemented IMMEDIATELY if remembered.

How to do it?

Pay online. Because all the Amils in the parish and the mosque have NO AUTHORITY to collect zakat fitrah anymore.

https://t.co/dCh3gP5d9S

Select QADA ZAKAT.

That's it.

Translated Text: @Libang_libu He is just like us, we leave the obligatory prayer. He sinned because he left the duty. But still have to Qada' the prayer. Wallahua'lam.

Text: @acaiijawe saya sebenarnya ada satu persoalan yang dh lama nk tanya pasal zakat ni, mcm mana kalau terbayar zakat guna credit card masa fpx payment tu? and bayaran kpd credit card tu pulak dibayar lepas ramadhan.. ni kira mcm mana ehh? kira belum bayar zakat atau dikira bank tolong bayarkn?

I think I haven't paid zakat or it's the bank, please pay?

Text:
@Emifarhan 1. Buat masa ini tiada payment guna Kad Kredit lagi. Semuanya Debit Card sahaja.

2. Jika ada Kad Kredit pun sama tuan. Sebab syarikat tersebut dah bayarkan bagi pihak pemegang kad terlebih dahulu. Bayaran telah diterima oleh institusi zakat.
Translated Text:
@Emifarhan 1. For now there is no credit card payment. All Debit Card only.

2. If there is a Credit Card, same sir. Because the company has already paid on behalf of the cardholder first. The payment has been received by the zakat institution.

Text: @acaiijawe Saya disiplin kan diri, seawal 1 ramadhan settlekan siap2 zakat fitrah, manusia mudah lupa, terlupa naya je, sia2 puasa sebulan

Text: @Fazly771 Ini yang terbaik tuan. Kena set reminder bagi yang selalu terlupa.
Translated Text: @Fazly771 This is the best sir. Have to set a reminder for those who always forget.

Text: @acaiijawe Tuan, boleh ke gabung bayaran qadha zakat utk beberapa ahli keluarga sekaligus? Sebab di link tu, hanya letakkan nama seorang sahaja.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sir, can you combine qadha zakat payments for several family members at once? Because in that link, only put the name of one person.

Text: @nuurhhanum Boleh, takde masalah. Tapi sekiranya nak bayar bagi pihak orang lain memang kena dapatkan kebenaran mereka. Melainkan mereka semua berada dalam tanggungan kita.
Translated Text: @nuurhhanum Yes, no problem. But if you want to pay on behalf of someone else, you have to get their permission. Unless they are all under our care.

Text: @acaiijawe Bagaimana dengan fidyah ya encik?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe What about fidyah sir?

Text: @guluub Fidyah takde masalah bayar pada bila-bila masa. Jika tak bayar waktu Ramadan, boleh bayar pada masa lain.
Translated Text: @guluub Fidyah has no problem paying at any time. If you don't pay during Ramadan, you can pay at other times.

Text:
@MiMeGiKaRi Betul tu. Bagi user, lepas je tolak duit itu dah dikira selesai. Back-end process tu urusan Amil.

In fact, jika bayar kepada Amil di masjid dan suraupun, kami di LZS tidak dapat serta merta duit tersebut sampailah mereka bank-in dan masuk sistem selepas beberapa hari.
Translated Text:
@MiMeGiKaRi That's right. For the user, after deducting the money, it is considered complete. The back-end process is Amil's business.

In fact, if you pay to Amil at the mosque and surau, we at LZS can't get the money right away until they bank-in and enter the system after a few days.

Text: @acaiijawe Salam tuan sy byr zakat lagi 2 hari nak raya melalui web zakat selangor tapi lepas byr dia kata process dalam masa 8 hari. Kalau mcm itu mcmne ya tuan? Kalau ikut kn dalam masa 8 hari sudah habis ramadhan

Text:
@PacatM Wakilkan bayar zakat tiada masalah dan sah hukumnya.

Namun, untuk bayarkan bagi pihak orang lain, kita perlu dapatkan kebenaran mereka terlebih dahulu. Sebab ini urusan ibadah dan tanggungjawab individu. Mungkin mereka telah bayar atau nak laksanakan sendiri. WA.
Translated Text:
@PacatM Delegate paying zakat is no problem and legal.

However, to pay on behalf of others, we need to get their permission first. Because this is a matter of worship and individual responsibility. Maybe they have paid or want to do it themselves. WA.

Text: @acaiijawe Sedangkan solat yg wajib daily pun ada yg sangkut, apatah lagi zakat fitrah yang amalan nya setahun sekali ni. Wallahualam. Semoga Allah bantu kita utk jaga amalan kita sebaikya.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe While there are obligatory daily prayers, there is something wrong with it, not to mention zakat fitrah which is practiced once a year. God bless you. May God help us to keep our practices as good as possible.

Text:
Aku anti orang yang memperbodohkan akal dan membawa kerosakan dalam masyarakat dengan maklumat salah dan palsu.

Mohon sahabat semua bantu report akaun ini dan akaun lain yang berkaitan antivax ni.

Bila ada orang sebar kefahaman salah secara terbuka, kita kena usaha betulkan.
Translated Text:
I am against people who fool the mind and bring damage in society with wrong and false information.

Please friends all help report this account and other accounts related to antivax.

When someone spreads a misunderstanding openly, we have to try to correct it.

Text:
Aku tak pasti orang lain. Tapi semua antivax yang aku kenal rapat, memang dulu masa sekolah, pelajar yang lemah dlm pelajaran dan berfikir.

Yang geng universiti pun jenis lulus cukup makan setiap semester. Pemalas, suka cakap merapu.

Semua member2 tahu level IQ mereka ni.
Translated Text:
I'm not sure about anyone else. But all the antivax that I know closely, it was when I was in school, students who were weak in studies and thinking.

The university gangs are the type to pass and have enough to eat every semester. Lazy, likes to talk.

All members know their IQ level.

Text:
Degree bidang sendiripun tak jadi pakar, tiba-tiba jadi 'pakar rujuk' dalam bidang yang kompleks seperti Bidang Perubatan!!

Mungkin yang percaya pun IQ mereka lebih kurang sama.

Jenis percaya low level evidence. Tapi tak dapat comprehend bukti saintifik. Sebab mmg takkan faham.
Translated Text:
A degree in the field itself does not make you an expert, suddenly you become a 'referral expert' in a complex field such as Medicine!!

Maybe even those who believe their IQ are more or less the same.

The type that believes in low level evidence. But can't comprehend the scientific evidence. Because you won't understand.

Text:
Kita lawan antivax yang totok.

Jenis percaya konspirasi mengarut, asatizah yang suka bercakap di luar bidang mereka dan influencer yang IQ mereka rendah.

Tapi bagi Vaccine Hesitancy, kita kena terus bantu bagi pencerahan dan maklumat penting. Terutama warga emas.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
We are against antivax.

Nonsense conspiracy-minded types, idiots who like to talk outside of their field and low-IQ influencers.

But for Vaccine Hesitancy, we have to continue to help for enlightenment and important information. Especially the elderly.

That's it.

Gaya penulisan dan nasihat yang diberikan lebih berhikmah dari pelbagai sudut pandang.

This book in my opinion is very suitable for those who are still looking for the spirit to get out of sadness & disappointment in life.

It helps to build our spirit and character to become stronger. https://t.co/9drGNnI4MB

Text:

Dia nak kita lebih objektif dalam memahami masalah yang sedang kita hadapi.

Supaya akhirnya, kita ada strategi tukarkan kekecewaan tu kepada perkara yang lebih baik. https://t.co/QcfAMnYvfp
Translated Text:
More interesting, in this book the author gives simple exercise questions in the form of questions and answers.

He wants us to be more objective in understanding the problems we are facing.

So that in the end, we have a strategy to turn that disappointment into something better. https://t.co/QcfAMnYvfp

Text:
2. Mutasyaddiqun : Golongan yang suka bercakap dengan gaya yang merendahkan-rendahkan atau meremehkan orang lain.

3. Mutafayhiqun : Golongan yang bila bercakap, suka cerita tentang dirinya sahaja untuk tonjolkan dirinya lebih dari orang lain.

Elakkan jadi golongan ini.
Translated Text:
2. Mutasyaddiqun: People who like to talk in a style that belittles or belittles others.

3. Mutafayhiqun: People who, when talking, like to tell stories about themselves only to highlight themselves more than others.

Avoid being this group.

Text:
Dalil.

Rasulullah saw bersabda.

“Sesungguhnya orang yang paling aku benci dan paling jauh kedudukannya daripadaku pada hari Kiamat ialah orang yang paling lebat sembangnya, orang yang suka memperolok orang lain dan orang yang sombong bicaranya.”

(HR al-Tirmidzi)
Translated Text:
Proposition.

The Messenger of God said.

"Indeed, the person I hate the most and the farthest position from me on the Day of Judgment is the person who talks the most, the person who likes to make fun of others and the person who is proud of his speech."

(HR al-Tirmidhi)

Text: @acaiijawe Ifag
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Ifag

Text:
Sebenarnya telah sepakat 4 Mazhab tidak boleh batalkan puasa Qada'.

Sebab puasa tersebut dikira amalan wajib. Ia sama seperti sengaja batalkan puasa Ramadan tanpa sebarang uzur Syarie.

Begitu juga puasa Kaffarah dan Nazar.

Boleh rujuk Majmuk Al-Fatawa & Kitab Al-Mughni. https://t.co/ASe8Z86Ys9
Translated Text:
In fact, it has been agreed that 4 sects cannot cancel the Qada' fast.

Because fasting is considered a mandatory practice. It is the same as deliberately canceling the Ramadan fast without any Syarie excuse.

So is the fasting of Kaffarah and Nazar.

Can refer to Majmuk Al-Fatawa & Book of Al-Mughni. https://t.co/ASe8Z86Ys9

Text:
Memang ada hadis cerita berbuka puasa bila dapat jemputan makan. Tetapi ia ketika berpuasa sunat.

Puasa Qada' adalah puasa wajib.

Semua ulama' tidak khilaf bab ini atau keliru dengan hadis tersebut ketika keluarkan hukum.

Ini ulasan guru kami Maulana Nasaie tentang ini.

WA. https://t.co/QnpBul6kOP
Translated Text:
There is indeed a hadith story of breaking the fast when invited to eat. But it was during circumcision fasting.

Fasting Qada' is an obligatory fast.

All scholars are not wrong about this chapter or confused by the hadith when issuing the law.

This is our teacher Maulana Nasaie's comment on this.

WA. https://t.co/QnpBul6kOP

Text: @acaiijawe Maaf tanya, kalau mak2 menyusu mcm mana? Kadang bila banyak sgt bergerak sana sini lepastu menyusukan anak lagi, rasa letih yg melampau sgt. Bila letih dan kita rasa susu kurang boleh ke berbuka? Ke kena teruskan juga berpuasa?

Text: @IbuThaqeef Sama macam puasa Ramadan, ada keringanan bagi yang uzur Syar’ie. Mereka sahaja dibolehkan untuk berbuka puasa.

Translated Text: @syapiqkylez You don't have to pay anything. It's just that it's illegal and sinful because it cancels the obligatory fast.

Text:
@acaiijawe Betul ke kalau tak ganti puasa tahun lepas, tahun ni kena double?

Confused because some people say you have to do that. As far as I know, double fidyah only

Text: @yeolahv Puasa takkan kena double sampai bila-bila. Bagi yang berpegang fidyah itu kena digandakan, memang hanya fidyah tersebut yang akan berganda.
Translated Text: @yeolahv Fasting will not be doubled until anytime. For those who hold the fidyah must be doubled, indeed only the fidyah will be doubled.

Text: @acaiijawe Alang2 cerita pasal qada puasa ni kan, ada lelaki yang saya kenal ni berbuka masa last day ramadhan sebab rasa nak pengsan bakar beratus lemang dengan cuaca yang panas membahang. So dia perlu qada saja atau bayar fidyah sekali ya?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Let me tell you about this qada fasting, right? There is a man I know who breaks his fast on the last day of Ramadan because he feels like he wants to burn hundreds of lemangs in the scorching hot weather. So he only needs to qada or pay fidyah once?

Text: @tr_tii Cukup sekadar qada' kan puasa yang ditinggalkan tersebut.
Translated Text: @tr_tii It's enough just to make up for the missed fast.

Text: @acaiijawe Maksudnya kalau tak sempat bersahur utk qada’ puasa tersebut, kena teruskan jgk ke sbb da pasang niat dari malam?

Text: @zreenmdisa Betul. Sama macam puasa Ramadan. Walu terlepas sahur, masih tetap wajib selesaikan.
Translated Text: @zreenmdisa Right. Just like Ramadan fasting. If you miss suhoor, you still have to complete it.

Text:
Adakah mungkin, bila taraf hidup penduduk sesuatu kawasan telah meningkat, mereka lebih selesa berbelanja di tempat yang lebih mewah?

Pengalaman yang mungkin berbeza ketika berbelanja di Tesco, MyDin, Giant, Speedmart dsb.

Harga bukan lagi jadi faktor utama ketika beli grocery. https://t.co/DJ3qwIRyLE
Translated Text:
Is it possible, when the living standards of the residents of an area have increased, they are more comfortable spending in more luxurious places?

The experience may be different when shopping at Tesco, MyDin, Giant, Speedmart etc.

Price is no longer the main factor when buying groceries. https://t.co/DJ3qwIRyLE

Text:
Atau memang mereka pergi sini sebab premium grocer ni menawarkan produk yang tiada di supermarket biasa?

Contohnya makanan organik, jajan luar negara dan produk-produk import yang harganya 2-3 kali ganda dari barang tempatan.

Menarik juga untuk buat kajian tentang ni. https://t.co/Fqd6n488tq
Translated Text:
Or do they go here because this premium grocer offers products that are not available in regular supermarkets?

For example, organic food, foreign snacks and imported products that cost 2-3 times more than local items.

It is also interesting to do research on this. https://t.co/Fqd6n488tq

Text:
@acaiijawe Lokasi, lokasi, lokasi. Kalau dah kenal pasti demographic sesuatu kawasan, letak kedai bawah apartment/condo pun dah cukup. Pemudah cara utk penduduk disitu membeli barang dapur. 

Tak ada insentif nak pi jauh2 ke giant, mydin, speedmart. Buang masa dan keringat je.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Location, location, location. If you have identified the demographics of an area, putting a shop under an apartment/condo is enough. Easy way for residents there to buy kitchen items.

There is no incentive to go far to giant, mydin, speedmart. Waste of time and sweat.

Text: @acaiijawe Went to premium grocer just to get snack from overseas and cheese. On other day, I'm happy buying from Segi and NSK sebab murah.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau saya la memandangkan pandemik skrg ni, saya cari yang terdekat dengan rumah. Tak kisah benda tu pricy skit. Sbb sama je nak g jauh2 pun, minyak knderaan lagi. 😂 . Tp kalau bnd ni kt kdai a rm5, kt kdai b rm10. Memang mlampau. 😂 . Sanggup pegi kdai b
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If it's me, given the current pandemic, I'm looking for the one closest to home. Don't care that thing is pricy skit. Because it's the same if you want to go far, more vehicle oil. 😂 But if this item is RM5 at store A, RM10 at store B. It's too late. 😂 Willing to go to kdai b

Text: @acaiijawe Depend jugak. Dekat star avenue ada giant tutup, nsk replace, terus ramai lagi. NSK lg murah dah less "premium" tp ramai yg suka.

Text: @acaiijawe For me, suka ke village grocer compare to tesco sbb barang yang nak beli tu selalu akan ada. If dekat tesco selalu takde stock. Second sbb tak ramai org. Tesco, kaunter banyak bukaknya 3 je, vg selalunya memang tak panjang pon beratur.

Second because there are not many people. Tesco, there are only 3 counters open, and there are usually not long queues.

Text: @acaiijawe Kat daerah Batu Pahat, Tesco Parit Raja dah dikira macam paling kemas & bersih, sebab orang Batu Pahat masih suka pasaraya lain yang tawarkan harga lebih murah dan tak ramai beli barang kat Tesco.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe In the Batu Pahat district, Tesco Parit Raja has been counted as the neatest & clean, because the people of Batu Pahat still like other supermarkets that offer cheaper prices and not many people buy things at Tesco.

Text:
@acaiijawe Pada saya, feel.
Harga mungkin lebih mahal, tapi feel yang tempat tu bagi, buatkan orang sanggup bayar perbezaan harga tu.
Contoh mcm starbucks. Ada je somewhere else yg offer better taste, or lebih kurang.
Tapi why starbucks, sbb feel, masuk masuk bau kopi, tenang.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe To me, feel.
The price may be more expensive, but the feel that the place gives, makes people willing to pay the price difference.
An example is starbucks. There is somewhere else that offers better taste, or more or less.
But why starbucks, as it feels, the smell of coffee when you walk in, calm down.

Text: @acaiijawe Di Kota Damansara ada Giant, NSK, Jaya Grocer dan Village Grocer. Macam saya suka ke Jaya Grocer sebab tempat kemas dan bersih. Tempat ikan/ayam/daging tak berbau dan kering bersih. Sayur mayur segar2. Susunan pun mudah nak cari. Dan brg2 mcm minyak masak kadang lg murah dr Giant
Translated Text: @acaiijawe In Kota Damansara there are Giant, NSK, Jaya Grocer and Village Grocer. I like to go to Jaya Grocer because the place is neat and clean. Where fish/chicken/meat is odorless and dry and clean. Fresh vegetables. The arrangement is easy to find. And things like cooking oil are sometimes cheaper from Giant

Text: @acaiijawe Sebab bersih, packaging best, fresh, tak sesak.. Tak mcm econsave busukkkkk n ramai org xsuka

Text: @acaiijawe Kena mai giant penang bayan baru 🤣 ramai dia tak relax ye kalau sabtu ahad lagi lah.

Text: @acaiijawe Klu sy, sy x kesah kedai besar ke kecik janji dia nmpk mcm ditopup setiap hari. Tak kisah la brg basah ke brg kering. Kdg2 tgk ayam ikan yg dijual mcm br sudah kena dera. Mknn kering kat rak pulak byk kosong. Agak x best la feeling mcm beli brg saki baki ni
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Klu sy, I don't go to big or small stores, I promise I can see how it's topped up every day. It doesn't matter if it's wet or dry. When you see the chicken and fish that are sold like this, they have been abused. If it's dry, the shelf is empty. It's a little bit better, it feels like I'm buying leftovers

Translated Text: @acaiijawe For wet/dry goods will go to NSK! but if you're looking for organic stuff! imported food! The food at NSK doesn't have salmon, the meat/chicken is ready to be marinated! (Prefer Village Grocer from Jaya Grocer! Village has lots of rare items)

Text: @acaiijawe Ok berdasarkan pengalaman aku as pekerja AEON (Shah Alam, Quill City, Taman U & Bukit Indah), even though aku pernah kerja kat big supermarket, tetap tak sama macam tempat aku kerja kat Village Grocer sekarang. Kualiti & customer service are the top priority.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Ok, based on my experience as an AEON worker (Shah Alam, Quill City, Taman U & Bukit Indah), even though I've worked at a big supermarket, it's still not the same as where I work at Village Grocer now. Quality & customer service is the top priority.

Text: @acaiijawe I love their presentation. Rasa tak serabut mataaa and easy to choosee. Lepastuuu kenkadang barang dekat jaya grocer ni tkde dekat tempat lain 😅
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I love their presentation. It doesn't make your eyes twitch and is easy to choose. Then sometimes the items near Jaya Grocer are not near anywhere else 😅

Text: @acaiijawe Barang tersusun tak bersepah, bersih n tak ramai orang sangat.actually harga sayur tak lah mahal unless ambik yg organic.n bawang pun ikut harga market kalau ambik yg siap pack tu kat dalam pun semua elok2 je
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The things are organized, not messy, clean and there aren't many people. Actually the price of vegetables is not expensive unless you buy organic ones. And onions also follow the market price if you buy the ones that are already packed inside, everything is good

Text: @acaiijawe Presentation (susun atur kemas/ senang nak cari barang), hygiene (even kat tempat barang basah pun bersih & kering & tak berbau), comfort (tak ramai/ kurang sesak)/ more options - itu priority saya.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Presentation (arrange and pack/ easy to find stuff), hygiene (even in wet places where things are clean & dry & odorless), comfort (not crowded/less crowded)/ more options - that's my priority.

Text: @acaiijawe Sy pun perasan juga. Sbb kdg² pelik ada org yg komplen harga brg skrg mahal. Sbb sy beli ayam kat Tesco RM5.99/kg dan masih blh berbelanja <RM150 untuk sebulan. Dorang terkejut dan sy tanya beli katne, jawabnya kat JG, VG, dll. Terfikir juga, knp pergi sana klu xnak mahal. 🥲
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sy noticed it too. Because it is strange that there are people who complain that the price is now expensive. Because I bought chicken at Tesco for RM5.99/kg and I can still spend <RM150 for a month. You were surprised and I asked where to buy, the answer was JG, VG, etc. I also thought, why go there if you don't want to be expensive. 🥲

Translated Text: @acaiijawe I often buy dry goods, so I only go to giant because I want to collect CC points. But there is no denying that wet goods & vegetables are not attractive. That's what parents bought in an Aceh shop

Text: @acaiijawe Presentation. Presentation. Presentation. Masuk grocer premium perasaan tu lain betul. Seronok nak berbelanja dan walau harga lagi mahal rasa berbaloi beli. Contoh mudah dekat rumah aku ada Star Grocer dan Segi Fresh tapi aku tetap ke Star Grocer dan sanggup bayar lebih.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Presentation. Presentation. Presentation. Entering a premium grocer feels different. It's fun to shop and even though the price is expensive, it's worth buying. A simple example near my house is Star Grocer and Segi Fresh but I still go to Star Grocer and am willing to pay more.

Text:
Ia tunjukkan Islam ni agama yang relevan sepanjang masa. Hukumnya memahami konteks situasi semasa.

Contohnya, solat di rumah dan solat secara jarak itu adalah lebih sunnah ketika musim pendemik yang membunuh manusia.

Semua tindakan yang membahayakan nyawa manusia itu berdosa.
Translated Text:
It shows that Islam is a religion that is relevant at all times. The law understands the context of the current situation.

For example, praying at home and praying at a distance is more sunnah during the epidemic season that kills people.

All actions that endanger human life are sinful.

Text:

Kita hormati keilmuan mereka dalam bidang agama, TAPI mereka hanya orang awam dalam bidang ni.

Jika nasihat mengarut mereka sebabkan kematian lebih ramai, mereka juga kena dipersalahkan.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
Asatizah who is sweeping in this matter we leave his opinion.

We respect their knowledge in the field of religion, BUT they are just laymen in this field.

If their stupid advice causes more deaths, they are also to blame.

That's it.
