Text:
Kalau follow pasangan muda dah kahwin, mungkin banyak cerita tentang

• Spam gambar anak-anak.
• Cerita anak demam.
• Share masakan, deco rumah.
• Nak beli rumah.
• Masalah pasangan hidup.
• Bincang isu taska/edu anak.
• Susu ibu dll.

Sebab itulah dunia mereka.
Translated Text:
If you follow a young married couple, there may be many stories about

• Spam pictures of children.
• The story of a child with a fever.
• Share cooking, home decoration.
• Want to buy a house.
• Spouse problems.
• Discuss the nursery/childcare issue.
• Breast milk etc.

Because that is their world.

Text:
Kalau follow ramai yg berusia pula banyak cerita

• Masalah anak remajanya.
• Cerita tentang cucu.
• Sakit kronik 3 serangkai.
• Isu-isu di masjid.
• Kawan2 yang dah mati awal dll.

Setiap generasi ada isu berbeza.

Inilah dunia. Kita semua bakal melaluinya.

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
If you follow many old people, there are many stories

• The problem of his teenage son.
• Stories about grandchildren.
• Chronic pain 3 series.
• Issues in the mosque.
• Friends who have died early etc.

Every generation has different issues.

This is the world. We will all go through it.

That's it.

Text:
Bayangkan kerja 3-4 hari je sebulan boleh dapat >RM8,000. Kalah kerja eksekutif kat ofis 😅.

Sebenarnya tahun 2021 & 2021 ni harga sawit paling tinggi sejak lebih 10 tahun lepas.

Biasanya harga sekitar RM300-450 camtu je untuk 1 tan Buah Tandan Segar (BTS).

Begitulah.
Translated Text:
Imagine working just 3-4 days a month to get >RM8,000. Lose the executive job at the office 😅.

Actually the year 2021 & 2021 is the highest oil palm price since more than 10 years ago.

Usually the price is around RM300-450 for 1 ton of Fresh Bunches (BTS).

That's it.

Text:
Tapi kerja memetik, jaga, baja dan loading sawit ni bukan kerja mudah. Aku tahu sebab memang membesar dengan hasil sawit. 

Antara Youtuber yang selalu share loading sawit yang aku selalu tengok adalah Dimas Pratama. Indonesian yang kerja di Malaysia.

https://t.co/fCAprSrG8w
Translated Text:
But the work of picking, guarding, steel and loading palm oil is not an easy job. I know because I grew up with palm oil.

Among the Youtubers who always share the palm loading that I always see is Dimas Pratama. Indonesians working in Malaysia.

https://t.co/fCAprSrG8w

Text: @alififra @_rezarazali_ Itu punca harga sawit meningkat. Sebab shortage satu dunia bekalan sebab musim Covid. Sebagai pengeluar sawit utama dunia sepatutnya minyak masak kita murah dan rendah.

Text: @acaiijawe Tuan, berapa lama jangka hayat pokok kelapa sawit, dari ia mula membuahkan hasil hinggalah tiada lagi hasil dikeluarkan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Sir, how long is the lifespan of an oil palm tree, from the time it begins to bear fruit until it no longer produces fruit?

Text:
@mrfotografer_ Dari pokok sawit ditanam sehingga keluarkan hasil dalam 2-3 tahun. Pokok sawit yang cukup baja dan dijaga persekiratannya, boleh bertahan keluarkan hasil sampai 25 tahun (produktif).

Ada yang sampai 30 tahun pun ada.
Translated Text:
@mrfotografer_ From the date palm trees are planted until they produce fruit in 2-3 years. A palm tree that is sufficiently fertilized and cared for, can last for up to 25 years (productive).

Some are even 30 years old.

Text: @acaiijawe Best.Saya turun ladang sabtu ahad je.Keje baja racun semak,bersih kebun semua saya buat.Dkt situ dpt save bajet upah.Cuma petik buah jela upah org indo buat.Tak larat nak angkat berat.kadang masyuk juga.Lagi2 skrg harga tgh naik.Lpas cuti raya terus roger pekerja indo petik buah
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Best. I go down to the farm on Saturdays and Sundays. It's a waste of fertilizers and pesticides, I clean the garden all I do. That's where I can save the wage budget. I just pick fruit and pay people to do it. I'm not good at lifting weights. Sometimes I'm too busy. More now. The price has gone up. After the Raya holidays, Indonesian workers continue to pick fruit

Text:
Ini maksud aku free-wheel scrolling. Dia punya wheel inertia ni boleh jadi free macam video ni ataupun set normal ‘krek krek krek’ tu.

Kita yang tentukan. Tapi dia senyap dan rasa premium steel tactile tu.

Ia membantu kalau buat coding, Word, Excel yang ada beribu line. https://t.co/dallY1errT
Translated Text:
This is what I mean by free-wheel scrolling. He has this inertia wheel, it can be free like this video or the normal set 'crack crack crack'.

We decide. But it's quiet and feels premium steel tactile.

It helps when doing coding, Word, Excel that has thousands of lines. https://t.co/dallY1errT

Text:
Bagi mereka biarpun jarang pergi, tapi jangan sesekali runtuhkan masjid dan maruah agamanya diinjak.

Manusia ni ada pelbagai karakter dgn kualiti berbeza.

Ada yang gagah berani.
Ada yang pandai bercakap.
Ada yang pandai menulis.
Ada yang bijak rancang strategi.

Semua berbeza.
Translated Text:
For them, even if they rarely go, they should never destroy the mosque and trample on their religious dignity.

Humans have various characters with different qualities.

Some are brave.
Some are good at talking.
Some are good at writing.
There are smart people who plan strategies.

All different.

Text:
Jalan menuju Allah ni ada banyak. Berjihad di jalan Allah juga satu cara masuk syurga.

Mungkin dari sudut ibadah malam dia kurang, tapi dia sanggup MATI demi agamanya.

Sesuatu yang mungkin ahli ibadah dan ahli akademik kurang berani. Takut sgt ketika berhadapan senjata & bom.
Translated Text:
There are many paths to God. Jihad in the way of God is also a way to enter heaven.

Maybe from the point of view of night worship he lacks, but he is willing to DIE for his religion.

Something that worshipers and academics may be less brave. Very scared when dealing with weapons & bomb.

Text:
Jadi, kita semua berjihad dengan cara masing-masing. Jangan merendahkan perjuangan orang lain.

Akhirnya yang nilai kita ni Allah. Semua yg berlaku dalam pengetahuan Allah.

Semua kita menuju syurga dengan cara yang berbeza-beza. Sentiasa doa untuk Palestin dalam solat kita.
Translated Text:
So, we all fight in our own way. Don't belittle other people's struggles.

In the end, God is our value. Everything that happens is in God's knowledge.

We all go to heaven in different ways. Always pray for Palestine in our prayers.

Text: @acaiijawe Masha-Allah. Penulisan yang baik.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Masha Allah. Good writing.

Text: @acaiijawe solat wajib 5 waktu, muazzin  seru datang untuk solat tak nak solat. Dia cakap busy. Tapi solat aidilfitri  pukul 7pagi tercegat depan masjid nak solat saf pertama.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe obligatory prayer 5 times a day, the muazzin calls out to come to pray if you don't want to pray. He said he was busy. But the Aidilfitri prayer at 7am was interrupted in front of the mosque to pray the first row.

Text:
Sebab raya tahun ni pakai kain pelikat je, recycle gambar mana yang ada je.

Selamat Hari Raya semua. Kalau ada tweet yang tidak bermanfaat dan ada salah silap, mohon maaf dan mohon tinggalkan.

Semoga Allah terima semua amalan kita semua sepanjang bulan Ramadan.
Translated Text:
Because this year's Raya, use sticky cloth, recycle any pictures you have.

Happy Holidays everyone. If there is a tweet that is not useful and there is a mistake, I apologize and please leave it.

May Allah accept all our good deeds throughout the month of Ramadan.

Text:
Mohon maaf tak reply banyak soalan DM. Memang tak mampu nak jawab semua.

Biasanya cuba jawab untuk yang berkaitan tentang zakat je.

Kalau tentang hukum feqah dan hukum agama lain, lebih baik tanya asatizah yang berautoriti. Aku tidak layak.

Jaga diri dan kesihatan semua 😊✌️.
Translated Text:
Sorry for not replying to many DM questions. It is not possible to answer everything.

Usually try to answer for those related to zakat.

If it is about jurisprudence and other religious laws, it is better to ask an authoritative asatizah. I don't deserve it.

Take care of yourself and everyone's health 😊✌️.

Text:
Ibnu Rajab Al-Hambali rahimahullah berkata,

"Bagaimana mungkin air mata seorang mukmin tidak berlinang tatkala berpisah dengan bulan Ramadan.

Kerana dia langsung tidak mengetahui adakah masih ada sisa dari baki umurnya untuk kembali bertemu dengan Ramadan lagi."
Translated Text:
Ibnu Rajab Al-Hambali, may God have mercy on him, said,

"How is it possible that a believer's tears are not shed when parting with the month of Ramadan.

Because he doesn't know if there is any left in his remaining life to meet Ramadan again."

Text:
Korang dah bayar ZAKAT FITRAH?

Sebelum terlupa bolehlah bayar dulu kat sini secara ONLINE.

Setiap tahun RAMAI orang datang ke kaunter zakat selepas habis Ramadan nak bayar Zakat Fitrah. Katanya terlupa.

Kadangkala bukanlah sebab terlupa, tapi sebab suka bertangguh. Ayuh!
Translated Text:
Have you paid Zakat Fitrah?

Before you forget, you can pay online here.

Every year MANY people come to the zakat counter after Ramadan to pay Zakat Fitrah. He said he forgot.

Sometimes it's not because I forget, but because I like to procrastinate. Come on!

Text:
Aku nak kongsi 1 tips berguna dalam photography.

Kalau korang shoot benda yang jarang orang lain nampak, kita kena letak sesuatu sebagai perbandingan. 

Kenapa?
Contoh kat gambar ni, kita tak tahu ikan ni besar tapak tangan, panjang sehasta, satu depa atau besar macam manusia.
Translated Text:
I want to share 1 useful tips in photography.

If you shoot something that is rarely seen by others, we have to put something as a comparison.

Why?
For example in this picture, we don't know if this fish is as big as a palm, as long as a cubit, one fathom or as big as a human.

Text:
Kita boleh gunakan benda yang semua orang boleh tahu saiznya.

Contohnya duit kertas, syiling, kasut dsb.

Dalam gambar ni, kalau aku bagitau jumpa ulat gonggok besar, mungkin susah nak bayang walau bagi gambar. Tapi bila letak phone, baru nampak betapa besar ulat tu.

Begitulah. https://t.co/mz92m6viT9
Translated Text:
We can use things that everyone can know the size of.

For example paper money, coins, shoes etc.

In this picture, if I tell you to see a big caterpillar, it might be hard to imagine even if you show the picture. But when I put the phone down, I saw how big the caterpillar was.

That's it. https://t.co/mz92m6viT9

Text:
2. Jika ibu saya meninggal dunia SEBELUM azan Maghrib akhir Ramadan, apakah wajib zakat fitrah?

Tidak wajib.

Kerana arwah hanya dapat hidup pada satu masa sahaja iaitu bulan Ramadan dan tidak dapat hidup pada bulan Syawal walaupun sebentar.
Translated Text:
2. If my mother dies BEFORE Maghrib azan at the end of Ramadan, is zakat fitrah obligatory?

Not mandatory.

Because the spirit can only live in one time only, which is the month of Ramadan and cannot live in the month of Syawal even for a short time.

Text:
3. Bagaimana dengan Zakat Fitrah orang gila?

Wali atau warisnya hendaklah menunaikan zakat fitrah bagi orang gila berkenaan. Jika tidak ada warisnya dan dia juga tidak mempunyai wang atau makanan seperti dalam syarat di atas, maka tidak wajib atasnya.
Translated Text:
3. What about Zakat Fitrah of crazy people?

His guardian or heir must pay zakat fitrah for the crazy person. If there is no heir and he also does not have money or food as in the conditions above, then it is not obligatory on him.

Text:
4. Bagaimana dengan zakat fitrah orang yg sudah nyanyuk, hilang akal atau koma yang tak wajib puasa?

Wali atau warisnya yang berhak mengeluarkan zakat fitrah ke atasnya. Jika dia seorang yang kaya, sebaik-baiknya diambil dari hartanya sendiri untuk dikeluarkan zakat fitrahnya.
Translated Text:
4. What about the zakat fitrah of people who are senile, have lost their senses or are in a coma who do not have to fast?

His guardian or heir who has the right to issue zakat fitrah on him. If he is a rich person, it is best to take it from his own wealth to issue his zakat fitrah.

Text:
5. Apakah Warga Emas tanpa waris di Rumah Kebajikan wajib bayar zakat fitrah?

Ya, wajib dan ia diambil dari wang mereka sendiri. Jika tidak ada kemampuan, maka tidak wajib bayar zakat fitrah.

Owner rumah kebajikan tidak wajib keluarkan bagi pihak mereka (tiada pertalian nasab).
Translated Text:
5. Are the elderly without heirs in the Welfare House obliged to pay zakat fitrah?

Yes, it is mandatory and it is taken from their own money. If there is no ability, then it is not obligatory to pay zakat fitrah.

Charity house owners are not obliged to issue on their behalf (no lineage relationship).

Text:
6. Apakah anak-anak yatim tanpa waris di rumah kebajikan anak yatim wajib bayar zakat fitrah?

Ya, jika mereka mempunyai kemampuan seperti dlm syarat di atas. Jika mereka tak mampu, maka tak wajib. Pihak pengurus rumah anak yatim boleh membantu mengeluarkannya bagi pihak mereka.
Translated Text:
6. Are orphans without heirs in orphanages obliged to pay zakat fitrah?

Yes, if they have the ability as in the conditions above. If they can't afford it, then it's not mandatory. The orphanage manager can help remove it on their behalf.

Text:
7. Saya asnaf fakir miskin. Adakah saya wajib bayar Zakat Fitrah?

Ya, sekiranya ada makanan untuk malam raya dan pagi raya utk diri dan keluarga, maka wajib keluarkan zakat fitrah menggunakan harta yang ada. Itu syarat ‘kemampuan’ dalam Zakat Fitrah.

Jika tak mampu, tak wajib.
Translated Text:
7. I am a poor asnaf. Do I have to pay Zakat Fitrah?

Yes, if there is food for Eid night and Eid morning for yourself and your family, then it is obligatory to pay zakat fitrah using the available property. That is the condition of 'ability' in Zakat Fitrah.

If you can't afford it, you don't have to.

Text:
Antara kebaikan seseorang itu bila dah hampir tiba penghujung usianya, makin banyak amalan kebaikannya.

Makin banyak lakukan ibadah. Mudah-mudahan mak ayah kita juga begitu. 

Bagi yang dah meninggal dunia, mereka amat perlukan doa dari kita, iaitu doa dari anak yang soleh.
Translated Text:
Among the virtues of a person when he is nearing the end of his life, there are more good deeds.

Do more worship. Hopefully our parents are like that too.

For those who have passed away, they really need our prayers, namely the prayers of pious children.

Text:
Mohonlah agar Allah ampuni dosa-dosa mereka yang lepas, luaskan kubur mereka dan beri cahaya dalam kubur mereka.

Mudah-mudahan di syurga kelak, kita dapat berjumpa dengan mak ayah kita dan dikumpulkan semua bersama adik beradik kita yang lain, Ameen!
Translated Text:
Ask God to forgive their past sins, widen their graves and give light in their graves.

Hopefully in heaven one day, we will be able to meet our parents and be gathered together with our other siblings, Ameen!

Text:
Antara yang menarik kat Masjid Sri Petaling ni, takde langsung tabung sedekah (sepanjang tahun).

Tapi makanan untuk berbuka puasa dan sahur agak mewah. Beratus-ratus orang setiap hari. Besar pahala yang infaq.

Suasana persekitaran sebenarnya membantu untuk kita gandakan ibadah.
Translated Text:
One of the interesting things about this Sri Petaling Mosque is that there is no charity fund (throughout the year).

But the food for breaking fast and sahur is quite luxurious. Hundreds of people every day. The reward is great.

The environment actually helps us to double worship.

Text:
@acaiijawe Sorry kalau soalan ni noob sikit, tapi saya betul2 nak tau:

Apa kaitan antara iktikaf kat masjid dengan mendapat lailatul qadar? Setahu saya, iktikaf kat masjid tak meningkatkan probability untuk jumpa malam lailatul qadar. Ka saya salah?
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Sorry if this question is a bit noob, but I really want to know:

What is the connection between iktikaf at the mosque and getting lailatul qadar? As far as I know, iktikaf at the mosque does not increase the probability of meeting Lailatul Qadr. Am I wrong?

Text:
Ada sahabat yang dah 6 bulan tak dapat jumpa isteri & anak sebab tak boleh rentas negeri (Sarawak-Semenanjung). Bayangkan perasaan beliau.

Jadi, janganlah upload benda-benda yang menimbulkan kemarahan orang lain dan menimbulkan fitnah.

Tak kisahlah siapapun anda. Common sense.
Translated Text:
There is a friend who has not been able to see his wife for 6 months & children because they cannot cross the state (Sarawak-Peninsula). Imagine his feelings.

So, don't upload things that anger others and cause slander.

It doesn't matter who you are. Common sense.

Text:
Mari kita bersungguh-sungguh dalam beribadah pada 10 malam terakhir di bulan Ramadan ini.

لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ ەۙ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ اَلْفِ شَهْرٍۗ

"Malam kemuliaan itu lebih baik daripada seribu bulan." (Al-Qadr [97]: 3)
Translated Text:
Let's be serious in worshiping on the last 10 nights of this month of Ramadan.

لَيْلۗةُ الْقَدْرِ ەۙ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ الْفِ شَهْرٍ

"The night of glory is better than a thousand months." (Al-Qadr [97]: 3)

Text:
Antara yang kita boleh buat,

• Doa minta keampunan.
• Solat Isya’ dan Subuh berjemaah (pahala seperti beribadah sepanjang malam)
• Solat Tarawih sehingga imam selesai (spt beribadah spjg malam).
• Makin banyak bersedekah dll.

Ini mungkin sebenarnya Ramadan terakhir kita.
Translated Text:
Among the things we can do,

• Prayer for forgiveness.
• Isha' and Fajr prayers in congregation (the reward is like worshiping all night)
• Tarawih prayer until the imam finishes (like worshiping until late at night).
• Giving more charity etc.

This may actually be our last Ramadan.

Text: Update pokok pisang tanduk Ogos 2021. Dah tinggi orang dewasa. Pokok semua sihat dan membesar dengan jayanya. https://t.co/zGRA2K28nL
Translated Text: Banana tree update August 2021. Adults are already tall. The trees are all healthy and growing successfully. https://t.co/zGRA2K28nL

Text:
Update Oktober 2021.

Pokok pisang dah mula berbuah. Kena selalu cantas pelepah setiap 3 minggu nak elak penyakit dan kurangkan berat (patah tengkuk).

Kejap lagi kena bungkus untuk elak penyakit dan jaga kualiti pisang. Harap tak banjir bila start musim hujan ni. https://t.co/a6mFoWeeq7
Translated Text:
October 2021 update.

The banana tree has started bearing fruit. Always have to trim the fronds every 3 weeks to avoid disease and reduce weight (broken neck).

It's time to wrap it to avoid disease and maintain the quality of the banana. Please don't flood when the rainy season starts. https://t.co/a6mFoWeeq7

Text:
Update Disember 2021

Ready untuk kutip hasil.

Beginilah kalau duduk kampung. Tanah rezab terbiar, sapa rajin boleh usahakan.

1000 pokok. Kalau 80% pokok elok dan 1 tandan jual RM20-30. Kira sendiri untungnya.

Buat part time isi masa lapang. https://t.co/ZqvQzaXEUR
Translated Text:
Update December 2021

Ready to collect results.

This is how you live in the village. Abandoned reserve land, anyone who is diligent can work on it.

1000 trees. If 80% of the trees are good and 1 bunch sells for RM20-30. Count yourself lucky.

Do part time to fill your free time. https://t.co/ZqvQzaXEUR

Text:
Sebenarnya ramai tak tahu.

Pokok pisang zaman sekarang guna kultur tisu (lab). Bukan dari anak pokok macam dulu2.

Beli RM2.50 untuk 1 anak pokok. 

Kalau dah besar dan dia keluarkan anak pokok sekalipun, besar kemungkinan jantan (langsung takde hasil).

Teknologi pertanian. https://t.co/IowKG7Rz5V
Translated Text:
In fact, many do not know.

Today's banana trees use tissue culture (lab). Not from saplings like before.

Buy RM2.50 for 1 sapling.

If it's big and he takes out even a sapling, it's most likely a male (no result).

Agricultural technology. https://t.co/IowKG7Rz5V

Text:
Update Januari 2022.

Berat mana memandang, berat lagi bahu memikul 😭.

Sedih nak cerita. Minggu masa tuai hasil haritu, banjir besar melanda. Air banjir musnahkan semua pokok pisang.

Kedalaman air cecah 2 meter sebab kebun ni dekat dengan sungai.

Habis mati semuanya. https://t.co/PFZ9zlOML7
Translated Text:
Update January 2022.

It's heavy to look at, it's even heavier to shoulder 😭.

Sad to tell. The week of harvest time that day, a big flood hit. The flood water destroyed all the banana trees.

The water depth is 2 meters because the garden is close to the river.

All dead. https://t.co/PFZ9zlOML7

Text:
Sempat tuai hasil suku kebun je. Tak dapat balik modal.

Ramai kawan-kawan lain yang buat projek pertanian dan perikanan lagi rugi besar. Ada yang rugi lebih RM50k.

Semoga Allah gantikan dengan rezeki lebih baik.

Sekian update projek ini. Tunggu projek lain pula (kalau ada). https://t.co/58d2h2Rpd9
Translated Text:
Just had time to harvest the fruits of the garden. Can't get the capital back.

Many other friends who did agricultural and fishing projects lost a lot. Some lost more than RM50k.

May God replace it with better sustenance.

So many updates on this project. Wait for other projects (if any). https://t.co/58d2h2Rpd9

Text:
@acaiijawe Pernah cuba tanam pisang. Tanduk, kapas dan berangan. Apa yg saya perhati, ada 3 'musuh' utama
1. Babi hutan sodok pokok yg baru tanam
2. Monyet 
3. Orang curi (perangai lagi teruk dari No1 & No2)

Jadi kami decide taknak teruskan 😢
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Ever tried to grow bananas. Horn, cotton and chestnut. What I noticed, there are 3 main 'enemies'
1. Wild boar shoveling newly planted trees
2. Monkey
3. Thieves (even worse behavior than No. 1 & No. 2)

So we decided not to continue 😢

Text:
3. Daripada IC dan nama itulah institusi zakat boleh semak dalam sistem betul ke mereka tidak dapat bantuan zakat?

4. Kenapa tiba-tiba 3 orang anonymous ni disembunyikan sampai pegawai zakat tak boleh jumpa atau at least dapatkan info basic mereka. Apa NGO ni cuba lakukan?
Translated Text:
3. From the IC and the name, the zakat institution can check in the correct system if they do not get zakat assistance?

4. Why suddenly these 3 anonymous people are hidden until the zakat officer can't find them or at least get their basic info. What is this NGO trying to do?

Text:
Sebenarnya VIRAL TIDAK BENAR terhadap institusi zakat beri impak besar. Ia akan menjejaskan dana kutipan zakat.

Dan ia akan jejaskan bantuan zakat kepada:

• 65,000 keluarga Asnaf (fakir, miskin, muallaf). >350k orang.

• 3,000 pesakit DIALISIS yang DITAJA zakat setiap bulan.
Translated Text:
Actually VIRAL IS NOT TRUE about zakat institutions having a big impact. It will affect the zakat collection fund.

And it will affect zakat assistance to:

• 65,000 Asnaf families (poor, needy, converts). >350k people.

• 3,000 DIALYSIS patients who are SPONSORED by zakat every month.

Text:
• 13,000 asnaf penerima BANTUAN KEWANGAN setiap bulan.

• 12,000 penerima BANTUAN RUMAH SEWA setiap bulan.

• 11,000 PELAJAR universiti & kolej dalam dan luar negara yang ditaja 100% dengan dana zakat.

• 70,000 pelajar sekolah rendah+menengah yang dapat bantuan persekolahan.
Translated Text:
• 13,000 asnaf recipients of FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE every month.

• 12,000 HOUSING ASSISTANCE recipients every month.

• 11,000 university STUDENTS & domestic and foreign colleges sponsored 100% with zakat funds.

• 70,000 primary+secondary school students who get tuition assistance.

Text:
• Peruntukan RM29 juta untuk guru-guru KAFA setahun dll.

Semua bantuan mereka ini akan terjejas sekiranya dana zakat berkurang dengan viral yg tidak benar.

Mereka pandang rendah viral tersebut sebab NGO ni tak nampak kesannya. At least beri kerjasama untuk pihak zakat siasat.
Translated Text:
• Allocation of RM29 million for KAFA teachers per year etc.

All their help will be affected if the zakat fund is reduced due to untrue virality.

They look down on the virality because this NGO does not see the effect. At least cooperate for the zakat investigation.

Text:
Menarik untuk tunggu kenyataan rasmi nanti. Kalau terbukti betul dakwaan, semoga mereka diberi bantuan sewajarnya.

Tapi kalau ia dibuat dengan niat tidak baik, aku harap institusi boleh ambil tindakan undang-undang untuk elak perkara ni dari berlaku pada masa akan datang.
Translated Text:
Interesting to wait for the official statement later. If the allegations are proven true, hopefully they will be given appropriate help.

But if it was done with bad intentions, I hope the institution can take legal action to prevent this from happening in the future.

Text:
Update ringkas kes 3 ibu tunggal tak dapat zakat dan konon mohon bantuan gereja.

1. Sorang je ibu tunggal. 2 lagi masih ada suami.

2. 2 orang NAFIKAN dapat bantuan gereja. Sorang lagi masih tak dapat dihubungi.

3. 2 orang memang DAPAT bantuan sama ada di KL, Selangor, JKM dsb.
Translated Text:
A brief update on the case of 3 single mothers who were unable to receive zakat and allegedly asked the church for help.

1. I am a single mother. 2 more still have husbands.

2. 2 people DENY getting help from the church. Another person still cannot be contacted.

3. 2 people actually GET help whether in KL, Selangor, JKM etc.

Text:
4. Yang tak dpt dihubungi tu mmg Asnaf di Selangor. Dapat bantuan sejak tahun lepas.

5. Dia dapat bantuan duit bulanan, bantuan sewa rumah, bantuan hutang, bantuan persekolahan anak dll. Total setakat ini tahun ni RM23k. Bantuan masih berjalan.

NGO nak sensasikan, tapi fitnah.
Translated Text:
4. The one who cannot be contacted is Asnaf in Selangor. Got help since last year.

5. He gets monthly money assistance, house rent assistance, debt assistance, child schooling assistance etc. Total so far this year is RM23k. Help is ongoing.

NGOs want to sensationalize, but slander.

Text:
Seolah-olah begini;

"Pada satu hari, Ali keluar rumah." Allahuakbar! (Rukuk).

Ali jumpa Abu. Rukuk.
Mereka naik motor. Rukuk.
Motor itu cantik. Rukuk 😭.

Haa, camtulah rasanya. Sepatutnya kita nak ambil pengajaran dari bacaan Al-Quran tu.

Lelagi ketika bulan Ramadan ni.
Translated Text:
It seems like this;

"One day, Ali left the house." Allahu akbar! (Bow).

Ali met Abu. Bow down.
They ride motorcycles. Bow down.
The motor is beautiful. Bow 😭.

Ha, that's how it feels. We should learn from reading the Quran.

Again during the month of Ramadan.

Text:
Bulan Ramadan ni lah peluang kita nak berlama-lama dengar bacaan Al-Quran dalam solat.

Bulan lain tak berpeluang.

Kalau solat tergesa-gesa seperti baca Al-Fatihah satu nafas, tahiyat akhir ringkas sebab nak kejar habis 9:45 mlm, rasa macam kurang seronok begitu.

Itulah.
Translated Text:
This month of Ramadan is an opportunity for us to linger and listen to the recitation of the Quran in prayer.

Other months do not have a chance.

If you pray in a hurry like reciting Al-Fatihah in one breath, the final tahiyat is brief because you want to finish at 9:45 pm, it feels like it's less fun that way.

That's it.

Text:
Dari segi infra, Cyberjaya sebenarnya terbaik. Jadi lokasi datacenter utama company besar & bank di Asia Tenggara.

Sebab mereka ada Metro Fibre Network. Jaringan cable fibre optic paling besar (high capacity + redundancy network).

Termasuk ada backup electricity line.
Translated Text:
In terms of infrastructure, Cyberjaya is actually the best. So the location of the main data center for large companies & banks in Southeast Asia.

Because they have Metro Fiber Network. The largest fiber optic cable network (high capacity + redundancy network).

Including there is a backup electricity line.

Text:
Bagi yang tak pernah nampak rupa datacenter, ini salah satu contoh. Ia tempat simpan semua data/server company dalam dan luar negara.

Luasnya kita boleh sesat dan ada beberapa tingkat.

Security kat sini sangat ketat. Ada 3-4 layer sebelum dapat masuk. Bukan mcm dalam movie tu. https://t.co/icHMvEjpDJ
Translated Text:
For those who have never seen what a datacenter looks like, this is one example. It is a place to store all data/server companies in and out of the country.

We can get lost in the area and there are several levels.

The security here is very tight. There are 3-4 layers before being able to enter. Not like in the movie. https://t.co/icHMvEjpDJ

Text:
Mintalah semua hajat yang kita nak dlm BM pun tak mengapa. Doa orang berpuasa mustajab.

Kalau di Haramain, setengah jam sebelum berbuka puasa, suasana jadi senyap. Semua tadah tangan berdoa mohon kepada Allah.

Rugi sangat waktu mustajab doa, kita sibuk dengan tv dan smartphone.
Translated Text:
It's okay to ask for all the wishes we want in BM. Prayers of fasting people mustajab.

If in Haramain, half an hour before breaking the fast, the atmosphere becomes quiet. All washed hands praying to God.

We lose a lot of time for prayer, we are busy with TV and smartphones.

Text: @acaiijawe 2 tahun dah x dpt berpuasa dgn family sejak PKP ni. Selalunya setiap kali puasa kt kg mmg wajib duduk kt dapur tlg mak masak ke, tlg ssun² pinggan @ gelas ke.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I haven't been able to fast with my family for 2 years since this MCO. Usually every time I fast, I have to sit in the kitchen and let my mother cook, set the plates and glasses.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau Semua adik beradik aku balik bkn x nak tolong, tapi bila tolong semua salah. Cerewet. Trus hilang rasa ikhlas.😂.. tapi kalau cuma dgn parents tolong la ap yg mmpu. Hidang mkanan atas meja.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If all my brothers and sisters come back, I don't want to help, but when I help, it's all wrong. fussy Then I lost my sense of sincerity.😂.. but if it's only with parents, please do what you can. Serve food on the table.

Text: @acaiijawe @nabilaaaahx Saya bahagian buat air. Mangga susu, bandung soda, bandung cincau, air kordial, semua saya boleh buat. 🧋
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @nabilaaaahx I am the water maker. Mango milk, bandung soda, bandung cincau, cordial water, I can make everything. 🧋

Text: @acaiijawe @heyloony_ Alhamdulillah sahur, berbuka mmg aku yg siapkan, hidang, kemas meja, basuh pinggan semua. Sebab mak aku sakit, aku jela yg boleh buat tu semua. Masa ni jugak boleh kumpul pahala dan berbakti dengan mak selagi terdaya
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @heyloony_ Alhamdulillah sahur, I broke the fast, I prepared it, served it, set the table, washed all the dishes. Because my mother is sick, I'm the only one who can do that. This is the time to collect rewards and be devoted to mom as long as possible

Text: @acaiijawe Memang letih seorg ibu yg urus semua masak minum berbuka puasa.tolong lah mana yg boleh..susun pinggan cawan.buh lauk dlm mangkuk. Letih sgt tau rasa nak nagis pun ada.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe It's really tired as a mother who takes care of everything, cooks, drinks and breaks the fast. Please tell me where you can.. arrange the plates and cups. put the side dishes in the bowl. I'm so tired that I feel like crying.

Text: @acaiijawe dulu masa aku bdk2, abg2 aku mcm raja.oder je mkn itu ini.membawa smpai tua.bila aku pun dh besar aku dh berani tegur.yet mak tetap mcm tu.yes sebenrnya mak2 yg nak begitu 😭🙏
Translated Text: @acaiijawe used to be when I was a kid, I was like a king. That's what I'm saying. I'll take it until I'm old. When I'm older, I dare to reprimand you. Yet mom's still like that. Yes, it's actually mom who wants that 😭🙏

Text: @acaiijawe Kadang tengok mak pun bg layanan berbeza dgn anak lelaki. Walaupun anak lelaki tengah duduk rilek je depan dia, dia nak jugak panggil anak perempuan dia suro buat keje 😤😤 anak lelaki nanti bawa perangai tu sampai kahwin

Text: @acaiijawe Ada anak lelaki didik la dari kecik lg rajin membantu nnti dh besar x de la malas.anak saya dari darjah 5 saya dh minta tlg buat tu buat ni baik lelaki baik pompuan.skang dh besar masing2 pandai dh kalau tinggal kan kt rumah pun depa dh boleh buat semua.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I have a son that I have taught him since he was little, he is diligent in helping when he grows up and he is lazy. My son from the 5th grade I have asked him to do that, he is a good boy, a good teacher. He is a good boy if he stays at home. I can do everything.

Text: @acaiijawe Cadangan sy, para ibu/isteri if para lelaki tak mau tolong & anda penat utk memasak, request jee buka luar atau beli..
Translated Text: @acaiijawe My suggestion, mothers/wives if the men don't want to help & you are tired to cook, just request to open it outside or buy it..

Text:
@acaiijawe Sebab tak putuskan toxic cycle of gender biases, sebenarnya. Dari generasi atuk, ke parents, sampailah ke anak muda sekarang: perempuan yang masak, lelaki duduk rileks kat ruang tamu tunggu untuk makan sahaja.

Break the cycle. Tolong masak. Belajar masak. Duduk dapur. Tak rugi.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Because it doesn't break the toxic cycle of gender biases, actually. From the generation of grandfathers, to parents, to young people now: women who cook, men sitting relaxed in the living room waiting to eat.

Break the cycle. Please cook. Learn to cook. Sit in the kitchen. No loss.

Text: @acaiijawe @lucidity777 🌚

Text: @acaiijawe Bnda ni kena mention sebelum solat terawih ke lepas solat terawih ke. Biar terbakar sikit telinga jemaah.. Baik laki ke pempuan. Dlm media sosial ni bapak2 ke abg2 ke adik2 laki x baca pun. Yess, for my part, saya tujukan utk ayah and adik laki saya.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe This lady should be mentioned before the Terawih prayer and after the Terawih prayer. Let the congregation's ears burn a little.. Both men and women. In this social media, fathers, brothers, and younger brothers don't even read it. Yess, for my part, I mean it for my father and younger brother.

Text: @acaiijawe stop normalizekan anak perempuan je kena buat keje rumah, laki tunggu dkt meja makan utk dihidang. jenis jenis mcmni la yg suka jadikan isteri tu kuli. anyways, tak kesah la laki ke perempuan keje rumah tetap kena buat.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe stop normalizing that girls only have to do housework, men wait at the dining table to be served. This is the kind of person who likes to make his wife a porter. anyways, it doesn't matter if it's male or female, the house still has to be done.

Text: @acaiijawe Boleh je nk duduk xde mslah..tpi make sure hri tu, ko la tukang sembelih ayam tu, ko la tukang tanam sayur tu prgi petik bwk blik rumah..ko la tukang menjala dkt sungai utk ikan tu. then bru la ko blik tu bole treat ko mcm raja..mcm org dlu2 kann...
Translated Text: @acaiijawe You can sit there, mslah..but make sure that day, I'm the chicken butcher, I'm the vegetable grower and I'm going to pick them for the house..I'm the fisherman in the river for the fish. then bru la ko blik, you can treat me like a king.. like people used to, right...

Text: @acaiijawe @murasaki_RM Ni nak marah kadang2. Yang laki kerja balik awal sikit pun duduk main game je. Saya yang pompuan ni balik pukul 6 kena silent treatment sebab x masuk dapur. Dia siap dihidang lagi makanan. X mintak pun dihidang tapi treatment biar la sama. Penat jugak double standard ni.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @murasaki_RM I want to get angry sometimes. The man who came back from work a little early also sat down to play games. I was the one who came back at 6 o'clock and got the silent treatment because I didn't go into the kitchen. He is ready to be served more food. X asked to be served but let the treatment be the same. Tired of this double standard.

Text: @acaiijawe Mujur lah suami saya pandai masak. Bila saya kerja dia cuti. Dia lah yang masak untuk berbuka. Kalau bukan bulan puasa pun sama juga. Jadi gilir-gilir lah masak.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Luckily my husband is good at cooking. When I work he is off. He is the one who cooks for breaking the fast. If it's not a fasting month, it's the same. So take turns cooking.

Text: @acaiijawe Di rumah sy lelakilah yg menjadi pejuang2 syahid di dapur. Dr bab cari duit, pg pasar sampailah menjadi lauk terhidang atas meja semua lelaki handle. Sahur pun begitu. Yg perempuan mereka cuma mengemas meja sbb pejuang2 syahid td hampir kebiasaanya koma selepas berbuka.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe At home, it's the men who become martyrs in the kitchen. Dr. looking for money, at the market until it becomes a side dish served on the table of all the handle men. Sahur is the same. The women only clean the table because martyred fighters are almost usually comatose after breaking the fast.

Text: @acaiijawe @_ateynn Alhamdulillah perangai suami aku tak ubah pun masa sebelum khawin dan lepas khawin. Baru cakap yunkk tolong....  Dah cepat2 nak tolong aku thats why bila dia panggil lekas2 aku sahut panggilan takut suami kecik hati
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @_ateynn Alhamdulillah, my husband's behavior has not changed even before and after marriage. I just said let's help.... He's in a hurry to help me that's why when he calls quickly I answer the call because I'm scared of my husband

Text: @acaiijawe Orang jantan dalam rumah aku ni tak tolong apa langsung kecuali adik kecik aku. Lepas melahap, pinggan pun tak basuh 😌
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The men in my house don't help me at all except my little sister. After eating, I didn't even wash the dishes 😌

Text: @acaiijawe saya tak tau nak cakap macam mana tapi ayah saya memang macam ni. dah la ibu saya oku. saya la tukang jaga, tukang masak, tukang kemas rumah, dengan kelas online lagi. ada adik perempuan pun dia jenis tak reti buat kerja. ayah pulak cakap "apa fungsi jadi perempuan?"✋😌
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I don't know what to say but my father is like this. It's my mother. I'm a janitor, cook, house cleaner, with online classes again. there is also a younger sister, she is not ready to work. Dad said "what is the function of being a woman?"✋😌

Text: @acaiijawe Bagi alasan tak pandai buat. Kalau tak penah buat, sampai mati pon tak pandai.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Give me an excuse that I'm not good at. If you don't do it, you won't be smart until you die.

Text: @acaiijawe Adik beradik lelaki ramai 7 perempuan 1 yang selebihnya tu maybe dah jadi perempuan tukar kt siam kt rumah perempuan1 tu je kena buat keje....
Translated Text: @acaiijawe There are many brothers and sisters, 7 girls, 1 of the rest, maybe she has become a girl and changed to Siam at the girl's house.

Text: @acaiijawe @HZQHHZMI Dekat rumah saya, kami bergilir sediakan juadah. Alhamdulillah semua dlm rumah ni pandai memasak. Hari ni saya, esok mak, lusa kakak pula, dan seterusnya. Kuih pun buat sendiri. Tapi sy faham bila ada lelaki pemalas sbb pakcik2 saya semua mcm tu.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe @HZQHHZMI Near my house, we take turns preparing food. Alhamdulillah everyone in this house is good at cooking. Today is me, tomorrow is my mother, the day after that is my sister, and so on. Make the cake yourself. But I understand when there are lazy men like my uncles are all like that.

Text:
Contoh, pengembala lembu dan kambing dah jangka bila musim korban, mesti 200 ekor terjual.

Bulan biasa sekitar 30 ekor je sebulan. Dah predict beberapa bulan/tahun awal.

Ini bukan pertama kali raya. Berpuluh tahun pengalaman. Jadi susah juga nak percaya ada masalah supply.
Translated Text:
For example, cattle and goat herders have predicted when it's sacrificial season, 200 must be sold.

A normal month is around 30 animals per month. Already predicted a few months/years in advance.

This is not the first time. Decades of experience. So it is hard to believe that there is a supply problem.

Text: @acaiijawe Ni kalau bagitahu abah harga naik mesti dia paksa diri nak cepat² sihat. Tiap kali raya biasanya sembelih lembu sendiri, tak beli daging luar.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If you tell me that the price is going up, he must force himself to get well quickly. Every Raya festival, they usually slaughter their own cows, do not buy outside meat.

Text:
@naniii_ni Bagi yang ada lembu ni memang itu je jalannya, hehe. Sembelih lembu milik sendiri 80% jual. Selebihnya makan sendiri.

Untung banyak.
Translated Text:
@naniii_ni For those who have cows, that's the way to go, hehe. Slaughter own cattle 80% sell. Eat the rest yourself.

A lot of luck.

Text: @acaiijawe Baru nak masuk 1st week puasa harga ayam ada yang dah cecah RM12/kg. Coming into raya nanti entah berapa RM la harga ayam, tu belum kira harga barang makanan lain lagi. Mampus
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Just about to enter the 1st week of fasting, some chicken prices have already reached RM12/kg. Coming into Raya later, I don't know how much RM the price of chicken is, not counting the price of other food items yet. Clear

Text: @acaiijawe Tadi pergi giant,pakcik makcik yg family semua complain ayam sampai RM 9.90...aku yg bujang okey la ayam sekor tahan 3@4hari...yg duk family ni, mau sekor 2hari je tahan
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Just went to Giant, uncles and aunts with family all complained about chicken up to RM 9.90... I'm single, it's okay, one chicken can last 3 or 4 days... those with family, only want one chicken for 2 days

Text: @acaiijawe menteri mampus keras habis dah ke. celaka la perangai. ingat orang ada duit ke musim2 gini.

Text: @acaiijawe Dulu geng meniaga kata barang naik sebab GST. Sekarang GST tak ada tapi barang tetap naik. Rupanya memang mereka yg mahu naikkan.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe In the past, the trading gang said goods went up because of GST. Now there is no GST but goods still go up. Apparently they are the ones who want to raise it.

Text:
@syaz4u Ini betul. Tapi naikkan harga semasa raya  nampak macam ambil kesempatan.

Pallet lembu pun terus naik harga. Kena cari alternatif. Sebab semua import daei luar negara.
Translated Text:
@syaz4u This is correct. But raising the price during Raya seems like taking advantage.

Cattle pallets continue to rise in price. Have to find an alternative. Because all imports are from abroad.

• Can I pay zakat on behalf of others?

Yes. We can be a representative to pay on their behalf (with permission). Whether parents, neighbors etc.

Text:
• Adakah sah bayar zakat secara online tanpa akad dan bersalaman?

Syarat sah zakat, Niat dan berlaku perpindahan harta.
Lafaz tu sunat.
Bersalaman tu adat kita.

• Barapa harga Zakat Fitrah di setiap negeri tersebut?

Boleh rujuk thread ini untuk Harga Fitrah tahun 2021.
Translated Text:
• Is it legal to pay zakat online without a contract and a handshake?

Valid conditions of zakat, intention and transfer of property.
The pronunciation is circumcision.
Shaking hands is our custom.

• What is the price of Zakat Fitrah in each state?

You can refer to this thread for Harga Fitrah in 2021.

Text:
• Saya pelajar/bujang/perempuan. Boleh ke bayar Zakat Fitrah sendiri?

Boleh. Tetapi perlu dapatkan keizinan terlebih dahulu dari suami, bapa, datuk yang beri nafkah kpd keluarganya.

Sebab afdhal tunaikan Zakat Fitrah oleh orang yang wajib bawah tanggungannya.
Translated Text:
• I am a student/single/female. Can I pay Zakat Fitrah myself?

Yes. But it is necessary to obtain permission first from the husband, father, grandfather who provides for his family.

Because it is afdhal to pay Zakat Fitrah by the person who is under his responsibility.

Text:
• Saya ada pembantu rumah. Siapa yg perlu bayar Zakat Fitrah mereka?

Majikan boleh & afdhal bayar untuk pembantu mereka. Jika tak, mereka wajib bayar sendiri.

• Adakah perlu bayar zakat anak dlm kandungan?

Tidak jika anak belum lahir. Kalau merasa Ramadan+Syawal, kena bayar.
Translated Text:
• I have a maid. Who has to pay their Zakat Fitrah?

Employers can & afdhal pay for their assistants. If not, they must pay themselves.

• Is it necessary to pay zakat on an unborn child?

Not if the child is not yet born. If you feel Ramadan+Syawal, you have to pay.

Text:
• Bolehkah saya tunaikan zakat fitrah menggunakan beras?

Boleh gunakan beras untuk bayar Zakat Fitrah. Namun kita kena cari dan beri sendiri beras tersebut kepada asnaf di sekeliling kariah kita.

Institusi zakat tidak menerima bayaran dalam bentuk beras.
Translated Text:
• Can I pay zakat fitrah using rice?

Can use rice to pay Zakat Fitrah. But we have to find and give the rice ourselves to asnaf around our parish.

Zakat institutions do not accept payments in the form of rice.

Text:
Kenapa ada negeri berbeza-beza Harga Fitrah mereka?

Sebab ia ikut jenis beras yang biasa kita makan.

1. RM7 : Beras Super Special Tempatan 5%

2. RM14 : Beras Putih Import, Perang, Pulut, Wangi.

3. RM21 : Beras Basmathi, Merah, Jepun.

Bayar ikut majoriti beras kita makan.
Translated Text:
Why are there different states in their Fitrah Prices?

Because it follows the type of rice we usually eat.

1. RM7 : Local Super Special Rice 5%

2. RM14 : Imported White Rice, Brown, Glutinous, Fragrant.

3. RM21 : Basmathi Rice, Red, Japanese.

Pay according to the majority of the rice we eat.

Text:
Bila masa nak bayar Zakat Fitrah?
Zakat Fitrah boleh dibayar bermula 1 Ramadan 2021 (maghrib) sehingga pagi Hari Raya sebelum solat raya.

Majoriti negeri masih GALAKKAN pembayaran secara ONLINE musim Covid-19 ini.

Namun masih ada kutipan oleh Amil dengan patuhi SOP ditetapkan.
Translated Text:
When is the time to pay Zakat Fitrah?
Zakat Fitrah can be paid from 1 Ramadan 2021 (maghrib) until the morning of Hari Raya before Eid prayers.

The majority of states still ENCOURAGE ONLINE payment this Covid-19 season.

But there is still a collection by Amil by following the set SOP.

Text:
Aku bukan expert. Kalau korang selalu injured lutut atau sakit kaki ketika lari, cubalah ‘barefoot running’.

Ia boleh betulkan balance, dapat posture lari yang betul dan boleh tahu kasut korang yang bermasalah atau cara berlari tak betul.

Manusia dah lari beribu tahun.
Translated Text:
I am not an expert. If you always injure your knees or your feet hurt when you run, try 'barefoot running'.

It can correct balance, get the right running posture and can tell if your shoes are problematic or the way you run is not right.

Humans have been running for thousands of years.

Translated Text: @acaiijawe Medina dates are the best. Remembering the story before the war of Badr. Abu Sufyan was able to detect the presence of the Islamic army through camel feces containing dates. Only the people of Medina feed their camels with dates.

Text:
Kita kena ada plan dan strategi. Supaya Ramadan ni benar-benar beri kesan besar dalam hidup kita.

Kita nak elak, baru pertengahan Ramadan, dah hilang momentum sebab keletihan.

Ramai yang masuk Ramadan tahun lepas, tetapi kini mereka dah tiada.

Menyesal tak bersungguh.
Translated Text:
We have to have a plan and strategy. So that Ramadan really has a big impact on our lives.

We want to avoid it, it's only the middle of Ramadan, we've lost momentum due to fatigue.

Many entered Ramadan last year, but now they are gone.

Regret not serious.

Text:
Sayang sangat jika miliki ilmu agama yang tinggi, namun ia tidak membantu kita jadi muslim yang soleh & banyak ibadahnya.

Malah ego kita yang semakin tinggi dan rasa lebih berilmu dari orang lain.

Jadilah pemuda yang hatinya sentiasa terpaut dengan masjid. Ayuh sahabat semua!
Translated Text:
It's a pity if you have high religious knowledge, but it doesn't help us become pious Muslims & a lot of worship.

Even our ego is getting higher and we feel more knowledgeable than others.

Be a young man whose heart is always attached to the mosque. Come on friends!

Text:
@acaiijawe Seorang sahabat pernah berpesan, "sebelum kita sibuk memperjuangkan agama dengan berdebat, ada baiknya memperjuangkan agama dengan kita beramal."

Ramai orang jaguh berdebat, tetapi hanya sedikit yang jaguh beramal.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe A friend once advised, "before we are busy fighting for religion by debating, it is good to fight for religion by doing charity."

Many people are good at arguing, but few are good at charity.

Text: @acaiijawe Tarawih nanti pusing masjid KL/Selangor tak Sal?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Tarawih later will be dizzy at the KL/Selangor mosque, right?

Text: @acaiijawe Tapi bagaimana pula dengan yang tidak menjaga sop diluar masjid, kedai kopi dll. Tapi bila mai tang masjid dia terpaling jaga sop? Kadang saya terfikir tidakkah kita rasa bersalah tinggalkan saf dan rela jika hati kita berselisih.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe But what about those who don't take care of soup outside mosques, coffee shops etc. But when he comes to the mosque, he turns away and takes care of it? Sometimes I wonder if we don't feel guilty to leave the ranks and willingly if our hearts are at odds.

Text: @acaiijawe Itulah apa yang saya nampak tuan, debatnya bukan main di sosial media ni tapi yang saya lihat tiada pun anak muda yang istiqamah datang ke masjid, yang ada hanya mereka yang sudah setengah abad hidup.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe That's what I see, sir, the debate is not played on social media, but what I see is that there are no young people who are consistent in coming to the mosque, there are only those who have lived for half a century.

Text:
Kat semua asrama harini memang drama air mata.

Pelbagai ragam mak ayah. Ada yang bawa bantal mahal, makanan penuh satu plastik, baldi/gayung siap ada nama besar dll.

Semua harap anaknya berjaya dalam hidup. Itulah yang mampu mereka lakukan sambil doa untuk anaknya.
Translated Text:
All the hostels today are dramas of tears.

Various types of parents. Some bring expensive pillows, food full of plastic, buckets/dippers with big names etc.

Everyone hopes that his son will succeed in life. That's what they can do while praying for their child.

Text:
@acaiijawe Rezeki dapat merasa asrama dari form 1. Saya duk hostel masa masuk kolej ypj umur 18, tu pun jarak dengan rumah xsampai 10km 😂😂
Dah umur 22, baru duk hostel kat ipts.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Rezeki was able to experience a hostel from form 1. I was in a hostel when I entered college at the age of 18, and the distance from home was only 10km 😂😂
I'm 22 years old, new to the hostel at ipts.

Text:
@timmila87 10km ni biasanya dia tak rasa sedih sangat 😅. Sebab tahu mak ayah just around the corner. Selalu boleh datang.

Kalau dah sampai luar negeri tu yang rasa jauh dan sedih, hehe. Masa balik kampung sebulan sekali baru dapat jumpa.
Translated Text:
@timmila87 this 10km usually he doesn't feel very sad 😅. Because I know mom and dad are just around the corner. You can always come.

If you have arrived abroad, you feel far away and sad, hehe. When I go back to the village once a month I can see you.

Text: @acaiijawe Saya dgr pun dah sedih..sy pernah fikir x nak hantar anak boarding school..duk dgn sy saje sampai dah jumpa pasangan yg sesuai utk berkahwin..anak 2 2 perempuan.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I'm sad too..I never thought of sending my children to boarding school..I'm with you until I find a suitable partner for marriage..2 children. 2 girls.

Text: @acaiijawe masa mula² sambung degree kat semenanjung, saya beritau kat mak ayah saya yg biar saya sendiri pergi ke universiti, xperlu teman sbb mk jimat kos & duit byk pakai sbb adik² nk masuk universiti jugak.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe when I started to continue my degree in the peninsula, I told my parents who let me go to university by myself, I don't need a friend because I want to save money & I use a lot of money because my younger brother wants to go to university.

Text: @acaiijawe Mak sy mgm xbg anak2 dok asrama. Dpt sbp pun tolak. Semua start dok hostel bila masuk uni. Sy dpt uni perak, ok lg mak ayah dtg jenguk selalu. Adik dpt oversea, mak sy xmakan nasi 4bulan kemurungan. Alhamdulillah skrang dah berlalu. Turn sy plak anak sek men thn dpn.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Mom, I can't wait for the kids to go to the dormitory. You can also reject it. Everyone starts at the hostel when they enter uni. I got uni perak, it's ok, mom and dad always come to visit. My sister can go overseas, my mother doesn't eat rice for 4 months due to depression. Alhamdulillah it has passed now. It's my turn to put the child's name on the year.

Text: @acaiijawe Aku dulu masuk asrama , rmh takda telefon nk call.. Tunggu hujung minggu ayah dtg naik moto.mak xboleh dtg sbb nk kene jaga ank2 kecik yg lain..klu ayah xdtg,  tgok je kwn2 outing dgn parent diorg.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I used to go to the dormitory, I don't have a phone to call.. Wait for the weekend when dad comes on a motorcycle. Mom can't come because I have to take care of the other little kids.. if dad doesn't come, just see if you're outing with your parents.

Text: @acaiijawe jdi tringat balik kenangan masa kakak sulung masuk blajar.mak yg x prnh pakai purdah ttiba pakai purdah hritu sbb nak hntr anak dara dia masuk blajar. bru tau rupanya mak nak cover air mata dia😭😔
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I'm reminded of the memories of when my eldest sister went to blajar. The mother who never used to wear purdah started wearing purdah right away because she wanted to send her daughter to blajar. Bro, you know, it looks like she wants to cover her tears😭😔

Text: @acaiijawe First time merasa duk asrama bila masuk matrik, ha bru tau erti duduk jauh. Rumah di klantan, matrik Di Perlis. Hbs nye sambung pulak ke Sabah, padan muka, mase skolah duk dkt rumah sgt😂 tp bende ni la yg buat kita matang. Sumpah ckp 🖐
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The first time I felt like I was in a dormitory when I entered matric, I know what it means to sit far away. House in klantan, matric in Perlis. It's time to continue to Sabah, it's a good time, but school is at home right now😂 but this guy is what makes us mature. Swear ckp 🖐

Text: @acaiijawe Saya dduk asrama since form 1 smpai uni dok kolej... sy xtau mcm mana tawakalnya mak ayah saya benarkan ank perempuan mereka umur 13 tahun merantau ke semenanjung yg berbeza budaya, agama, taraf hidup... Tapi sekarang saya menuai hasilnya.. syukur Alhamdulillah
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I've been in a dormitory since form 1 until uni and college... I don't know how my parents allowed their 13-year-old daughter to migrate to a peninsula with a different culture, religion, and standard of living... But now I'm reaping the results. Thank God Alhamdulillah

Text: @acaiijawe Datang sorang dan daftar diri sendiri 🥺
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Come alone and register yourself 🥺

Text: @acaiijawe Betul. Sy yg duduk belajar satu negeri pun. Muka mak ayah sy gembira n bahagia tngok. Sbb sy je yg dapat sambung degree. Abang semua tak sambung blajar. Doakan sy tabah hadapi degree ini. Aaminnn
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Right. Sy who sat and studied even one state. The faces of my parents are happy and happy. Because I'm the only one who can continue the degree. All brothers do not continue to study. Pray for me to persevere with this degree. Aamennn

Text: @acaiijawe Saya tak bagi anak masuk asrama sebab saya yakin saya yang akan menangis. 😌😌.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I don't let my child go to the dormitory because I'm sure I'll be the one who will cry. 😌😌.

Text: @acaiijawe Sy dulu, dr rumah ke asrama masa form 1, x smpi pn 10 km ustaz..tp sy yg drama air mata..homesick 😂
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I used to go from home to the dormitory when I was in form 1, and I didn't go until 10 km ustaz.. but I was the one with tears in my eyes.. homesick 😂

Text: @acaiijawe masa abah sy hantar abg ke plkn, first time dok jauh tiap hri dia jenguk bilik abg, tidur dgn selimut abg.itu first time abh berjauhan dgn anak dia dahlah anak sulong pulak😅.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe when I sent my brother to plkn, the first time I was away, he visited my room every day, slept with my blanket. It was the first time I was away from my son, he was already a foster child😅.

Text: @acaiijawe Ibu dari kecil hanya pernah lalu je depan sekolah SBP. Stp kali lalu, selalu kata, bagusnya org yg dpt masuk sini. Dia pun teringin. Last2, dia dpt msuk gak tpi sbgai ibu. anak dia sklh kat situ dn berjaya keluar dgan 9A SPM. Bangga Allah sahaja yang tau 😣 Al-Fatihah ibu 🥺
Translated Text: @acaiijawe My mother has only ever passed in front of SBP school since I was little. But last time, I always said, it's good that people can come in here. He wanted too. Last2, she can only enter as a mother. His son is still there and successfully graduated with 9A SPM. Proud only God knows 😣 Al-Fatihah mother 🥺

Text: @acaiijawe Saya sekolah kat kg, duduk kat kg, paling jauh pegi pekan, dpt sambung belajar lepas SPM terus duduk asrama, tu pun da sayu hati tinggalkan emak abah ..alhamdulillah  berkat doa ibu bapa, berjaya saya. inikan pula ting. 1, moga semuanya kuat dan tabah.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I went to school in kg, I lived in kg, the furthest I went to the town, I was able to continue studying after SPM and stayed in the dormitory, even then I was sad to leave my mother.. thank God thanks to the prayers of my parents, I succeeded. here's the thing. 1, may everyone be strong and persevere.

Text: @acaiijawe Takdelah ... mak pak aku okey je - anak ada 7 lagi kat rumah
Translated Text: @acaiijawe No... I'm fine - there are 7 more children at home

Text: @acaiijawe Saya hantar anak lelaki masuk asrama untuk persediaan SPM,  4 bulan je.. asrama pun 1.5KM dari rumah tapi saya sampai kena anxiety sebab risau kes buli masa tu sedang viral. Moga para pelajar asrama saling menjaga dan hormat menghormati.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I sent my son to the hostel for SPM preparation, only 4 months.. the hostel is 1.5KM from home but I got anxiety because I was worried about the bullying case going viral at that time. May the dormitory students take care of each other and respect each other.

Text: @acaiijawe Saya pula masa TERPAKSA duk di asrama di um, jln pantai, kay ell, itulah kali PERTAMA berjauhan dgn keluarga yg ketika itu nun jauh di Singapura. Perghhh, sayu hearty & gelabah jumpe 'senpai'2 di asrama, memang memori kekal abadi.

Text: @acaiijawe Masa ayah hantar ke semenanjung awal2 sem dulu, dkt depan pagar blok asrama ayah cakap, dia xpernah rasa sesedih ini. Rasa macam sy nak pergi jauh. Paling erat ayah peluk masa tu🥰
Translated Text: @acaiijawe When my father sent me to the peninsula earlier in the semester, near the gate of the dormitory block, my father said, he had never felt this sad. I feel like I want to go far. My father hugged me the most at that time

Text: @acaiijawe Perasaan yg sama 7 tahun lepas masa hntr anak sulung ke asrama. Balik rumah x berani nak masuk bilik dia. Berhari² jugak lah. Hjg minggu ajak hsband g tgok dia, hsband tepuk dahi cakap "baru berapa hari...." 😅
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The same feeling 7 years ago when the eldest son went to the dormitory. When I got home, I didn't dare to go into his room. It's a day. Last week I invited my husband to see him, he patted me on the forehead and said "how many days ago..." 😅

Text: @acaiijawe Adik beradik saya 5 orang, alhamdulillah, 3 berpeluang ke asrama..syukur..mak & abah relaks je lepaskn anak2 nye je hostel..😊
Translated Text: @acaiijawe I have 5 brothers and sisters, thank God, 3 have the opportunity to go to the hostel.. thank you.. mom & just relax and leave the kids at the hostel..😊

Text: @acaiijawe Ms remaja..biasalah selalu gaduh mulut dgn mak.Mak suruh duk asrama..ayat macam menghalau🤭😁..masa 1st day hantar sy skolah asrama..dlm kereta before my parents balik rumah..mom nangis..n saya confuse..eh..my mom loves me? She alwys mad at me.baru sy tahu..she loves me sbnrnye😍
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Ms. teenager.. I usually always argue with mom. Mom told me to go to the dormitory.. the sentence is like driving away 🤭😁.. on the 1st day I sent her to the boarding school.. in the car before my parents returned home.. mom was crying.. and me confused..eh..my mom loves me? She alwys mad at me. I just know.. she loves me sbnrnye😍

Translated Text: @acaiijawe I've never been away, once I stayed in a dormitory for 2 months because of spm. I know I can make a living in Penang 😂 my house is in Pahang. the one that melts the mother, I'm just steady, excited to be able to study far 😆

Text:

The house felt empty.
Fortunately, I keep a cat.
So my cat is a substitute for my child's absence.

Text:
Bab pemakaian lambang capal, teringat kata Dr Rozaimi tentang ini.

Kata beliau, bab ni kena adil dalam memberi hukum.

Asasnya, dalam Islam apa jua lambang selagi ia tidak dijadikan azimat dan tangkal yang konon memberi manfaat/kuasa dan bawa kepada syirik, ia tiada masalah.
Translated Text:
Regarding the use of the capal symbol, I remember what Dr. Rozaimi said about this.

He said, this chapter has to be fair in giving the law.

Basically, in Islam, any symbol as long as it is not used as a charm and talisman that supposedly gives benefits/power and leads to polytheism, there is no problem.

Text:
Mungkin ia dipakai atas dasar estatika & cantik.

Contoh, hukum guna lambang bulan bintang di kubah-kubah masjid?

Ia BIDAAH kalau dianggap afdhal dari lambang lain.

Tapi kalau ia sekadar simbol hiasan masjid, tiada manfaat tertentu, tidak membazir (emas), maka tiada larangan.
Translated Text:
Perhaps it is used on the basis of static & beautiful

For example, is it legal to use the star moon symbol on mosque domes?

It is HERESY if it is considered afdhal from other symbols.

But if it is just a decorative symbol of the mosque, there is no specific benefit, it is not wasted (gold), then there is no prohibition.

Text:
Begitu juga hukum letak gambar Kaabah di dinding2 rumah.

Ia BIDAAH kalau dia yakin benda tu ada kelebihan dan bawa manfaat.

Tapi kalau cuma sekadar hiasan dinding, bila tengok rindu Kaabah sebab tak pernah pergi, bagi semangat kumpul duit nak tunai haji, maka ia tiada masalah.
Translated Text:
The same is true of placing pictures of the Temple on the walls of houses.

It is HERESY if he believes that the thing has advantages and brings benefits.

But if it's just a wall decoration, if you miss the Kaaba because you've never been there, for the spirit of collecting money to pay for Hajj, then it's no problem.

Text:
Cuma bila letak kat depan tempat solat, dikhuatiri ada jemaah yakin ia beri manfaat tertentu.

Ia yang semua khuatir dan kena elakkan.

Kalau nak pakai sangat, cukuplah sekadar untuk diri sendiri sebab ia design cantik dan takde langsung percaya karut marut kelebihan lambang ini.
Translated Text:
It's just that if it is placed in front of the place of prayer, it is feared that some worshipers believe that it gives certain benefits.

It is what everyone fears and must avoid.

If you really want to use it, it's enough just for yourself because it's a beautiful design and you don't have to believe the superstitions of this symbol.

Text:
Jika haramkan simbol ni, maka kena haramkan simbol/lambang agama yang lainnya juga.

Bab begini, sebaiknya rujuk mufti negeri masing-masing.

Sebagai orang awam yang takde kemampuan keluarkan hukum dari dalil, kita selamat untuk ikut fatwa. WA.
Translated Text:
If you ban this symbol, then you have to ban other religious symbols/emblems as well.

In this regard, it is best to consult the mufti of each state.

As members of the public who do not have the ability to derive the law from evidence, we are safe to follow the fatwa. WA.

Text:
@acaiijawe Saya hari tu ada baca mufti wilayah punya penjelasan dan saya amik pegangan neutral dalam isu ni.

Tapi bila ternampak sampai orang agungkan logo tersebut. Letak pada keranda (luar negara) & dalam rumah kerana percaya membawa manfaat... Timbul rasa risau pula.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe I read the mufti of the region the other day and he had an explanation and I took a neutral stance on this issue.

But when it is seen, people glorify the logo. Put on the coffin (overseas) & in the house because it is believed to bring benefits... There is also a feeling of worry.

Text:
@DNaadhir Ini setuju. Walau saya tak pernah pakai langsung logo tu, tapi banyak fatwa negeri benarkan.

Cuma jenis yang melampau dan berlebihan memang pihak berkuasa kena bertindak. Elak jadi parah.
Translated Text:
@DNaadhir This agrees. Although I have never used the logo directly, many state fatwas allow it.

It's only the extreme and excessive types that the authorities have to act on. Avoid getting worse.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau macam tabaruk/ambik berkat tu termasuk tak dalam memberi manfaat?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If it's like tabaruk/blessing that's not included in giving benefits?

Text:
Kiraan Gabungan Harta lebih tepat kerana ia menggambarkan kekayaan semasa kita pada tahun tersebut.

Ia elakkan ‘loophole’ orang yang cuba mengelak zakat.

Contoh, ada yang pindahkan duit saving ke bank lain supaya tak lebih Nisab. Jadi mereka tak perlu bayar zakat.
Translated Text:
The Combined Wealth count is more accurate because it reflects our current wealth for the year.

It avoids the 'loophole' of people who try to avoid zakat.

For example, some people transfer their savings to another bank so that they don't have more Nisab. So they do not have to pay zakat.

Text:
Zakat ni bukan macam LHDN.

Kalau korang buat helah (creative accounting) bukannya menipu kerajaan, tapi korang kena jawab dengan Allah yang Maha Mengetahui.

Kesimpulan, harta kita tak dikira berasingan dalam pengiraan zakat. Kena gabungkan supaya lebih tepat.

Wallahua’lam. https://t.co/DzkcAuZgxO
Translated Text:
Zakat is not like LHDN.

If you do tricks (creative accounting) you are not deceiving the government, but you have to answer to God who knows best.

In conclusion, our wealth is not counted separately in the calculation of zakat. Have to combine to be more accurate.

Wallahua'lam. https://t.co/DzkcAuZgxO

Text: @acaiijawe Assalam tuan, perlu ke asingkan zakat wang simpanan dan zakat pelaburan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Hello sir, do you need to separate zakat on savings and zakat on investments?

Text:
@AbdullahK_00 Waalaikumussalam tuan, memang kena digabungkan tuan jumlahnya untuk kiraan zakat.

Contoh, masa nak kira zakat.
Simpanan : RM15,000
Pelaburan : RM15,000

Zakat : RM30,000 x 2.5% = RM750.

Nilai ni masih boleh rebet LHDN 100%.
Translated Text:
@AbdullahK_00 Waalaikumussalam sir, it is indeed necessary to combine the amounts for zakat calculation.

For example, time to count zakat.
Savings: RM15,000
Investment : RM15,000

Zakat: RM30,000 x 2.5% = RM750.

This value can still be 100% IRB rebate.

Text: @acaiijawe Kalau simpan dekat tabung haji dia dah byr zakat siap2 kan?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe If he keeps it near the hajj fund, he has already paid zakat, right?

Text: @aslamyahya3 Fatwa masih kekal untuk ini. Tidak perlu keluarkan zakat bagi simpanan di Tabung Haji.
Translated Text: @aslamyahya3 Fatwa still remains for this. There is no need to pay zakat for savings in Tabung Haji.

Text:
@acaiijawe Salam Tuan Kalau wang bisnes kira mcm mana pulak ya? 

CONTOH modal bisnes RM 50K 
Emas 15K personal (x pakai)
Duit Personal 10K

Kalau kita ada buat derma dekat masjid or org sekeliling ,ada kah dikira zakat juga?
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Greetings Sir If it's business money, how do you calculate it?

EXAMPLE business capital RM 50K
15K personal gold (x used)
Personal Money 10K

If we make a donation near the mosque or people around, is it also counted as zakat?

Text:
@HashimSon94 Salam, 

1. Untuk bisnes boleh gunakan cara ini tuan.

2. Emas dan Duit Personal tu kena digabungkan untuk kiraan zakat. Ia berbeza dari kiraan Zakat Perniagaan tersebut.

3. Sedekah tidak dikira sebagai zakat. Masih tetap keluarkan zakat.

https://t.co/fL9zGF4iLT
Translated Text:
@HashimSon94 Greetings,

1. For business you can use this method sir.

2. Gold and Personal Money must be combined for zakat calculation. It is different from the Business Zakat calculation.

3. Charity is not counted as zakat. Still paying zakat.

https://t.co/fL9zGF4iLT

Text: @acaiijawe Salam tuan. Kalau saya buat simpanan menggunakan gaji yang sudah ditolak dengan zakat pendapatan, masih dikenakan zakat simpanan lagi ke? Rasa macam dua kali tolak zakat pula.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe Greetings sir. If I make savings using the salary that has been deducted with income zakat, will I still be charged zakat on savings? It feels like twice minus the zakat.

Text:
@amilah_md Salam, kalau akaun simpanan itu mmg 100% dari gaji, maka tidak perlu keluarkan semula zakat.

Tapi, 

1. Kalau dalam simpanan tu accumulate sampai ie RM100,000 dan bertahun-tahun dapat dividen tetap kena zakat.

2. Begitu juga kalau ada beberapa akaun simpanan bank.
Translated Text:
@amilah_md Hello, if the savings account is 100% of the salary, then there is no need to pay zakat again.

But,

1. If you accumulate up to RM100,000 in savings and get dividends for many years, you will still be subject to zakat.

2. Likewise if there are several bank savings accounts.

Text: @acaiijawe Nk tnya, kalau dlm bank ada rm10k contohnya, tp tu bukan simpanan. Kena zakat jgk ke?
Translated Text: @acaiijawe My question is, if there is rm10k in the bank for example, but that is not savings. Do you have to pay zakat?

Let say the loan is RM100,000, the annual div maybe around RM6000, then maybe it has been done for 3 years so 6000 x 3

Text:
@ninasakinah Kalau itu satu-satunya simpanan yang ada, maka tidak dikenakan zakat. Sebab bawah Nisab.

Nisab = Harga 85 gram emas = RM20,500
Translated Text:
@ninasakinah If that is the only savings available, then zakat is not charged. Because under Nisab.

Nisab = Price of 85 grams of gold = RM20,500

Text: @acaiijawe Serius cakap. Kiraan zakat ni agak rumit. Saya baca 5 6 website. Itupun cara kiraan berbeza2. Alhamdulillah diberi kefahaman oleh Allah. Sya faham n reti la kira sendiri.

Text:
@mSidekJ Keliru sebab kadangkala setiap negeri kiraannya berbeza-beza.

Tapi bagi negeri macam Selangor yang ada resources dan dedicated team untuk buat kajian bab syariah, biasanya negeri2 lain akan follow kami.
Translated Text:
@mSidekJ Confused because sometimes each state counts differently.

But for a state like Selangor that has resources and a dedicated team to study sharia, usually other states will follow us.

Text: @acaiijawe Kiraan dulu tak perlu gabung dan tak dikenakan zakat, kiraan baru digabungkan semua dan dikenakan zakat? Kenapa boleh berubah2 peraturan ye. Maafkan saya bertanya.
Translated Text: @acaiijawe The previous count does not need to be combined and is not subject to zakat, the new count is all combined and subject to zakat? Why can you change the rules? Forgive me for asking.

Text:
@acaiijawe Kalau ada yang tanya nisab tu apa? 👇🏻 
Nisab adalah jumlah yang dikenakan zakat iaitu 85g emas ikut harga semasa. 
RM250/g darab 85g = RM21 250. 
Jadi kalau ada harta yang mencukupi RM21 250. Diwajibkan bayar zakat which is 2.5% daripada harta tu. 

Tolong betulkan kalau salah 😊
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe If someone asks what is the nisab? 👇🏻
Nisab is the amount of zakat which is 85g of gold according to the current price.
RM250/g times 85g = RM21 250.
So if there is enough wealth RM21 250. It is obligatory to pay zakat which is 2.5% of that wealth.

Please correct me if it's wrong 😊

Text:
@acaiijawe Emas pun kena tambah sekali ke? Sebab ada pegawai yang kerja di sebuah pusat zakat kata, kira asing zakat simpanan dengan emas.

Terima kasih.
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe Gold also has to be added once? Because there is an official who works at a zakat center, he says that the zakat savings with gold are different.

Thank you.

Text:
@pokdimaro Di Selangor ya. Dlm kiraan Gabungan Zakat ini.

Kalau emas tu lebih uruf ataupun lebih 85 gram, kena zakat emas.

Tapi kalau ada emas 10 gram (ie nilai semasa: RM2.5k), tidak dikenakan zakat emas. Tetapi ia menambah nilai harta semasa kita.

Jadi kena campur dgn harta lain.
Translated Text:
@pokdimaro In Selangor yes. In the calculation of the Combined Zakat.

If the gold is more uruf or more than 85 grams, you have to pay zakat on gold.

But if there is 10 grams of gold (ie current value: RM2.5k), no gold zakat is charged. But it adds value to our current property.

So it has to be mixed with other property.

Text: @acaiijawe ‘Kiraan sekarang’ maksudnya digunapakai daripada bila ya?

Text:
@acaiijawe Jadi ape guna buat perbezaan kategori zakat Kalau nak kene gabung semua harta? Ape isu nyer Kalau kira zakat Ikut kategori asing2? 
Pendapat ni berdasarkan dalil macam mana?
Translated Text:
@acaiijawe So what's the point of making a difference in zakat categories if you want to combine all the property? What is the issue if you count zakat according to the foreign category?
This opinion is based on what kind of arguments?

Text:
@ishmah31 Sebab setiap harta berbeza kaedah penentuan nilainya.

Emas darab harga semasa (berubah2).
Saham kena dapatkan nilai unrealized profit.
Simpanan kena dapatkan baki akhir setiap akaun bank.

Bila sebut harta, ini semua harta kita (bukan asing2). Ini tujuan zakat harta dikenakan.
Translated Text:
@ishmah31 Because each property has a different method of determining its value.

Gold times the current price (changed).
Shares have to get the value of unrealized profit.
Savings must get the final balance of each bank account.

When we say property, this is all our property (not foreign). This is the purpose of zakat property.

Text:
@asya_katie Nama itu atas buku bank itu ‘atas kertas’ sahaja. Milikan siapa duit tersebut? Pemiliknya sebenar yang kena keluarkan zakat.

Sama macam seorang ibu yang letak RM50k dalam akaun simpanan nama bayinya. Ibu itu pemilik harta sebenar dan dia kena keluarkan zakat.
Translated Text:
@asya_katie The name is on the bank book 'on paper' only. Who owns the money? The real owner has to pay zakat.

Just like a mother who puts RM50k in a savings account in her baby's name. The mother is the owner of real property and she has to pay zakat.

@amlnrz Jika cukup haul.

CIMB: 1k

RM13k x 2.5% = RM325.

Text:
@hxppypom_ TH tu digunakan sebagai basis untuk cukupkan Nisab.

Contoh.
Nisab: RM15,000

Tabung Haji:RM15k
Maybank: RM3k

Total Simpanan: RM18,000 (lebih Nisab, kena zakat 2.5%)

Jumlah dah keluarkan zakat: RM15k
Jumlah belum keluarkan zakat: RM3k

Zakat: RM3,000 x 2.5% = RM75
Translated Text:
@hxppypom_ That TH is used as a basis to satisfy Nisab.

Example.
Amount: RM15,000

Hajj Fund: RM15k
Maybank: RM3k

Total Savings: RM18,000 (more Nisab, subject to 2.5% zakat)

Amount of zakat paid: RM15k
Unpaid amount of zakat: RM3k

Zakat: RM3,000 x 2.5% = RM75

Text:
*Kongsi ilmu.

Kenapa lembu nampak kurus?😅.

Sebenarnya bela lembu ni memang ada skill. Masa mereka membesar, kita bagi makan dan minum secukupnya sahaja (dengan kawalan).

Kalau bagi makan terlalu banyak akan membazir, jejas kesihatan dan meningkatkan kos membela.
Translated Text:
* Share knowledge.

Why do cows look thin?😅.

Actually, this bullfight does have skill. When they grow up, we give them enough to eat and drink (with control).

If you eat too much it will be wasted, affect your health and increase the cost of defending.

Text:
Bila tiba masa nak jual nanti, baru kita bagi makan banyak + booster.

Sebab dalam tempoh 6 bulan sahaja, berat mereka boleh naik dari 150kg ke >350kg atau lebih. Masa tu baru jual.

Ayam, kambing dan ternakan pedaging lain memang akan buat begini ✌️.

Itulah.
Translated Text:
When it's time to sell later, we will give you a lot of food + boosters.

Because in just 6 months, their weight can go from 150kg to >350kg or more. It's time to sell.

Chickens, goats and other meat livestock will indeed do this ✌️.

That's it.

Text:
Kita semua tak tahu bagaimana dan bila akan mati. Tapi kita semua nakkan kematian yang baik.

Sebab tu kena selalu taubat dan istighfar.

Mudah-mudahan bila mati nanti kita sedang dalam mengingat Allah, dosa diampunkan dan Allah tutup semua aib kita semasa hidup, Ameen!
Translated Text:
We all do not know how and when we will die. But we all want a good death.

That's why you always have to repent and apologize.

Hopefully, when we die, we will be remembering God, our sins will be forgiven and God will cover all our shame during life, Ameen!

Text:
Mereka yang berpotensi memang akan diberi latihan perniagaan, buat akaun kira-kira, strategi bisnes dsb.

Kalau jual nasi lemak, kumpulkan ramai-ramai, kita upah orang yang power buat sambal dan ajar mereka.

Sales & performance mereka juga dipantau selama beberapa tahun. https://t.co/rNziS6P8iL
Translated Text:
Those who have the potential will indeed be given business training, create a balance sheet, business strategy etc.

If you sell nasi lemak, gather a lot of people, we hire powerful people to make sambal and teach them.

Sales & Their performance is also monitored for several years. https://t.co/rNziS6P8iL

Text:
Sudah tentu ada berjaya dan gagal dalam perniagaan ni. Ia lumrah. Cuma dengan strategi yang betul, risiko tu akan diminimumkan.

Tugas kita sokong peniaga kecil asnaf ini. Tapi bukan mereka sahaja. Sokonglah semua orang yang berniaga di kawasan sekitar kita semampu kita 💪.
Translated Text:
Of course there are successes and failures in this business. It's normal. Only with the right strategy, the risk will be minimized.

Our job is to support this asnaf small trader. But they are not the only ones. Support all the people who do business in our surrounding area as much as we can 💪.

Text:
Semua asnaf yang menerima bantuan akan dipantau. Bukan dibiar begitu sahaja lepas dapat modal/peralatan/lori.

Jika berpotensi mereka akan dapat bantuan tambahan. Jika tak mampu berniaga, akan cari kaedah lain.

Walaupun anda bayar zakat RM10, anda menyumbang kepada usaha ini. https://t.co/QfaeVIRLhj
Translated Text:
All asnaf who receive help will be monitored. Not just left alone after getting capital/equipment/lorry.

If there is potential they will get additional help. If unable to do business, will find another method.

Even if you pay zakat RM10, you are contributing to this effort. https://t.co/QfaeVIRLhj

Text:
Bacaan tambahan untuk ilmu. Petikan dari Irsyad Fatwa, Mufti Wilayah tentang solat bagi makmum yang terpisah.

Namun, isu ini perlu ada fatwa khusus setiap negeri. Terutama bila ada keperluan dan masalah baru. Jemaah terpaksa dijarakkan untuk elak wabak, masjid x cukup tempat. https://t.co/qnevc4UurF
Translated Text:
Additional reading for knowledge. Excerpt from Irsyad Fatwa, Regional Mufti about prayer for separated makmum.

However, this issue requires a specific fatwa for each state. Especially when there are new needs and problems. Pilgrims had to be kept apart to avoid the epidemic, the mosque did not have enough space. https://t.co/qnevc4UurF

Text:
Part 2.

Lampu lama. Dalam sejarah, mentol elektrik pertama kali digunakan di Masjid Nabawi pada tahun 1908.

Ia diperkenalkan oleh Sultan Abdul Majid. Ketika itu ada 2,427 mentol menerangi seluruh Masjid Nabawi.

Sebelumnya, seluruh masjid menggunakan lampu minyak tanah. https://t.co/nNl9SUk35N
Translated Text:
Part 2.

Old lamp. In history, electric bulbs were first used in the Nabawi Mosque in 1908.

It was introduced by Sultan Abdul Majid. At that time there were 2,427 light bulbs lighting up the entire Prophet's Mosque.

Previously, the entire mosque used kerosene lamps. https://t.co/nNl9SUk35N

Text:
Part 3.

Ini beberapa corak senibina menarik yang mungkin ada pengaruh dari negeri-negeri Islam seluruh dunia.

Nampak sentiasa bersih dan bebas sawang sebab memang ada orang bersihkan secara kerap. https://t.co/MNyZMhPbhw

Part 3.

It always looks clean and free of stains because there are people who clean it regularly. https://t.co/MNyZMhPbhw
